GSP29nvtp1_1u:25: pinākīti tu viśiṣṭaśastradhāradhamittaka nāmasaṃkortanena prārabdhavighnasya protsāraṇameva samīhitamiti sūcayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:27: yathāvasthitayojanāyāṃ tu arthapaunarūktyaprasarktā stutitvameva samādhānamadhyavaseyam iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:47: etāśca vacasāmaviśuddhīḥ chalajātinigrahasthāneṣu sūtrakāra eva prapañcayiṣyati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:48: so 'yaṃ na tatheti bhavati vāgviśuddhīnāṃ nidhiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:50: evaṃ parāparagurūn natvā śiṣyabuddhisamādhānāya samāhitavaiśiṣṭyaṃ darśayati--grantheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:51: nanu tātparyaṭīketi vadatā pravṛttipāṭavārthaṃ granthasaṃkṣepo darśitaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:52: na ca śiṣyāṇāṃ kathantāsaṃboghavidhurāṇāṃ rāddhāntamātraparigrahaḥ saṃkṣepato vivakṣitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:57: dūṣaṇāni ca nirasyānīti punarapi granthagauravamityata āha--granthavyākhyācchalenaiveti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:58: nanu cirantare 'smin nibandhe mahājanaparigṛhīte bahavo nibandhāstathāvidhāḥ santīti kṛtamanene ityata āha-- icchāmīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:62: kathaṃ tavāpīyaṃ vicchinnasaṃpradāyā tātparyaṭīkā sunibandha ityata āha--atijaratīnāmiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:65: kiṃ nāmātra trilocanaguroḥ sakāśādupadeśarasāyanamāsāditamamūṣāṃ punarnavībhāvāya dīyata iti yujyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:66: na ca kunibandhapaṅkamagnānāṃ taddātumucitamatastasmādutkṛṣya svanibandhasthale sanniveśanarūpasamuddharaṇameva sāṃpratamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:67: tatra bhagavato 'kṣapādasya muniṣu madhye pravaratvaṃ śrutyādibhya eva suprasiddham kimanena saṃkīrtanena?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:77: taditi digrāgādisamutthāpitaṃ śāstrācchādakaṃ kuhetusaṃtamasamapaneyatvena parāmṛśatā śāstrasyaivāyaṃ nibandha iti darśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:78: bhāṣyasya ca tadvivaraṇarūpasya śāstraśarīrarūpatayā na śāstrādādhikyaṃ manyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:81: etena śāstrasya yo nibandho bhāṣyagranthaḥ sa kutārkikājñānanivṛttihetuḥ kariṣyata iti vyākhyānaṃ ṭīkāvirodhenopekṣaṇīyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:83: na hīdamanūdya kiñcid vidheyaṃ pratiṣedhyaṃ veha vidyate ityata āha--sūtreti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:84: atha svanibandhasya prayojanavattāpradarśanena kiṃ siddhyatītyata āha--prekṣāvaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:86: ato vyutpādanapravṛttau vyutpattirevāmīṣāṃ prayojanamiti kimapareṇa prayojanenetyata āha--vyutpādamātrasyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:87: dvividhaṃ hi prayojanaṃ mukhyaṃ gauṇa ca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:90: tatra mukhyārthinaḥ tatsādhānamabhyarthayamānāḥ tatra pravartanta iti tadapi prayojanamevati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:91: ato mukhye prayojane sati gauṇaṃ prayojanam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:93: na ca svātantryeṇaivāsya mukhyaṃ prayojanamastītyato yasyedamaṅga tasya mukhyaṃ prayojanamastīti darśite prekṣāvān pravarttito bhavatītyabhisandhiḥ vārttikakṛta ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:96: na hi bhāṣyasya svātantryeṇa mukhyaṃ prayojanamasti yena vārttikaṃ tadaṅgatāmiyāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:98: nanu karmendriyaniyamaḥ śama iti suprasiddhaṃ śānto dānta ityādi upaniṣatsu,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:100: ato na mukhyaṃ prayojanamityata āha--atra ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:103: na tāvat kaścit jagadupacikīrṣuḥ kvacit pravartate yato munerapi tathātvaṃ saṃbhāvayāmaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:109: tasya ca rūpāṇi śamadamādisaṃpattiḥ nityānityavivekaḥ aihikāmuṣmikabhāgavairāgyaṃ mumukṣutā ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:110: yastu anadhikāryeva pravartate karmakāṇḍa iva brahmakāṇḍe sa na phalabhāg bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:121: na ca vedādhyayanavadanumānasya pratyakṣasya copādānaṃ śūdrādikaṃ prati niṣiddham,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:123: tathā sati dhūmādapi vahimadhigacchan pratyakṣād vā pratyavāyī syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:125: na cātmagocare pratyakṣānumāne śūdrāderviśeṣato niṣiddhe snātasya caṇḍāladarśanamiva brāhmaṇādeḥ prāyaścittānupadeśāt pratyuta
GSP29nvtp1_1u:126: striyo vaiśyāstathā śūdrā ye cānye pāpayonayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:128: tasmād yathā sa eva viśiṣṭaḥ svargo vaidikayāgādyanadhikṛtenāpi upāyāntareṇa traivarṇikaśuśrūṣādinā sādhyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:137: tasmādāgamaikavākyatayā pravṛtte śāstre tadadhikāryevādhikārīti śūdrādayo 'nadhikṛtā iva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:140: santyeva hi kecit karuṇāmṛdumanaso yeṣāṃ jagadeva mitram /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:143: sā ca yathaikaṃ duḥkhita paśyato bhavati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:144: tathā jagadeva duḥkhita paśyataḥ kiṃ na syāt?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:147: na hi badhireṣu gāyano gāyatītyata āha--tatra yadi na kaściditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:148: na hi rogī mandabhāgyatayā carakādyupadeśe na pravartata iti tadarthatā tasya nivartata ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:153: tathā ca paralokādabibhyato 'sya vacane kaḥ śraddhāsyatītyata āha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:157: tathāpi kleśahānerdurūhatvāt pratyavāyotpattimabhyupagamya tadabhāvāya tapaḥprabhāva uktaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:160: na hi gāḥ paṅkamagnāḥ paṅkapralepabhayādanukampāparavaśāḥ samarthā noddharanti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:163: tathā cet kathamanadhikṛta ityabhisandhāyoktaṃ prapañcayati--tapaḥprabhāva eva hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:164: yathā hi teṣāṃ tapaḥprabhāvādevaṃvidhāḥ pāpmāno vilīyante,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:165: tathā tapaḥprabhāvādeva satyasaṃkalpatayā anadhikāriṇo 'pi phalabhāgina iti na kaścid virodhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:168: anadhikṛtena tu kṛtaṃ karma viguṇaṃ sanna phalāṃya paryāptamityapi na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:172: sa ca tīvratadeṇa tapasaiva vilīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:173: tarhi mahājano yena gataḥ sa panthāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:174: iti nyāyena vayamapyanadhikṛtān vyutpādayāma ityata āha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:175: nanu kutārkikāṇāmajñānaṃ nivartayatā kimanena śāstrasyopakṛtaṃ syādityāha--kutārkikairiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:177: iha karmārambhe prārabdhasyāntarāyaviraheṇa parisamāpti kāmayamānā abhīṣṭadevatā namaskārapūrvakaṃ prekṣāvantaḥ pravartante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:178: dṛśyate ca tatra tatra bahuśoṃ vyabhicāraḥ kṛtanamaskārasyāpi samīhitāsiddheḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:184: tasmādar thakāma iha vaṭe prativasantaṃ yakṣaṃ pūjayeditiva daprāmāṇikaprasiddhivijṛmbhitametadityabhisandhāya kimu na kṛto vāttikakṛtā iṣṭadevatānamaskāra ityata āha--avigīteti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:191: yadyavaṃ kimanena na kṛta ityata āha--parameti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:193: yena na dṛśyata ityata āha--na niveśita iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:197: na ca tanniveśanavyatirekeṇa te grāhitāḥ syurityata āha--maṅgalyāntara vaditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:200: nanu daṇḍakasūtrasyānuvādo nāstītyata uktaṃ saṃkṣepata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:215: tasya niḥśreyasahetutvaṃ vā śrūyata ityata āha--pramāṇādīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:217: yadyapi śiṣyate anuśiṣyate pramāṇādikamaneneti śāstramiti vyutpattyā atrāpi kāraṇatā gamyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:221: anyathā pramāṇādīni tattvato jñātvāpi tāvanna mucyate
GSP29nvtp1_1u:224: nanu hetutvakaraṇatve na viṣayabhedena bhavitumarhata ityata āha--teneti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:226: kiṃ tu padārthatattve jñāpakatayā niḥśreyase tadvyāpāravataḥ karaṇatayetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:228: evaṃ ca sati śāstrasya niḥśreyase karttavye padārthatattvajñānasya nirūktibalena vyāpāratve darśite vyāpāravyāpāriṇoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:229: tathā vyāpāravatā śāstreṇa vyāpāraviṣayasya pramāṇādeḥ pratipādyapratipādakabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:230: tathā vyāpāraviṣayeṇa pramāṇādinā vyāpārasya tattvajñānasya viṣayaviṣayībhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:231: tathā vyāpāreṇa tattvajñānena vyāpārulasya niḥśreyasasya kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:236: tadvacāpāraviṣayo veti pajcasu vaktavyeṣu upalakṣaṇārthaṃ dvayamāha--śāstrapramāṇāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:237: enameva vyutpattilabhyaṃ vyāpāramabhipretya tattvasya jñānamiti karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī
GSP29nvtp1_1u:239: nanu śiṣyācāryaśāstratadvyākhyānānāmapi saṃbandhāḥ kaiścit samānatāntrikaiḥ pradarśitāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:252: tasmāt prayojanamabhidhayaṃ tayoḥ saṃbandho 'bhidheyastaddvārā śāstrasya prayojanena saṃbandha ityetadarthatveme prathamasūtrasya nyāyyamityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:253: nanu yasya mithyājñānaṃ saṃsāraṃ pratanoti tasyaiva tattvajñānaṃ niḥśreyasahetuḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:256: tathā ca na niḥśreyasasaṃbandhaḥ ityata āha--yatpadārtheti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:257: nanu pramāṇādipadārthatattvajñānasya yadi niḥśreyasahetutā śāstrapravṛtteḥ pūrvameva pramāṇasiddhā niṣprayojanaṃ śāstre prayojanābhidhānam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:283: nāpi mumukṣuṇānapekṣite svarge yāgādikaṃ tatsādhanatayā nānubhūyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:284: puruṣārthasādhane tvicchālakṣaṇā vā prayatnalakṣaṇā vā pravṛttirna svarasasiddhā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:285: na hi kaścit kṣudhī duḥkhaprahāṇaṃ tṛptisauhityasukha vā ananusaṃdhāyānnamattumicchati prayatate vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:286: tasmād yatra yaḥ pravartayitavyaḥ sa tatsādhyamarthaṃ daśayitvā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:287: yataśca yo nivartayitavyaḥ sa tatsādhyamanarthaṃ darśayitveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:292: yadyapi munerāptatvāvadhāraṇe prayojanānabhidhāne 'pi prayojanasāmānyaniścayo bhavatyeva prayojanavadidaṃ śāstramāptoktatvāditi ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:296: sa ca prayojanaviśeṣo vacanādevāvasīyata iti sārthakametadabhidhānam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:308: nanu saṃśayānasya kathaṃ prekṣāvataḥ pravṛttiritya āha--na khalviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:309: yadyapi ca sasyādhigamasya kṛṣyādisādhyatayā saṃśayo nāsti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:313: yathā ca tatra śataikāṃśikaḥ phalābhāvaḥ phalakoṭistūtkaṭā tathātrāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:319: yadvacanena hi yaḥ pravartate sa tadvacanādeva viśeṣasmṛtimapekṣate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:321: na hi rogārto mamedaṃ roganivṛttisādhanaṃ bhavenna veti yatra tatrocchṛḍkhalaḥ svayamutprekṣya pravartate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:327: athābhimatasyāpi śakyasyāpi prayojanasya laghīyasyupāyāntare satyapi gururayamupāyaḥ pipāsuṃ prati gīrvāṇataraḍgiṇītīrasamīpakūpakhananopadeśavat
GSP29nvtp1_1u:331: na hi kaścid vaidyavacanādeva māśaḍkya nivartate yathā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:338: nanvidindrayādīnāmajñāyamānānāmeva svaviṣayaparicchedajanakatvaṃ paśyannapi kathamevaṃ brūyādityata āha--na hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:344: yadyapi niścayākārameva jñānamādhatte tathāpi tathābhūtasyaiva bhūyo bhūyaḥ prameyaviraholabdherviśeṣānupalabdheśca saṃdehastadavaskandatītyarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:347: tathā pūrvapakṣiṇaḥ kvacidapi viniścayo nāstyevetyādikaścābhimāno viruddhyetetyata āha--api tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:353: evaṃ copadhidvayāvacchinnāyāḥ sattāyā upādhibhedād bhinnāyā ivaikasminnarthe samavāyaḥ kṛtakatvānityatvayoriva na viruddhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:355: pramāṇyāvadhāraṇaṃ tarhi kkopayujyata ityata āha--tadeva hīti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:367: na hi tadapyaupādhikaṃ yenopādhyanavadhāraṇe naivāvadhāryetetyata āha--tathā hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:370: svato vetyasya svātmanā vā svagrāhakeṇa vetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:375: yo hi yad gṛhṇāti sa taddharmamapi gṛhṇīyāditi saṃbhāvyetāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:381: taddhi mānasaṃ vā syāt laiḍgikaṃ vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:382: ubhayamapi manaso jñātatālakṣaṇāt liṅgād vā aviśiṣṭāt jāyamānaṃ kathamiva tadābhāsaviśiṣṭaṃ gṛhṇīyat?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:383: viṣayaviśeṣāt tu tathātve apramāṇyasyāpi svata eva grahaṇaprasaṅgāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:385: pramāyāḥ prāyikatayā tadvāsanāyāḥ samutkaṭatvādapramāpi samutkaṭatvādapramāpi prametyeva gṛhyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:387: śuktikāyāṃ śuktikātvamiti yadi tathāpyāsaṃjakasyāpi yadyāsaṃjakatvamavagataṃ kathaṃ na svato 'prāmāṇyagrahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:389: na ca kṛtrimaṃ rūpamaparibhūya grahaṇaṃ grahaṇāmityucyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:396: nanu yadi svīyāt svata iti na nirvahati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:401: na hi tatra kiñcidanavasthādikaṃ paśyāma ityata āha--eteneti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:403: kadācit pramāṇavyavahārasauṣṭhavāt svīkriyetāpi yadyayaṃ tena nirvahet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:405: yathā hi pramāṇaṃ svātmānaṃ gṛhṇat prāmāṇyamapi gṛhṇāti tathā tadābhāsamapi tadābhāsatva gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:416: prātyakṣike ca vahnijñāne prātyakṣikameva vahnijñānāntaramiti yāvat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:421: evaṃ śābde 'pi śābdajñānānantaraṃ tadāptaśabdajamāptāntaraśabdajaṃ ceti samānajātīyasaṃvādo darśitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:422: arthakriyetyādinā kāryaliṅgakaṃ tadgocaretyādinā cākāryakāraṇaliṅgakamanumānatrayaṃ vijājīyasaṃvādarūpaṃ darśitam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:424: āptopadeśajamapi saṃvādakaṃ jñānaṃ bhavatyeva jñānaṃ bhavatyeva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:425: so 'yaṃ pramāṇye niścetavye saṃvādo yadyapi vyadhikaraṇastathapyarthatathātvamava dhārayannarthavattvaṃ pravartakasyāpyavadhārayatītyetāvatā tathaivopavarṇitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:427: evaṃ pramātvasya duradhigamatvamāpādya tadāyattāvadhāraṇe pramāṇānāṃ pramāṇatve yojayati--yadā ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:429: tadā saiva sārvalaukikī svata ityādivikalpān phalgūkariṣyati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:430: atha tadavadhāraṇavyatirekeṇāpi pravṛttirapratyūhā tadā māvadhāri prāmāṇyam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:445: yadyapi deśāvasthābhede kālabhedo 'pyarthasiddhastathāpi yathākathañcit kālabhedamātraṃ vivakṣitamatreti jñāpanārthaṃ tadgrahaṇam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:446: tathā hi dūrasthe sthāṇau puruṣarpatyayasya kālāntare 'pi visaṃvādo nāsti yāvat
GSP29nvtp1_1u:448: pratyetavya eva vā yāvanna nediṣṭhaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:449: evaṃ svapnāvasthāyām arthapratyayasya kālabhede 'pi tāvanna visaṃvādo yāvanna jāgarāvasthānubhavaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:450: na ca vācyamevaṃ sati kiṃ kālabhedagrahaṇeneti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:451: deśāvasthayorabhede 'pi kālakrameṇāpi kvacid visaṃvādadarśanād yathā sunipuṇanibhālanādāpātajātasya kāmāturakāminījñānasya bhede 'pi kvacit kālāntare visaṃvādāt tadupagrahaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:452: tadanenendriyādīnāṃ kālakramabhāvinaḥ sahakāribhedāḥ sphuṭatarapratītihetavaḥ sarva eva saṃgṛhītāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:453: yadyapi ca pramāraviṣayāveva visaṃvādāvisaṃvādau saṃbhavavyabhicāralakṣaṇau tathāpyavisaṃvādasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:456: yadyapi samarthapravṛtti tvādityuktesamañjasaṃ tathāpi pravṛttiryasyeti sambandhe ṣaṣṭhī /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:457: sa ca pramāṇapravṛttyorjanyajanakabhāva eveti sa eva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:459: nanu na tāvat pramāṇyasamarthapravṛtti janakatvayoravinābhāvaḥ pratyakṣeṇa śakyagrahaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:469: vyatirekī ca sarvatra sapakṣābhāvamabhyupetya pravartata iti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:471: na ca vācyam etasyaivānumānasyārthavattvānavadhāraṇe kathaṃ pramāṇānāmarthavattvasiddhiḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:476: pramāṇānāṃ pramāṇaphalatvalakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ sādhyata iti sarvaṃ sundaram //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:477: etenaitadapi nirastam yat prāmāṇyānavadhāraṇe aprāmāṇyānavadhāraṇamapi katham?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:482: nanu nāstyevāsau vādī yaḥ prāmāṇyāniścaye 'pi vipratipadyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:483: na hi prāmāṇyaṃ svīkṛtya tanniścaye vipratipattiḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:487: aniścite ca prāmāṇye tadatadrūpasaṃdeho 'pi kvacid durlabhaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:493: na ca vikalpanirmite na saṃśayādivyavahāraḥ samasti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:499: tat kathaṃ kevalavyatirekyanumānam ityāśaḍkya saṃpratipattirūttaram--anvayavyatirekī veti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:504: nanu samarthapravṛttijanakatvādityetāvataiva sādhyasiddheḥ pramāṇator'thapratipattāvityasamarthaviśeṣaṇaṃ vayadhikaraṇa cetyata āha--pravṛttijanakatvaṃ tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:507: tato yathā pramāṇāditattvajñānaṃ sādhyatayā prayojanaṃ pratijñāyate tathā pramāṇādyabhidheyatayāpi pratijñeyaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:509: iti dharmasya vyākhyeyatvenaiva pratijñā samānatantre na ca tadabhidheyatāpratijñānamatra /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:510: tasmādabhidheyattvāpratijñānānna pramāṇādayaḥ śāstreṇābhidhīyanta iti śrotṛbuddhacanurodhenāśaḍkya sūtrakārahṛdayānurodhena vārttikamuttarayatisyādetaditi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:513: na ca śiṣyākāṅkṣā kiṃ vakṣyati bhavāniti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:524: uktāboddhāraṃ prati tu vyākhyātāro bhavanti, yata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:526: tadanubhavasiddhamapi pramāṇādyabhidhāyakatvaṃ yaḥ kutaścid vyāmohānna pratipadyate taṃ prati vyākhyātā śāstrasya puruṣaśreyo 'bhidhāyakatvādityāhetyarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:532: tarhi śreyaḥ punaḥ sukhamahitanivṛttiriti kimityata āha--yadyapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:533: yadyapi śāstra punaḥ puruṣaḥ punaḥ śreyaḥ punariti pratipadaṃ gṛhītvā vivaraṇaṃ prakṣayeṇetyantena sphuṭāvabhāsam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:537: na hi rāgādimantaṃ prati śāstraṃ na sasādhanaṃ śreyo 'bhidhatte /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:538: na ca taṃ prati na tat śreyo yena vītarāgo vivicya gṛhyatām /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:539: tathāpi, tasmāt tat śāstraṃ puruṣaśreyo 'bhidhatta iti madhyapatitopasaṃhāra eva vivaraṇavicchedabhramo mā bhūdityetadarthamavacchinatti--upabhogāt prakṣayeṇetyanteneti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:542: te khalvamī samūhāḥ praṇetṛpuruṣecchānurodhinaḥ svārthānurodhino vetyata āha--eka-smṛtīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:544: padamityetāvadeva lakṣaṇaṃ tathāpyetadeva lakṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇabhaḍgurāṇāṃ kathamityetaduktam--ekasmṛtisamārūḍhā iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:550: gauraścaḥ puruṣo hastītyāderapi vākyatvaprasaṅgādityata āha--evaṃ svārtheti samūho veditavyaḥ sūtratveneti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:553: śāstrameva sūtrasamūharūpaṃ prakaraṇamiti prāptamityata āha--evaṃ kvaciditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:578: nanu ca tatra ekaprakāro 'pi na darśitaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:580: nanu śāstrasya sasādhanapuruṣaśreyo 'bhidhāyakatvaṃ pratijñāya śāstrasvarūpadarśanaṃ kkopayujyata ityata āha--tadevamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:582: nanu pratītisiddhaṃ pramāṇādīnāṃ ṣoḍaśatvaṃ kimityanūdyata ityatastannirākaraṇīyām āśaḍkāmāha--nanviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:593: pratyakṣānumāneti pramāṇadvayopanyāsaḥ svasiddhāntaviruddho vāttikakṛta ityāha--pramāṇādaya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:598: tathāpi na tena te sākṣād viṣayīkriyante pramāṇādaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:603: āgamo hi yatra pravartate tadviṣayameva pratyakṣamanumānaṃ vā apekṣate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:604: te tu samūle api na sviṣayapravṛttaṃ pramāṇamapekṣete /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:605: tato mūlāsaṃplutaviṣayatvāt te eva darśite ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:612: vipratipanno 'pi kathāmārabhamāṇo 'pyamumukṣurgalite 'haṅkāre na sāpekṣo bhavatītyato niṣphalo jalpavitaṇḍārambha ityata āha-- śiṣyamāṇasyeti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:621: te 'bhī durlalitāḥ śiṣyā yadi mokṣādāvapi indriyādyapekṣante,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:628: nanvetāvatāpi sāpekṣā anenaiva śāstreṇa pratipādyāḥ pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ ceti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:630: paramapuruṣārthasādhanaṃ tu jijñāsava iti śeṣe nyāyeneti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:631: iha yadyapi sukhaṃ dṛṣṭameva vidhāyakapramāṇagocara eva ahitanivṛttiradṛṣṭaiva niṣedhakapramāṇagocara eveti yathāsaṃkhyamapi saṃbhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:632: tathāpi śreyaḥ punaḥ sukhamahitanivṛttiśceti ato na kiñcidadhikamuktaṃ bhavatīti pramāṇāviśeṣasaṃbandhakathanameva param /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:634: na cābhimataśreyoviśeṣanirdhāraṇe kartavye vidhiniṣedhagocaratvopavarṇanamupayujyata ityabhisaṃdhāyānyathā vyācaṣṭe--tatrāpīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:635: tacchreyaḥ sukhamahitanivṛttiśceti tacchabdena dvayamapi śreyastvena parāmṛśyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:660: nanu yadi nivṛttiriti nanu yadi nivṛttiḥ prāgabhāvo duḥkhasya,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:663: prāgābhāvasya ca tathātve prāgityeva na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:665: sa ca sarva evātyantika iti kuto nivṛtterātyantikatvavyutpādanamityata āha--ātyantikatvamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:674: atha śarīrādiṣu nivṛtteṣvapi dukhaṃ kiṃ na bhavet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:678: tathā cānuṣaḍgāsukhinivṛttiḥ kimupavarṇyaya ityata āha--na hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:680: atḥ śarīrādiṣvasatsu duḥkhavat sukhamapi na bhavati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:692: nanu viṣayā apyanitaretarasādhanasādhyāḥ pajcaiva vibhāge parīkṣāyāṃ ca siddhāḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:703: icchādveṣaprayatnāstu pratīyamānā eva sākṣād duḥkha janayanti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:704: tathā hi, mumukṣustāvadicchāmi dveṣmi yogābhyāsādanyatra prayata iti pratītyaiva duḥkhī bhavati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:706: anyo 'pīṣyamāṇālābhe bubhukṣito 'smi pipāsito 'smīti pratītya duḥkhī bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:709: evamaniṣṭa evārthe iṣṭabuddhyā prayatamānasya nivṛtte bhrame tathā alasasya prayatnamupalabhyaiva duḥkhamityetāvataita eva manaso viṣayatvena nirdiṣṭāḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:717: iha yadyapi anuṣaḍgo 'vinābhāva iti vakṣyati vāttikakāraḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:721: ata eva ādhārasyopalabdhisādhanasya ca sāmye 'pyekatarasya kāraṇābhāvenābhāve 'pyanyatarasabhdāvenāvinābhāva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:733: kṣayitvaṃ kāme satīti tu vyākhyānaṃ duḥkhahetava iti bahuvacanaviruddham,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:737: na hi sukha tatsādhanaṃ vā anicchataḥ sukhaṃ nāma sukhasādhanaṃ ca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:755: dvitīyā tu viṣayasya piriṇativirasatvād duḥkhameva prasūte,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:762: indriyādīnāṃ punardeṣapravṛttyabhāve 'pi duḥkhaṃ prati vyāpāro jīvanmuktasyāstyeva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:765: na hi bhāvini janmāntare śarīrendriyāviṣayabuddhisukhaduḥkhānyāhatya vyāpriyante yathā dharmādharmau //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:766: etadevābhisaṃdhāya kāraṇarūpadharmādharmocchedakrameṇa kāryarūpaikaviṃśatividhaduḥkhasyocchedovārttikakṛtā darśita iti tathaiva vāttikamavatārayati--uktaprakāreti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:787: tadevaṃ pūrvoktena nyāyena mokṣamāṇasya śāstre pravṛttiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:797: yadyapi ca yāvaccharīrādibhāvinī pravṛttistathāpi doṣānuṣaṅgasahakārivirahānnāsau pravṛttiḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:800: yadyapi yathānādau bhāvaparamparāyāṃ karmāṇi pracīyante tathāpacīcante 'pi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:811: tathāpyāgamaprāmāṇyāt kāyayaugapadyasyāpi prasaṃkhyānaphalatayā siddhatvādanantāmaniyatavipākasamayatāṃ cābhyupagamyaiva parihṛtam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:813: yogardhiprabhāvasampanno vividhaphalabhogino vicitrasvabhāvānekadaiva bahūn kāyān icchāmātreṇaiva nirmimīta ityatra daṇḍakāraṇyasṛṣṭirūdāhaṇamiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:815: duḥkhanivṛtti puruṣārtha eva svarūpato na bhavati sopādhitvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:816: sukhaṃ duḥkhābhāve satyeva bhavatīti sukhasādhanāntaravat duḥkhābhāvo 'pi mṛtyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:817: na nu sa eva puruṣasya samīhita iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:820: na tu vaiśeṣikī muktiṃ gautamo gantumicchati //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:824: bhojanādisukhe satyeva hi bubhukṣādiduḥkhaṃ nivartata iti duḥkhanivṛttyarthameva bhojanādisukhaṃ mṛgyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:825: na punastadeva tasya samīhitamiti kiṃ na kalpayate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:835: na hi viṣādijanyamohāvasthāyāṃ duḥkhanivṛttiriti tadarthaṃ prekṣāvantaḥ pravartante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:839: na hi mūrcchādyavasthārthaṃ pravṛtto dṛśyate sudhīḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:845: na hi paradāreṣu śāstraniṣedhāḍkuśanivāritāḥ prekṣāvanto na pravartanta iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:847: api tvalpīyaḥ sukhaṃ mahānanartha iti nivṛttiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:849: mahīyān pravartata iti na te pravartanta iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:850: iyameva hi prekṣā yat puruṣārthatve 'pi lokaśāstravirodhaparāmarśaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:853: tatra vyādhyādiparipīḍitāḥ prayāgavaṭaprapātānaśanādināpi dehaṃ tyajantaḥ prekṣāvanto dṛśyante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:854: na hi kaścid duḥkhanivṛttimanubhaviṣyāmīti tatsādhane pravartate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:858: ādyaścet, tuṣyatu durjanaḥ carame janmanyanubhūyata eva samādhiprabhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:864: tasmāt sarvadānanubhūyamānāpi yathā kaṇṭakādijanyaduḥkhanivṛttiḥ puruṣārthatayā puruṣaṃ prayojayati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:877: tathā sukhaśabalatayā duḥkhamapyupādeyaṃ kiṃ na syāt?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:882: yastu ghanataraduḥkhatimiranirantarāt saṃsārakāntārāt sukhakhadyotikāsu dyotamānāsvapi bibheti taṃ prati ayaṃ nirastatamaskatayā sugamo mārga upadiśyata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:885: tathā ca jagataḥ śamāyetyanena virodha ityata āha--avivekināmapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:886: yadyapi kasyacidapravṛttāvapi na sarvārthatā asya hīyata iti prapañcitamadhastāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:887: tathāpi heyaṃ heyatvenāgṛhṇanto mandāḥ kāruṇikeṇa grāhayitavyā ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:889: vairāgyācca śāstre pravṛttiriti durūttaramitaretarāśrayatvamityata āha--śāstre pravṛttīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:894: na hi kaścit sukhaṃ prāptumiva duḥkhamapyāptuṃ pravartate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:895: nāpi kaścit duḥkhahānāyeva sukhahānāyāpītyata āha--puruṣabhedo rāgavairāgyābhyāmiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:896: nanu sukhasya heyatvameva kuta ityata āha--prāptavyasyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:911: idaṃ śuklabhāsvararūpaṃ śuktikādravyaṃ na rajatamiti jñānamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:915: tadevaṃ paricchedadvāreṇa paricchedakamunnīyata iti paricchedasyaiva sāmānyaviśeṣayoḥ paricchedatvāparicchedatve darśite /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:922: tataśca saiva buddhiḥ svarūpāvasthitenārthena nirūpyamāṇā pramā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:929: evaṃ ca pravṛttisāmarthyāsāmarthyasaṃdehe 'pi yadi tajjanakamapramāṇamasamarthaiva sā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:938: nanu tasyā ityatra kathamanantaratvena prakṛtāmasamarthāṃ vihāya vyavahitvenāprakṛtāpi samarthaiva pravṛtti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:945: saṃdehādapi pravṛttestatra tatra darśanāt nirūcchvāsamākṣepamujjīvayati--na tāvaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:967: tatrāpyasau svahetubalādāyato na pravṛttiṃ prati prayojakaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:968: anyathaikāntikavijayāniścaye prāmāṇyākṣepaka eva vijigīṣuḥ kathāyāṃ na pravarteta //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:969: na hi jalpato vitaṇḍayato vā avaśyamaikāntiko vijayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:970: tasmādarthāniścaye 'pi pravṛttirityubhayavādisiddhaṃ hṛdi nidhāya siddhāntamupakramate--tatra brūma iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:974: te hi pramāṇatayā pravṛtteḥ prāgava niścīyante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:977: sa ca viṣayagocarastannāntarīyakārthagocaro vā tajjātīyatvāvadhāraṇopāyo yatra svarūpato 'pi nāsti tatra pravṛttisāmarthyādeva tadgocarasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:979: yatra tu svarūpābhyāso 'styeva tadgataṃ tu śreyaḥsādhanamabhyastam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:981: yathā angiḥ pākādisamartha iti saṃbhāvitāptatvasya vacanādupalabhya svayaṃ pacataḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:982: yatrāpi śreyaḥsādhanatve 'bhyāsaḥ svarūpe tvanabhyāsastatrāpi svarūpagocarasyaiva prāmāṇyaṃ pravṛttisāmarthyādavasīyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:987: tadamī saṃśayānā apipravartamānāḥ phala iva svarūpaśreyaḥsādhanatvayoriti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:997: tathāpi tajjātīyatvalakṣaṇenaiva liḍgena pravṛtteḥ prāgevāvadhārite prāmāṇye tatpramāturūttarakālaṃ pramitsaiva nāsti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1013: liḍgaṃ ca tasya prāmāṇyaikaniyatasya yadyasti tadā prāmāṇyameva tenānumīyatām,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1021: na hyayaṃ kvacidapi tajjātīyatvena prāmāṇyaṃ nānumitavāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1024: abhyāsadaśāpanneṣu tajjātīyatvena prāmāṇye 'numīyamāne pravṛttisāmarthyānumitaprāmāṇyasya sādhanavikalatayā dṛṣṭāntābhāsatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1026: satyam, tathāpi jñānasya viṣyanibandhanatvāt tattadviṣayopādhaya eva te te jñānopādhayastaistairūpādhibhirūpādhīyamānaṃ jñānameva tajjātīyaṃ tasya bhāvastattvaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1027: te copādhayaḥ pratibhedaṃ svasaṃjñābhirabhidhātumaśakyā iti tajjātīyatvamityanayā vācobhaḍgyā darśitāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1031: tatra dharmisvarūpeṇopadhīyamāno 'nubhavaḥ pramaiveti tena rūpeṇānubhūte tasmin pramātvamevānubhūtaṃ bhavatītyagre sphuṭībhaviṣyati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1035: tatra svarūpaprakāreṇopahitamanubhava vivektuṃ viśiṣṭāḥ prakāropādhayo bhavanti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1036: te ca niyamena vibhramaviṣayavirodhitayā nirdhāritasvabhāvabhedā guṇādaya eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1038: yadā tvapratyakṣe lakṣye lakṣaṇena jñānaṃ janyate tadānumānaṃ taditi tasyānyathaiva gatirbhaviṣyatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1043: karmaṇi tu avātulena tiṣṭhatā tīvravegāsaṃskṛtena calajjalādisvacchavilokanādivirahiṇā yad dravyaṃ calatītyupalabhyate tat tatheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1044: evaṃ teṣu teṣu viśeṣeṣu te te viśeṣā vyabhicāravirodhino na pratipadamanukramituṃ śakyante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1047: yatra tu sa evārtho bhūyo bhūyo 'bhyastaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1052: abhyāsadaśāpannatvaṃ punaretasya bhūyodarśanena mantrāyurvede tajjātīyatvāya prāmāṇyāvinābhāvasiddhiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1054: yathā ca prāmāṇyaṃ pravṛttisāmarthyenāvadhāryate anabhyāsadaśāpanneṣu tathāprāmāṇyamapi pravṛttiviparyayeṇa /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1066: atha phalajñānasyaiva prāmāṇyaṃ kathamavadhāraṇīyamityatra keṣāñcinmatamāha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1069: phalajñānaṃ hi phalasya siddhāvasthasya sādhanānarhatayā niṣprayojanībhūtatvād vā na parīkṣyet tattajjātīyajñānasya sarvāsvavasthāsu arthāvyabhicāritayā niḥśaṅkatvād veti?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1074: siddha eva hi phale parīkṣite tatsādhanasya tathātvasiddhāvuttarottarulābhisandhiḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1076: phalajñānasyāpi bhūyo bhūyaḥ spapnādyavasthāsu vyabhicāra darśanāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1077: svasthāvasthasya phalajñānaṃ na vyabhicaratīti cet--evaṃ tarhi pirīkṣitameva phalajñānaṃ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1078: tathā hi yat svasthāvasthasya phalajñānaṃ tadavyabhicārīti vyāptisiddhau yatraiva tathābhūtajñānatvaṃ paśyati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1080: asyāpyabhyāsadaśāpannatvaṃ prāmāṇyāvināmūtaliḍgopalambhastathā tajjātīyatvaṃ punaḥ svasthāvasthasya phalajñānatvameva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1082: nanu yadvijñāna dṛṣṭāntayitavyaṃ tasyāpi prāmāṇyaṃ kathaṃ sādhanīyam?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1083: evaṃ tattatsādhanasyāpi dṛṣṭāntaparamparāyāḥ kathamityata āha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1085: tajjātīyatvena liḍgena prāmāṇye sādhiyitavye yadyad dṛṣṭāntīkriyate tasya tasyeti mantavyam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1088: tathā ca pramāṇator'thapratipattipravṛttisāmarthyayoḥ kathamanāditvamāha--vārttikakāra ityata āha--eteṣu ca madhya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1090: yadyapi phalaṃ na pravṛttiviṣayastathāpi tatsādhanagocarāyāḥ tatsaṃtānagocarāyā eva
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1092: svasya narāntarasya vā pravṛttisāmarthyaṃ phalajñānasya draṣṭāvyam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1094: samarthya tadubhayopapattaye samānanyāyatayaiva āntarapratyakṣajñāneṣu madhye phalajñānaprāmāṇyaṃ samarthitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1097: tasya cānumānasamānanyāyatayā anumānaprāmāṇyasamarthanānantarameva samarthanaṃ kariṣyata ityabhiprāyavānāha--anumānasyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1099: sā ca vyāptipakṣadharmatāgrāhakaireva pramāṇairapanīyata iti bhavati nirastasamastavyabhicāraśaṅkamanumitijñānam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1100: tasyaivaṃbhūtasya svata eva prāmāṇyaṃ niścīyata iti śeṣaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1116: na tvavadhāraṇātmakatayeti na tayoḥ svataḥ prāmāṇyagrahaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1119: tadabhāve tvaviśeṣādavadhāraṇātmakatvaṃ paribhūya tadatadrūpasādhāraṇamevāvatiṣṭheta ityāśayavān niyāmakābhāvamevāha--pratyakṣajñānaṃ tviti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1129: etena śaḍkāmātramapanīyate jñānāntarairiti yaduktaṃ kaiścit tannirastam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1132: tathā ca jñānasvarūpagrāhiṇaḥ kauṇṭhye pratyakṣādyantarābhāve cānumānamevopāya iti tadāha--pravṛttisāmarthyamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1135: tathā ca liḍgaṃ niścitameva niścāyakamityanena nyāyena liṅgāntaraparamparājñānamanavasthāmavatārayatītyata āha--jñānagateti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1141: na ca śuktikākāre jñāne rajataṃ jānāmīti syāditi tadidamuktam--tādṛśasyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1143: sabāhyabhyantaraṃ dharmi mātragocaramapi pratyakṣaṃ svata eva pramāṇam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1151: santi hi tatrāpi yathāyogaṃ liṅgasādṛśyajñānasamutthatvādīni tajjātīyatvaliṅgāni tathāpi koṣṭhagatyā svata eva prāmāṇyagraho 'tra na svayamiti sa eva darśitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1152: vipratipannaṃ prati tu parata eva sādhanīyaṃ taditi paramārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1156: na hi phalayathārthatvamevāmīṣāṃ prāmāṇyamityata āha--sevadanasya ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1162: tathendriyādyapyarthavyabhicāriṇaṃ tathāvidhasahakāryupabṛṃhitaṃ tenārthena saṃbandhāt tadarthāvyabhicāri jñānaṃ janayedityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1165: tathā sati cānavasthāyā viṣayasaṃcāro na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1168: sāmānyato vā vipratipadyate jijñāsate vā tatra tatra prāmāṇyamuktenāpāyenāvadhāraṇīyamityato
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1170: nanvarthāniśvayenāpi pravartamāno na hi tatsādhanatāmanumāya pravartitumarhati arthitvābhāvāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1172: na ca so 'pi pravṛtti vineti tadavasthamevetaretarāśrayatvamityata āha--arthasyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1173: yadyapi prāmāṇyāniścayavadapekṣitopāyatvāniścayenāpi tatra tatra pravartate tathāpyapekṣitopāyatāṃ pākṣikīmapyurarīkṛtya pravṛttiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1180: nanu pramāṇasya prayojanavattvamākṣiptaṃ vā samādhīyeta jijñāsitaṃ vā jñāpyeta?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1182: na hyasti puruṣo yaḥ pramāṇaṃ niṣprayojanamiti brūyāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1184: yasya tu puruṣārtho nāsti sa nirūcchvāsa eva śīryeta /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1188: kiṃ nāma? śāstrārthaubhūtasya paramanyāyasya niḥśreyasaṃ prati gurupāyatve manyamānena laghīyati pravṛttyupāyaṃ vidyamāne śāstrārambha evākṣipyate
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1193: ādigrahaṇena tu tadupāyabhūtāḥ pravṛttayo yamaniyamāsanaprāṇāyāmadhāraṇālakṣaṇa gṛhyante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1199: śaḍkāmukvā bhāṣyamuttarayati--tatredamupaniṣṭhata iti tathāpi nyāyasya gurupāyatve na parihṛtam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1202: nanu ubhayorapi tulyatve kuto viśeṣāt pramāṇameva vyutpādyate na pravṛttiparītyata āha--tathāpīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1203: śravaṇamanananididhyāsanasākṣātkāralakṣaṇāyā pravṛtteḥ svarūpataḥ phalataśca pramāṇāntarbhūtatvāt tadvyutpādanameva pravṛttivyutpādanam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1204: na ca pravṛttivyutpādanena pramāṇaṃ vyutpāditaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1205: na hi pravṛtteḥ phalaṃ pramāṇaṃ tatsvarūpaṃ vetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1208: api tu nyāya ityata āha--sāmānyābhidhānaṃ ceti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1210: tat kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadarthaṃ lokavṛttamanūdyata ityataḥ prathama tātparyamanusmārayanneva vārttikamavatārayati--prāmāṇyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1211: apramāṇenetyatrāpi yadyapi vāñmanasavisaṃvādaḥ niṣedhavidhyupāya eva hi pramāṇam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1213: tathāpi vyāmohādapyupapatterevaṃbhūtābhiprāyasthairye 'pi nāsmākaṃ kācit kṣatirityetāvatā anujñaivāttaraṃ dattam--vāḍmanasayorvisaṃvāda iti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1215: tataḥ pramāṇenetyevaṃ vadato 'vaśyaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ manasi viparivartate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1222: kiṃ tarhi? tasyāvaśyābhyupeyatayā tadupāyo 'pyavaśyābhyupeya ityanenābhisandhinā sopāyameva tadanūdyata ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1223: āgāmibhāṣye heyādīnāṃ sphuṭatvāt tasyedānīmakṣarārtho vyākriyata iti mā śaḍkiṣṭhā ityāha--asyaiveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1226: amidheyānāṃ paurvāparyaniyamāya guṇapradhānabhāve jijñāsyamāne abhidhānarūpasya śāstrasya kaḥ prastāva ityata āha--śāstraśabda iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1227: evaṃ tarhi heyādīnāṃ śāstrārtharūpatayā na pṛthakkoṭitvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1228: tathā caikakoṭikatayā kimapekṣya guṇapradhānabhāvacintetyata āha-atra ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1229: kathaṃ punaranena pramāṇādicaturvargo 'tra labhyate iti vārttikamanuktopālabhbho mā bhūdityata āha--teneti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1237: jñānāt tu yasmāt tasya pramāṇāyattatvameveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1241: nanu pramātrādīnāmapi prayojanavattvādarthavadityanena kiṃ pramāṇasyādhikyamāhitamityata āha--atiśāyane matuciti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1244: ubhayamāpyanupapannamabhinnatvāt tathā hi ya evārthaḥ pramātā prameyaṃ pramitiriti sa eva heyo 'dhigantavya iti ya evārtho hānopāyāviti sa eva pramāṇamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1245: saṃśayādīnāmapi nyāyaparikaratayā nyāyaśarīratvāt tasya ca pramāṇatvāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1248: na hi bhavati tarūṇā vā vṛkṣeṇa vedaṃ sādhanīyaṃ tarūvṛkṣābhyāṃ vetyata āha--vivakṣābhedenati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1251: tathāpi yathā pramāṇtvena pramāṇaṃ jñeyaṃ tathā hānatvenāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1255: yathā ca svarūpeṇa saṃśayādayo jñeyāḥ pramāṇaparikaratayā tathā hānopāyatayāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1259: yathā ca śarīrādayo daśa prameyatayā jñeyāḥ tathā heyatayāpi,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1274: yathā ca buddhirbuddhitvena tathā tabhdedaḥ pramititayāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1278: tasmāt ta eva pramāṇādayaḥ ubhayathā jñāyantāmiti vivakṣitvobhayacaturvargopādānaṃ kṛtamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1286: adhigantavyamārogyamityataścaturṣu vaktavyeṣu ṣoḍaśapadārthavarṇanaṃ kkopayujyata iti tadāpi nirastam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1288: vivakṣābhedasya copapatti pratipadaṃ bhāṣyakāra eva darśayiṣyati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1296: pañcamyāḥ taseḥ prayogaṃ darśayitvā pañcamīvyatirekeṇa taseḥ ākṣepasamādhāne asaṃgate ityākṣepaṃ vyākhyāyāvatārayati--vacanavyāptyarthamiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1303: tathā sati vyāpārabhedo na syāditi jñāpanārthamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1305: evakāraḥ sādhakatamāntaraṃ vyavacchindan tasya vyāpāraṃ phalaṃ ca vyavacchinatti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1311: yadi tṛtīyayā karaṇatvamabhidhīyate kiṃ prakṛtisthena lyuṭpratyayena?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1316: prātipadikādeva sākṣātkaraṇatvamarthato hetutvaṃ gamyata iti kiṃ vibhaktivyāptyetyata āha--atra ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1317: na ca vācyaṃ karaṇabhāvenāpi pramāṇaphalayostādātmyaṃ pratiṣedddhuṃ śakyam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1324: cānuvādakatvaṃ śabdābhyāsasya prayojanavattāvyatirekeṇa sidhyatītyataḥ prayojanaṃ darśayati--pramākārakāntarebhya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1325: laukike tu prayoge saṃkhyābhidhānādvibhakteḥ sārthakatvaṃ draṣṭavyamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1327: agnyādiviśiṣṭe parvatādau pratyakṣānumānayoḥ saṃplavādityata āha--viśiṣṭo bhinna iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1335: nanu yadyapi pratyakṣaṃ na sāmānyarūpamavagāhate tathāpi yadyanumānamapi svalakṣaṇamavagāheta tata eva tāvatāpi saṃplavaḥ syādityata āha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1338: bhaviṣyati ca sāmānyamapi sattvādākārādhāyakamato 'pi saṃplavasiddhirityata āha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1341: tat kiṃ sāmānyasyāsattvāt svalakṣaṇe ca pratibandhagrahāsaṃbhavādanumānaṃ nirviṣayamevetyata āha--tadidamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1345: kathaṃ ca bādhitākāraṃ pramāṇatayā vyavahiyata ityata āha-tasmāditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1346: nanu pramāṇāntareṇa saha saṃplavo bhaviṣyatyanayorityata āha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1351: na hyasatā sāmānyena paramārthasat svalakṣaṇaṃ tadvad bhavitumarhati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1353: so 'yaṃ gahanaḥ panthā ityāśayavān āha--yathā caitaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1354: viśeṣa ityatra yadi karmakārakaṃ na ca
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1355: tatastadvannāmāparo 'stītyata āha--viśeṣa iti saṃplavamamṛṣyamāṇa idamāha mīmāṃsaha iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1361: na ca vācyaṃ smṛtisaṃtatiradhigatisaṃtatirvā astu vyavahārapravartinī na kaścidviśeṣa iti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1364: smṛtisaṃtateścāvaśyaṃbhāvitayā tata eva vyavahārisiddhāvadhigatisaṃtatikalpanāyāṃ kalpanāgauravaprasaṃgādityāśayavān piṣṭapeṣaṇamevopasaṃharati--adhigatamiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1365: nanu anyatheti vārttike yadi kāraṇagatamanyaprakāratvaṃ vivakṣitaṃ tadā kāraṇagataprakārabhede 'pi na kaścid viṣayagato viśeṣaḥ piṣṭapeṣaṇaparihāropayogī darśitaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1368: na ca viṣayābhede 'pi pramāṇabhedāt kaścit phalaprakārabhedaḥ prakṛtopayogavānastītyata āha--ayamabhisandhiriti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1406: eve tarhi vārttikārthaḥ ka ityata āha--sa eva ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1408: sa evānena kiṃ na pradarśyata ityata āha--yadyapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1414: evaṃ siddhaṃ pramāṇaṃ hṛdi kṛtvā saṃplavavyavasthe vicārite /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1417: yadi niścayo 'bhimataḥ syāt tasya nāvaśyaṃ saṃśayapūrvakatvamiti sandigdhasya praśna upapannaḥ syādata āha--avadhāryata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1418: tathā ca vicārasya parīkṣāyā avaśyaṃ saṃśayapūrvakatvādagre
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1425: tasmād yathaivācchinnaviṣayatayā vyāpriyamāṇaḥ paraśuḥ chedanaṃ tathā pramite viṣaye vyāpriyamāṇamindriyādikaṃ pramāṇamiti momāṃsakāḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1428: na hi pramāṇasyārthe pramātiriktamapi kiñcit kartavyamasti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1435: arthamapi tadeva vyavasthāpayati yadarthapratītiṃ tadīyatayā niyamayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1436: tathātvenāniyatāyāṃ tu tasyāṃ na kasyacit sā pratītiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1437: sarvasya veti nārthena niyatā pratītiḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1440: na hi cakṣuṣā janitatvādeva nīlasya nīlavijñānam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1443: tasmādarthākāra evabuddhigato buddhiṃ tadīyatā vyavasthāpannarthamapi tathā vyavasthāpayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1444: tataścārthavyavasthāpanahetutvāt sa eva pramāṇaṃ yadāha--arthasārūpyamasya pramāṇam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1452: vṛkṣādibhiḥ saṃyujyamāna eva hi paraśuḥ saṃyogena vyāpāreṇa karaṇamiti vyavahniyate loke /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1453: na ca saṃyogo nāma vigrahavānanyaḥ saṃyujyamānāt paraśorasti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1454: gamyagamakabhāvo 'pi svaprakāśe vijñāne bāhye ca vṛkṣe śiśapayā gamyamāne dṛṣṭa eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1455: na hi śiṃśapātaḥ kaścidanyo vṛkṣo nā vṛkṣād vā śiṃśāpā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1456: vaikalpike tu vyavahāre yathātra vyāvṛttibhedastathā ākāratadvatorapīti na kaścid viśeṣa iti sautrāntikāḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1469: bhāvapraśnavyākhyānena bhavitṛpraśno vyākhyāta iti tu sahetyaśyāhṛtya kecid vyācakṣate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1470: kecit tu bhāvapraśnavyākhyā boddhavyā anena bhavitṛpraśno vyākhyāta iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1471: anye tu bhavāpraśnavyākhyānena hetunā bhavitṛpraśno vyākhyāto bhāvapraśnaṃ vyākhyātuṃ bhavitṛpraśno vyākhyātaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1477: nanu sthāṇurvā puruṣo vetyatropadarśitayorantaraḥ prāpyata eva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1489: anāgate tu so 'pi nāstītyata āśaḍkitaṃ jñāpakatayeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1491: tasyāpi taramparayā arthakāryatvamarthajñāpakatvaṃ ca sākṣāt samānamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1497: tathā hi, na tāvad asya smṛtitvameva pravṛttinamittam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1502: nāpi pramātvaṃ nāma sāmānyaviśeṣaḥ samasti jñānagatasya sāmānyaviśeṣasya manomātragrāhyatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1504: kiṃ ca yadi pramātvaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣaḥ syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1505: tadā tadabhāvavati tadviruddhasāmānyavati vā viparyayajñāne na samaveyāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1506: tathā ca viparyayajñānaṃ dharmiṇyapi na pramāṇaṃ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1508: sāmānyaṃ ca sāmānyāntareṇa saha parāparabhāvena ekasyāṃ vyaktau samāviśet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1513: sākṣātkāritve ca yadi paraṃ tadā asākṣātkāravatyo 'numitiprabhṛtayo na pramāḥ syuḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1520: tenaivāyaṃ pramāṇaśabdo yathārthajñānamātre niyataḥ kṛta iti cet--na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1526: na hi yādṛśor'thaḥ smaryate yadā tādṛśa evāsau tadā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1539: nanvatītaḥ śyāma iti pratyayaḥ tatra yathārtha eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1546: yathā rajjuṃ bhujaṅgatayā anubhūya vidrutasya tathaiva smṛtiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1549: tasmādubhayathāpi smṛteranyasyānubhavatvaikaniyataṃ yathārthatvameva pramāpadasya pravṛttinimittaṃ loko 'vadhāritavān /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1550: kathamanyathā tatraiva pramāśabdaṃ prayuḍkte nānyatreti yadyapi,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1551: tathāpi dharmiṇyapi smṛteḥ pramāṇyaṃ mābhūdityāśayavān prāguktayuktikaṃ lokaprayogamavāśritavān /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1557: na hyasti saṃbhavo mīmāṃsakasyāpi yathārthānubhavo na ca prameti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1558: tallakṣaṇe tvasmākaṃ kuto vipratipattirityata āha--anadhigatārthagantṛtvaṃ ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1562: yadi na pratyakṣeṇānumānopadeśābhyāmapi anityeṣvapi prāyaśaḥ upalabdhānāmevopalambhācca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1566: bhūyastaṃmādiṣvanubhūyamāneṣu na kaścid guṇaprakāraḥ pratikṣaṇalabdhajanmāpavargaḥ paribhāvyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1569: na ca catuḥpañcakṣaṇāvasthāyinyapi tasminnekamevajñānaṃ janayitvendriyādikamudāsīnam anāgatakarmādijanma pratīkṣate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1570: tataśca sarvajanmāntaropalambhādanye taduttarakālapratyayā dhārayā vicchedena vā bhavanto na pramāṇaṃ syurityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1572: yadyapi svarūpasya prakārasya vā tathāvidhasya tādavasthyam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1574: na ca kramabhāvināmeka eva vartamānaḥ kālo viṣayaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1578: tasmāt pūrvapūrvajñānairanākalita eva vartamānor'tha uttarottarairavasīyata ityanadhigatārthatvameva tatrāpītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1580: na tāvat pratikṣaṇavartamānatvaṃ saugatavad vastunaḥ eva svarūpotpādaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1581: nāpi saṃkhyavad vasturūpasthairye 'pi pariṇatibheda eva mīmāṃsakaiḥ svīkriyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1589: tatra na tāvat pratīyamānastaṃmādisaṃsṛṣṭā upādhayaḥ saṃbhavantītyuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1593: na tāvat stambhādiṣu taditarasaṃsargiṇaḥ kṣaṇabhaḍgurāḥ kecanāvaśyaṃ tajjñānasaṃsargabhājo bhavanti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1596: yatra tu tadekajñānasaṃsargiṇa upādhayo na santi tatra dhārāvāhikabuddhīnāmapramāṇatvameva syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1597: tathāvidhā eva ca vicāraviṣayatvenābhipretā jñānāntaragocarā viṣayāntarasaṃsargiṇa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1598: upādhayo bhaviṣyantīti cet--evaṃ tarhi dhārāvahanabuddhayo na syureva iti lābhāya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1600: na khalu pramāṇāntareṇa indriyāntareṇa tenaiva vā taddharmiparityāgāddharmyantare anubhūyamāne vivakṣitaikaviṣayabuddhidhārasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1604: ata eva ghaṭo 'yaṃ ghaṭo 'yamiti buddhisahasrasyāpi na viṣayakṛtaṃ viśeṣamūpalabhāmahe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1622: anyathā yatra karaṇānāṃ samuccayastatra parasparāpekṣayā anatiśayitatvādakaraṇatvāpatteḥ karaṇānāṃ samuccayaḥ kvacidapi na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1627: na ca jñāte 'pi jñānāntarāsaṃbhavo yenātrāpyaphalatvādevākaraṇatvaṃ bhavet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1632: pravṛttiṃ prāptiṃ ca janayadeva vijñānaṃ pramā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1645: nanu tathāpi prathamādevāpekṣitasiddhaḥ puruṣasya kiṃ dvitīyādinetyata āha--puruṣeti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1654: na tāvat tadīyatayā niyatāṃ pratītaṃ janayan,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1663: atha nīlamahaṃ jānāmītyarthakarmakapratītyanuvyavasāya iti cet--tat kiṃ buddhāvaniścitāyāmevākāro niścitaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1667: paraṃ na tadīyatayeti cet--atha keyamarthākārādanyā tadīyatā nāma?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1671: api ca yā kriyā yatkaraṇaphalatvena vivakṣitā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1673: na hi chidāmajanayanto 'pi cakṣurādayastanniścāyakatāmātreṇa chedanatayā vayavahniyante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1674: api tu aniścāyayanto 'pi janayanta eva kuṭhārādayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1678: anyathā tu piribhāṣāṃ kurvatā loko 'pratipāditaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1700: na hi pramātṛvat tenāpi pramākaraṇamutpādyate vyāpāryate vetyata āha--prameyasya tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1703: tatra phalaviṣayatvamasya na karmatvaṃ prati prayojakam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1709: tatra karaṇasya vyāpāraviṣayatvābhāvāt vyāpāra eva na nirvahediti tannirvāha evāsya caritārthatvamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1727: tadanena kārakāntare 'caritārthasya hetutvameva karaṇatvamiti karaṇalakṣaṇaṃ darśayatā kartṛvyāpāragocaraḥ karaṇamityapi karaṇalakṣaṇaṃ sūcitam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1730: akaraṇā pramāṇotpattiḥ prasajyeta kartuḥ karaṇe caritārthatvāditi kiṃ kena saṃgatamityata āha--nākaraṇa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1733: ityāśayavataḥ samādhānam--na pācakaśabdādivadityādinā iti ṭīkāyāṃ vikṣiptasya vārttikatātparyasya saṃkṣepaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1734: tulyavaditi tulayā saṃmitamiva na nyūnaṃ nātiriktaṃ vetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1735: tadanena prapajcena pramāṃ pramātṛprameyayorakāraṇatvameva darśitamati bhramo mā bhūdityupasaṃhāravyājenāha--tatpramāṇamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1746: na tu vaidharmyamātramatiśaya ityabhisaṃdhāyānyayogavyavacchedo 'pi darśitaḥ ayogānyayogavyavacchedābhyāmiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1748: nanu yathā kartrādau sati phalaṃ nāvaśyakam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1752: na hi paraśau sati chidā bhavetyevetyata āha--pramātṛprameye hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1766: tathāpi paramparāvyāpāryeṇāpi karmaṇā vyabhiyāro mā bhūdityāśaḍkya prakṛte 'vadhāraṇaṃ saṃbhavaprācuryāt kṛtam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1782: pramāṃ prati kāraṇānā sādhāraṇatvāsādhāraṇatve nirūpyamāṇe puruṣaviṣayasya sādhāraṇyasya kimāyātamityata āha--aśeṣa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1789: tadebhirnimittaiḥ karaṇavyavahāre vyavasthāpyamāne yadi karmādivyavahāranimittasamāveśāt tadvyavahāro 'pi bhavati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1795: teṣāṃ ca nimittānāṃ bheda eveti nātiprasaṃgaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1797: evaṃ ca satyagre arthyata iti vyutpattirapi tātparyaparatayaiveti manatavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1802: tat kiṃ pravṛttisāmarthyābhāvādapramāṇameva tadityata āha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1804: na tāvat sarvo viṣayaḥ sarvatra sarvasya sarvadopakṣaṇīyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1806: tathā cānupekṣaṇīyatādaśāyāṃ pravṛttisāmarthyena tadviṣayasya jñānasya prāmāṇyamavadhārya gṛhītena tajjātīyatvenopekṣaṇīyatādaśāyamapi prāmāṇyaṃ sugrahameva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1807: yatrāpyāhatya pravṛttirna bhūtā tatrāpyasaṃbhavadvādhasaṃvāditvaṃ prātyakṣikamānumānikamaupadeśikaṃ vā tajjātīyatvamavaseyamityakṣarārthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1809: sākṣāt janakatvaṃ gṛhītvā vyadhikāraṇatvaśaḍkā mā bhūdityavaśyaṃ darśanīyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1811: kathamayamartho vārttikāllabhyate ityata āha--pramāṇasya viśeṣa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1813: nanu tavāyamāśayo na tu vārttikakṛta ityata āha--tadidamuktamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1822: tathāpi tadabhyupagame vyāghāta eva sphuṭa iti sa evoktaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1823: sa ca śāstrāvatāreṇa yadi hyapavargaḥ sukhaduḥkhataddhetutayā heyaḥ svīkṛtaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1829: pramāṇaṃ tu pramāṇāntareṇa heyaṃ sadanavasthāṃ sāvakāśayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1830: tataśca saiva pramāṇavyaktiḥ tenaiva pramāṇena hātavyā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1833: tasmādubhayathāpi svātmani kriyāvirodhena paramapuruṣārthahetutvena ca pramāṇaṃ na śakayahānam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1842: tator'thaśabdena viṣayo 'bhidhīyamānaḥ tathāvidha eva vaktavyo 'taḥ prakaraṇaviśeṣaniyama evādhikāra itayarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1843: ekadeśyupālambhe pūrvahetubhiḥ saha hetvantarasya samuccayaṃ darśayannāha--na kevalamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1846: tadabhāve vā kathaṃ sattvavyavahāra ityata āha--na tāvaditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1847: anavasthāprasaṅgalakṣaṇaṃ tarkaṃ darśayatā tadviparyaye mānasameva pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamādarśitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1854: avaśyaṃ vā vijñāsyeta tadā jñānaparamparālakṣaṇā anasthā syāt / sā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1857: bhāṣyagrantheneti vadatā na kevalamarthavirodhaḥ granthavirodhaścetyapi pratipāditaṃ draṣṭavyam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1859: nanvarthaśabdasya prayojanavattave 'pi virodhavyadhikaraṇatve tadavasthe evetyata āha--candanādīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1861: atha kimabhipretyāprastutameva bhāṣyakṛto idaṃ prastūyata ityata āha--evaṃ kileti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1862: na pramāṇaprayojanaṃ bhavitumarhantīti pramāṇasya bhūtārthatvādita bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1863: tathā ca pramāṇadīnāṃ śakyājñānatve 'pi tadvyutpādakaṃ śāstramanārambhaṇīyameva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1866: sarvasādhāraṇanīlādivaidharmyeṇa hi kālpanikatvaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvasya vyutpādayatā nīlādi paramārthikameva svīkartavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1868: na ca kāryakāraṇabhāvasyāpāramārthikatve nīlādi pāramārthikaṃ bhavitumarhati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1875: tatsvabhāvatvāditi yadi tadotpatterārabhya kuryādaviśeṣat tatrāha--nivedayiṣyate hīti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1881: aniyataḥ candanāt sukhameva kaṇṭakād duḥkhameveti niyamarahitaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1889: yathā keṣucit kāladeśāvasthāsahakāriṣu satsu meghāḥ salilamudvamanti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1890: keṣucit tu satsu ta eva salilaṃ pibanti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1891: tathā candanādayo 'pi keṣucit satsu sukhamupajanayanti keṣucicca duḥkhamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1893: nanvarthavati ca pramāṇe pramātrādīnyarthavanti bhavanti jñāyanta
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1904: yadyapi tatsamavāyaḥ pramāsamavāyaḥ pramātṛtvamiti prakṛtopayogi syādeva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1905: tathāpi vārttikakṛtā praśnopalakṣaṇābhyāṃ khātantryamupakrāntam--sāmānyanyāyena viśeṣo 'pi labhyata ityabhisandhāyātastathaivavyācaṣṭai--kārakāmidhāneneti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1908: tena pacatītyādau sarvatrātiraścīnapākādivyāpāravato devadattādereva kartṛtvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1909: pācayatītyādau tu prayojyavyāpārapratītāvapi tasyānyatiraścīnatvāt na tadvataḥ kartṛtvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1918: pradhānakriyāpekṣayā ityetadeva kuta ityata āha-- avāntareti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1920: asti hi kāñcit kriyāmuddeśya pravartamānānāṃ kārakāṇāmavāntaravyāpārayogaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1922: nanu na sarvo vyāpāraḥ pradhānakriyā vā puruṣamāśrayate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1923: tat kathamāha--puruṣa itītyata āha--puruṣa iti prakṛtāpekṣam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1935: etena sa cāsau prayoktā ceti vā tasya cetanasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1936: prayoktṛtvaṃ dharma iti vā vigraha ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1939: etāvataiva lakṣaṇe parisamāpte itarāprayojyatvamityanena cetanaprayukti prati svātantryamitareṣāṃ vyavacchindatā parasparaprayojanakatvamapi vyavacchinnam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1941: tathā ca yathā kāryaṃ kartradhīnaṃ tathā kārakāntarādhīnamityubhayavyāptāt kāryādekatarāpāye 'pyanyatarāpāya iti darśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1943: acetaneṣu tu kartṛvyavahāraḥ kathamityavaśiṣyate tatrāha--acetanasya tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1945: tattvaṃ hi pramāṇavyāpyatvaṃ pramāṇavyāpāraviṣayatvamiti vadataḥ karaṇavyāpāraviṣayaḥ karmeti karmalakṣaṇa saṃmatam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1947: prakṛte ca pradhānavyāpāraḥ pramitilakṣaṇa iti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1949: anena vārttikasthasya viniyogasya viṣayaniṣṭhatvaṃ darśayatā yogyatāpi viṣayagataiva draṣṭavyetyapi darśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1952: tenāyamarthaḥ viniyogo vārthagatastadyogyatājñānaṃ vā caturvargasya paryavasānamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1977: tacced bhavadabhimate abhāve 'pyasti so 'pi sadvyavahāraviśayaḥ prasakta iti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1985: asaditi vā vyavahniyate na ca nāstipratyayaviṣayaḥ iti prakāraṇārthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1993: na hi nīlaniṣadhe pītādividhiravaśyamityata āha--nīlapītau hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1996: santyeva hi kecid vādino ye vipakṣadaṇḍamapaśyantaḥ pratyakṣaparikalitamapahnutya śaḍakāmutthāpayanti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:1997: tān sāṃkhyādīn prati ayaṃ prakāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2004: pāratantryeṇa pratibhāsanāt nocyanta iti kkopayujyata ityata āha--niṣedhyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2007: tadidamuktaṃ gamyanta iti nāktā ityartha iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2009: tarhi prameyādayo 'pi pramāṇapratipādanenaiva pratipāditā iti kiṃ tatkathanenāpi?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2011: hanatāsadbhedā api upayuktāstathā kiṃ netyata āha--atha veti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2012: nanu bhāvaprapañcavadabhāvaprapañce 'pyuddiṣṭo veditavya iti pratijñāter'the caturvargānantarbhāvāditi heturbhāgāsiddho viruddhaścetyata āha-niḥśreyaseti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2014: tadadhikāraṇatayā tathābhūta eva bhāvaprapañco dṛṣṭānto nocyata iti sādhyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2018: ata evoddiṣṭo veditavya iti anupalabdhibādhitaṃ manyamāna uttaragranthamavatārayati--atheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2026: saṃśayasya jñānarūpatvādasadrūpatā na saṃbhavatīti tamullaḍghyātidiśati--evaṃ prayojaneti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2030: asmākaṃ ca yathā bhābhāvastamaḥ [vai. sū. 5.2.19] ityevamādiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2042: tat kataradatra pāramārthikamityata āha--dvitīye tu kalpe pāramārthikaṃ iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2044: sacca khalu ṣāḍaśadhā vyūḍhamupadekṣyata iti tātparyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2056: tatrāpi sādharmyavaidharmyavipratipattijanyānāṃ saṃśayānāṃ parasparanirapekṣāṇāmeva nyāyapravartakatvamiti tātparyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2061: avayavānāṃ tu yadyapyekasmin vākyārthe pratipādayitavye mithaḥ sāpekṣatvam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2065: yatra tu nirdeśo nāsti tatra lakṣaṇe yathāvacanaṃ vigrahaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2068: arthaśabdaḥ pradhānakriyāvacano na kvacid dṛṣṭa itya āha--yaduddeśeneti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2069: kārakāṇāmavivakṣetyetāvataiva susthe pradhānakriyāyā avivakṣā kimarthamityata āha--kārakagrahaṇeti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2070: nanu kārakāṇāmavivakṣā śeṣalakṣaṇa tadā syād yadi tatra kārakatvaṃ saṃbhavet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2076: tasyāsvatantratvāt pramāṇādayo gamyanta iti kiṃ kena saṃgatamata āha--bhāvasyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2077: na pramāṇādimātramucyate tattvaśabdena atha ca nārthāntaraṃ tattvamiti parasparavyāhatamityata ekadeśinaṃ kiñciduddīpayati--abhede 'pītīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2078: anāropitarūpeṇa svarūpataḥ pratīyantāṃ pramāṇādaya ityetadarthamanatiriktārthamapi tattvagrahaṇaṃ kṛtamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2080: vyavahāragativastugatyoḥ samānayogakṣematvaṃ manyamāno hyabhāvamapahnotuṃ na śaknotyeva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2087: na hi tadasmānna siddhyatītyata āha--etaduktaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2106: ātmanyeva ca santuṣṭastasya kāryaṃ na vidyate //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2124: anumānamevātrārthe pramāṇamiti vipratipannaṃ pratipipādayiṣatāmiti śeṣaḥ upaniṣadāpi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2127: santānānumānasya ca pṛthagupadeśācca prameyasya pramāṇādibhyaḥ prathamasūtre etadvivaraṇādvacavacchetturagranthamevāvatārayati--yadi ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2134: tat kathaṃ tatrānūdyata ityata āha-- niḥśreyaseti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2140: tadabhiprāyaṃ tena taccaitaduttarasūtreṇānūdyate ityasyānuvādānantaramavyākhyāne 'pi na doṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2141: evaṃ cārthaṃ dvitīyasūtra ityādinā pūrvameva vyākhyātatvāt tu nehedaṃ vyākhyātamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2142: nanu dveṣaḥ kiheya eva na vā pravṛttiheturityata āha--upalakṣaṇamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2144: tat kathaṃ tattvajñānamityucyata ityata āha--hīyate hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2149: arthapadānīti bhāṣyagatasyārthapadasya tvanyathārtho bhaviṣyatīti yaduktaṃ tadāha--puruṣārthasthānānīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2152: prasthānaṃ prakāra itthambhāvaḥ tathā cetthambhūtatvādānvīkṣikyā iti yadyapyabhimatameva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2153: tathāpi nirūpapattika itthambhāvaḥ syādityata āha--prasthānaṃ vyāpāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2155: pratyayārthastu saṃśayādibhiḥ padārthaiḥ pṛthak prasthāpyate iti vadatā bhāṣyakāreṇaiva darśitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2157: nyāvyutpādane vyāpāravattayā hi iyamānvīkṣikī vidyāntarād bhidyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2159: tato 'syāḥ saṃśayādayo 'pi viṣayabhūtāḥ tānantareṇa nirviṣayatayā vidyaiva na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2162: na hyanyā vidyāḥ svaṃ svamarthaṃ pratipādayantyo 'pi kathametadityaśraddhāmalamapanetumīśate vinaināmānvīkṣikīmityāśayavān pariharati--etasyā eveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2166: nāpi pramāṇapravṛttiviṣaya upalabdho bhavannirṇota eva bhavedityata ākṣepturabhiprāyantaraṃ darśayati--pañcarūpa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2169: anumānaṃ tu yathā nājñāte tathā asaṃdigdhe 'pi tasmādasyānyaiva rītirityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2174: na tu tādātmyamityabhipretya parihāraṃ vivṛṇoti--sāmānya viśeṣayoriti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2175: saṃdigdhe pravartave ityasya yogyatāparatāṃ darśayati-asaṃdigdha iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2181: nanu kiṃ punaḥ prayojanamiti praśne yena prayuktaḥ pravartata ityuttaraṃ vaiyātyādityata āha--sphuṭataramevaitaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2184: na cāparitoṣabījamupalabhāmaha ityatastadvījaṃ praśnapūrvakameva tāvad darśayati--tatreti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2186: tathā ca dharmādiviṣayastātsādhanaviṣayo vā kāmastatrāpi pravartaka ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2194: na hi dharmādiṣu dharmatvādikameva pravṛttiṃ prati prayojakam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2197: nanu yathāśrute ko doṣo yena viṣayeṇa viṣayiṇaṃ pratyayamupalakṣayatīti vyākhyetyata āha--asatyoriti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2201: iha phalajñānamanyatra pravartavat tatsādhana eva pravartayatīti ato nātiprasaṅga ityevaṃ yadyapi śaṅkitumucitam, tathāpi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2212: etadeva ca tasya sākṣātpravartakatvaṃ yat sākṣāt prayatnajananasamarthāmicchāṃ prasūte /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2214: uddeśyajñānaṃ tu tadviṣayāmicchāṃ janayat tathābhūtatatsādhanajñānajananadvāreṇa ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2216: nanu parīkṣāśabdasya vicāraṇārthatve prayojanāpekṣitvaṃ kadācid yujyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2217: sa cet nyāyārthastasya ca vyutpattibalena pramāṇamātramarthaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2218: tasya ca na prayojanāpakṣeti sarvaṃ samākulamityākṣepāvatāraṭīkārthāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2225: atha yathā pramāṇamūlairavayavairliḍgāṃ pratipādyate tathānumeyameva kiṃ netyata āha--na tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2229: tathā cārthasya liṅgasya parīkṣādhigatirna pramāṇphalaṃ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2232: na sākṣādityādinā liṅgādhigatāvavayavānāṃ svātantryaṃ nirākurvatā adhigaterapramāṇaphalatvamapāstam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2234: pramāṇatvāviśeṣai'pi tasyaiva vipratipannapuruṣapratipādakatvaṃ nānyasyetyatrāpi hetuṃ paraḥ prakṣyatītyatastathaivāha--samasteti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2235: tadayaṃ vārtikārthaḥ so 'yamitthaṃbhūtasamastapramāṇopakaraṇātmā yatastasmāda vipratipannapuruṣapratipādakaḥ tataśrva parama iti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2248: sa cātra pratyakṣeṇa sphuṭatara eveti kimartha praśnaḥ kaḥ punarityata āha--idamatreti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2254: nanu yadi rūpatrayasaṃpattireva avinābhāvaḥ tadā kathaṃ bādhayā saha saṃbhavaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2257: ato na ca sapakṣetyādiśaḍkā na niravakāśā bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2258: yatredaṃ tatredamityākāreṇa pakṣasyāpi sādhanavataḥ sādharmyavattāpratītiḥ sarvopasaṃhāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2259: ayaṃ ca yatra nedaṃ sādhyamasti tatrāpyetat sādhanamabhimatamastītyetāvanmātreṇaiva bhajyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2260: eṣa ca vyabhicāraprakāraḥ pakṣe 'pi na nivārayituṃ śakya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2261: na bādhasya svātantryeṇa dūṣaṇatvaṃ vyabhicārāt pakṣadharmatāvirahiṇi tadabhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2265: anumānāviṣaye prayoga iti yathāśrute vārttike parābhimatamapakṣadharmatvameva sphuṭamapakṣasyaivānumānāviṣayatvāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2274: nanu kṛtakasya tejaso baddhau viparivartānatve yo yaḥ kṛtakaḥ sarvo 'nuṣṇa iti sarvopasaṃhāro na saṃbhavatyeva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2276: na hi yadyatra na sphurati tadapi tasya viṣaya ityata āha--sāmānyena yo yaḥ kṛtaka iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2278: na tu viśeṣākāreṇa vyāptigrahaṇaviṣayatāmagniragādityata āha--na tu nirvimajya viśeṣato jñātvā tejo 'vayavini eva saṃbandho 'vadhārita ityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2279: atha sāmānyākāreṇāpi tejo 'vayavinaḥ kimityavakāśo deyo yāvatā pṛthivyādāveva vyāptiravadhāryatāmityata āha--na hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2280: na hi samānyākāreṇa vyāptaugṛhyamāṇāyāṃ pratyakṣabādhāt prāgeva tejo 'vayaviparityāge kācidupapattirasti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2282: tathā ca na kevalaṃ sa eva na dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2283: pṛthivyādayo 'pi kecinna dṛṣṭā eveti te 'pi parityājyāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2285: adṛṣṭeṣu vyabhicārāśaṅkayā na vetyubhayathāpi sarvānumānocchedaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2286: svayameva paraḥ pakṣaṃ gṛhṇātvityabhisandhinā sukumāraprakāramāha--na tāvaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2287: na hi vyāptyanapavāde vyabhicārāvakāśaḥ samastīti hṛdayam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2293: tatpratirodhaṃ tu viparītapratyakṣaṃ na cet karoti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2296: sa nodbhāvya iti kasyāyaṃ daṇḍa ityata āha--anyatheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2297: na na pakṣadharmatāmaparibhūya pratyakṣeṇa vyabhicāraḥ śakyagrahaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2298: na hyasti saṃbhavaḥ saṃdigdhasādhyadharmā dharmo tadviraheṇa nirṇotaśceti śūnyahṛdayaṃ prati tu pratibandirityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2303: anyathā viparītapramāṇapravṛttāvapi yadi sādhakaṃ na nivartate tadā tadāyattaṃ sādhyamapi na nivarteta,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2304: tadanivṛttau tu na pakṣatvakṣatiriti na vyabhicārāvakāśa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2307: nanu yadi nāmānumānanivṛtteḥ pūrvamapakṣadharmatvaṃ vyabhicāro boddhārayituṃ na śakyastathāpi taduttarakālaṃ tāvacchākyata eva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2315: na hi mṛto 'pi māryata iti siddhāntasaṃkṣepaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2316: nanvaśrāvaṇaḥ śabda ityevaṃ bruvāṇaḥ kathaṃ śabdāsattvamabhipreyāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2320: tasmādabhiprāyaḥ parasya niyantuṃ na śakyata ityata āha--na hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2337: tadihobhayathāpi saḍketabalādanvayayogyatābalād vā na naḥ śabdapadena saṃbandha iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2341: śrūyamāṇo hyartho yena vinā nopapadyate sa tenākṣipyamāṇor'thād āpadyata ityucyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2347: tathā ca nāsattvādhikaraṇatvayorvirodha ityata āha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2357: sa eva naraśīrṣamaṃpasaṃdadhāra iti viparitaiva śrutiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2365: kutaḥ punarasya nirghṛṇasya kapālaśaucābhimāna ityata āha--avigītā hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2368: na ca vācyaṃ sārvatriko vyavahāraḥ pramāṇam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2373: atha śreyohetutaivāsyāḥ kuto nāvasīyata ityata āha--na khalviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2378: kimuktaṃ bhavati śucītyanena punaruktatāṃ pariharannāha--api ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2387: na hi pūrvapravṛttena yadeva tadeva bādhyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2392: svasādhakena bādhitaṃ tu yathaikasantatipatitāni jñānāni ekapratipattṛvirahe 'pi pratisandhānayogyāni kāryakāraṇabhāvādityapi draṣṭavyam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2401: tat kimidānīṃ satpratipakṣatā nāstyevetyata āha--na hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2411: nanu yathā agṛhyamāṇaviśeṣāvasthāyāmanumānayoḥ satpratipakṣatvaṃ tathā pratyakṣānumānayorapyastu tataḥ kva bādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2421: na hyananyathāsiddhaṃ tattvena bādhituṃ śakyate aviśeṣāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2425: na ca yatra pratyakṣamanyathāsiddhaṃ tatrānumānenāvaśyamanyathāsiddhena bhavitavyam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2437: anyaprakāravyavasthāpanaṃ ca viṣayasekocamātreṇa na bādhakaṃ vinā bhrāntatvenāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2443: tadā tathābhūtau pratyakṣāgamāvevābādhitau satpratipakṣitau vā syātām /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2445: tasamād yathā tābhyāmanumānamapanudyate tathā tadutthāpitaphalaśarīreṇopamānenāpīti ṭīko pabṛṃhitasya vārttikasyārthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2447: vādajalpau saprayojanāvityādibhāṣye yadyapi prayojanamaṅgatayā śrūyate tathāpyaḍgi pratyetavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2450: vitaṇḍāṃ tu vyāpnoti na veti cintyata iti vivaraṇārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2452: tayoreva tu prayojanavattvaṃ kena bhāṣyeṇa pratipāditamityata āha--tatra śabdārthamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2455: sa ca vyavahāro hetvābhāsebhyo hetovivecanalakṣaṇo 'vāntaraprayojanamapi asādhāraṇatayeha tatraśabdena bhāṣyakārasya vivakṣitamatastadeva vārttikakṛtā vyākhyātamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2456: nanu tathāpi tatra nyāye vivecayitavye iti yuktaṃ ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2457: na hi nyāyābhāsa eva viveka pradhānamityata āha--nyāyāmāsa iti tu sannidhānāditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2463: yadyapi parapakṣadūṣaṇenāpi prayojanena vitaṇḍāyāḥ saprayojanatva siddhacati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2466: yadi ca parapakṣadūṣaṇamapi nādhikuryāt tadā vaitaṇḍika eva na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2467: tathāpyetadeva svayaṃ kiñcidapyanabhyupagacchato na syādityataḥ pāriśeṣyādapi svapakṣasiddhim abhisaṃdadhānasyaiva pravṛttiryuktetyāśayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2474: anena hi parapakṣo nāmyupagamyate na punaḥ parapakṣapratiṣedho 'bhyupagamyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2484: tathā sati prativādivacanārthaḥ pratītaścedabhyupagataḥ syādita matānujñā nigrahasthānam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2500: nanvanumānāt ko 'paro nyāyo yenānumānāśrayatāmuktvāpi nyāyāśrayatāṃ dṛṣṭāntasya pṛthagāha bhāṣyakāraḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2509: evaṃ ca satyanumānanimittatvāt pakṣasyāpi pṛthagabhidhānaṃ syāditi na codyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2516: yattu tatpramāṇye tadviṣayagocarānumānābhiprāyeṇa dṛṣṭāntāpekṣā āgamasyāpyastīti kaiścid vyākhyātaṃ tat pūrvaṃ jñātaṃ cārthaṃ parasmā ācaṣṭa iti vadatā vārtikakṛtaiva apāstam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2523: vyavasthāśabdo na puruṣaviśeṣe abhyupagamaniyamamāha--kiṃ tarhyanabhyupagamasamuccayaṃ nirākurvan svarūpaniyamamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2526: nanu yata eva sarvatantrasiddhānta na vipratipattiviṣayaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2535: sādhyasāmānyavyāptaṃ sādhānasāmānyamiti sādhanaviśeṣāt sādhyaviśeṣaḥ kathaṃ gamyeteti yojanā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2537: adhikaraṇasiddhāntena hi phalena viṣayeṇa vā pakṣadharmatā phalavatī viṣayavatī vā syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2538: tadabhāve tu sā niṣphalā nirviṣayā vā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2539: tathā ca vyāptirapi sāmānyaviṣayā satī kevalā sāmānyamātramupanīya pakṣe kathaṃ vyavasthāpayet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2544: tasmādadhikaraṇasiddhānto 'pi pakṣadharmatāphalaviṣayatayā avaśyaṃ vyutpādanīyo yena vyāptirapi tatsahāyā satī phalavatī syāditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2555: tathāpi na samūho vyutpādita ityata āha--tadaneneti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2556: nanu viśeṣapratyayahetavo 'vākyabhūtā api santīti anenābhiprāyeṇa pṛcchati--ka iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2557: pratyayasya prādhānyaṃ nirākurvanneva pratyayapadopādānaprayojanamāha--na ca taditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2561: tathā sati smaryetāpi kathamityata āha--na hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2562: tathāpyevaṃbhūtasyāpi tadasya smṛtiranubhūtimantareṇa na syādityata āha--saṃbhavanti tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2563: astu tarhi tadanubhava evārthapratītyaṅgamityata āha--na caita iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2568: yadi tu varṇānāṃ nirantarotpādavatāṃ nirantarā evānubhavāstadā vinaśyadavinaśyadavasthayoḥ upāntyāntyānubhavayoreva sahabhāvaḥ śaṅganīyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2571: kāraṇasamuccayavaśād viṣayāsamuccayavataḥ pratyayasya svarūpasamuccayaṃ parasvīkṛtaṃ śaṅkate--na ca pūrveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2574: tathāpi na yaḥ kaścit pratyayaḥ tasya sahakārī,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2580: tathā caikapraghaṭṭakenāpi vicitrajñānena viṣayīkṛto varṇāḥ khaṇḍaśaḥ padabhāvena pratisandheyāḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2586: sa eva padapratisandhānotpādātmā samayasaṃskārodbodhaḥ saṃbandhasmaraṇasyotpadyamānatā saṃskārodbodhād vicitrapratyayasya vinaśyattetyekaḥ kālaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2587: atha saṃbandhasmaraṇotpādaḥ vicitrapratyayasya vināśaḥ padatvānusaṃdhānasya vinaśyattetyekaḥ kālaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2595: tathā ca pūrvavarṇāṇāmunabhūtatvena padatvānusaṃdhānasaṃbhave 'pi antyavarṇasyānanubhūtatayā nāntyapadapratisaṃdhānasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2599: yadā padārthapratyāyane 'nubhavo na kāraṇamiti tadaupayikasmṛtyutpattau tu kāraṇameveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2601: prakaraṇādayastu yogyatāviśeṣatvāt tatraivāntarbhūtā iti tata eva vākyārthapratīterūpapatteḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2604: kiṃ tu padāni krameṇāpi nānubhūtānītyata uktam--nirantareti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2609: nanu pratyekaṃ vyabhicāre hi parasparānugrahaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2610: na ca padakadambakapratisaṃdhānavat tadarthasmṛtirapi tathāvidhāṃ vākyārthapratyayotpatti prati vyabhicaratītyata āha--etaduktaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2612: na tāvat tadārthā eva vākyārthe pramāṇam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2618: vākyārthapratītyupayoge tu teṣāṃ kathaṃ na taddhetutvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2625: tathā ca vyāpārāvyabhicāramādāya nirvyāpārāvasthāyā vyabhicāravatāmakāraṇatvābhyupagamo bahuvyākulayatīti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2629: na hi pratijñāvacanaṃ niśvāyakaṃ viśiṣṭasyeti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2641: saprayojanaśca bhavati niḥśreyasena prayojanena prayojanavāṃśca jñāto bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2645: tat khalu hetuvacanamanumānapratipādakaṃ parāmṛśyamānaliṅgapratipādakaṃ yadi syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2647: na ca tasya parāmṛśyamānaṃ liṅga viṣaya iti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2648: nanu yadeva dṛśyamānaṃ liḍgaṃ hetuvacanasya viṣayaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2653: dvitīyadaśanaviṣayaliḍgaṃ pratipādakaṃ na parāmṛśyamānaṃ liḍgaṃ pratipādakamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2663: nanu pratyakṣaviṣayasya smṛtitaḥ punarūpadarśanāditi vaktavye kuto viparītamabhihitamityata āha--yatreti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2665: tathāpyudāharaṇakāle tayāsmṛtyārūḍha eva vyāpriyata ityetāvatā tathaivoktamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2668: pratyakṣamapi hi vipratipatti paribhūya vyāptiviṣayatayā dṛṣṭāntaṃ smārayati--tadvacanamapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2675: na ca tatra catuṣṭavijātīyaṃ pramāṇamastītyatastadvyākhyānāt pūrvameva paramatvopapādanāya samastapramāṇaviniveśanamāha---so 'yamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2677: adhyāropo viniveśanaṃ vā bhrāntirvā na saṃbhavatītyata āha--adhyāropa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2680: tadanena kiṃ punaḥ samarthyamiti pṛcchato 'bhisandhiḥ darśitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2692: syonaṃ te sadanaṃ kṛṇomi ghutasya dhārayā suśevaṃ kalpayāmi ityādi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2697: nanu yadi vipratipannaḥ vākyenaiva paraḥ pratibodhayituṃ śakyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2698: atha vākye tadarthe vā vipratipadyamānaḥ kenopāyena bodhanīyaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2708: tatra viśeṣaḥ ka ityata uktama--dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmoti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2709: vākyāddhi sādhanadharmaviśiṣṭo dharmo sākṣāt pratīyate sādhyarūpadharmaviśiṣṭastu taddvāretyubhayamapi vivakṣitvā saṃmugdhamuktamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2710: nanu pramāṇāntaratve 'pi tarkasya pramāṇapadena saṃgraha eva sāmānyena viśeṣasya saṃkalanāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2713: ata āha--pramāṇapadena hīti dṛṣṭo hi sāmānyaśabdenāpi kasyacidasaṃgrahaḥ kutaścit kāraṇādityabhisandhiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2714: ata eva pramāṇāntaratvaśaḍkāyāṃ saṃgṛhītebhyo viśeṣebhyo 'nyatvamuktvā prameyaṃ dṛṣṭāntatvenopāttam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2721: tarko hi pramārūpaṃ vā pramāṇaṃ syāt liṅgadarśanavat,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2730: tadviparyayasya tu tena saha svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho 'sti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2732: na hi viparyayāparyavasitaṃ kvacidapi kṛtārthaṃ prasaṅgamīkṣāmahe //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2733: nanvevaṃ tarhi pramāṇasyāpi kevalasya na kvacidapi kṛtārthatvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2734: tathā ca sati prasaṅgatadviparyayapiṇḍa eva pramāṇyaṃ paryavasyet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2746: nanu bhavatīti pramāṇavyāpārāt prāgeva yadi niścitam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2747: tadā tarkaḥ pramāṇameva syādityata āha-- saṃbhavatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2755: tadviṣayapramāṇānukūlyena tarkasyāpi tadviṣayatvamiti bhrāntimāśaḍkya nirākaroti--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2760: nanu na hi yadeva vidyate tadeva dṛśyata ityasti niyama ityata āha--tena saheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2761: tasmāt nāstīti phaladvāreṇa tarkasyānugrāhyaṃ pramāṇaṃ darśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2765: tadevamabhāvaviṣaye pratyakṣe 'pi tarkaṃ darśayatā anupalabdhiliṅgakānumānasya sādhyo 'bhāva iti saugatamatamapāstam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2774: vipratipannaṃ prati tu parīkṣakaistarkaḥ sahāyatvenopaneya iti ramaṇīyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2776: yajetetyatra samānapadopāttatvād bhāvyatvācca dhātvarthaḥ sādhyo bhavatu,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2778: vā puruṣārthatvāt svarga iti saṃśaye tarkasyāvatāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2780: tadopadeṣṭurāptatvaṃ vidheśceṣṭopāyatvaṃ vākyasya tadabhidhāyakatvaṃ prekṣāvatā ca pravṛttirna syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2783: na hi yāgabhāvanāyāḥ svargaphalatve dhātvarthasyātatphalatve samānapadopāttattvabhāvyatvayoḥ kaścid vidodhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2786: nanu pramāṇānugrahāya yuktatvāyuktatve vivecayati tarko na tu niścinoti iti kuto viśeṣādityata āha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2788: kriyātipattiḥ pratyayopasthāpite ghaṭasattvadhātvarthasādhyatve eva kriyātipattiśabdena vivakṣite,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2789: na hyevaṃbhūtapratyayāviṣayo ghaṭo vā sādhyatayā dhātvartho vāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2791: yasminnāśraye tulyopalambhayogyatvena duḥkhatvena vā aniṣṭaprasaṃjakena hetunā upapannastarko yuktāyuktaviṣayaviścayasādhanaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2796: niyatasaṃbaddhasvaviṣaye viparyayāpekṣitve tu pāratantryāt na pramāṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2798: nanu tarkapramāṇayorabhimataṃ bhedaṃ mīmāṃsāyā vedādabhedavādo virūṇaddhītyata āha--pramāṇeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2804: vicitranimittatve sādhye bhedavatvāditi hetuḥ svarūpābhiprāyeṇānaikāntikaḥ syāt svarūpabhedavatāmapi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2808: na hi nimittaṃ kiścid vicitram astītyetāvataiva dharmādharmasiddhiḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2809: dharmādharmalakṣaṇavicitranimittasādhanena tu nānvayo na vyatireka ityata āha--pramāṇamuktveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2810: nimittasya vaicitrye janmano vaivitryagrasaṅgaḥ nimittasyāvaicitrye janmano 'vaicitryaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2815: emistarkaiḥ pakṣadharmatāmupajīvya pravṛttairanugṛhyamāṇaṃ sāmānyavyāptibalapravṛttaṃ vaicitryānumānaṃ viśeṣavirodhaṃ paribhūyābhimataṃ viśeṣaṃ sādhayatītyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2818: nanu nirṇayopādānaprayojane vaktavye nirṇītaprayojanasya tarkasya punarāvṛttau kiṃ tātparyamityata āha--saṃkalayyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2821: nanu yadyapi sarvatra jalpe nirṇayāvasānatvameva nāsti kvacidanirṇaye 'pi puruṣāparādhataḥ kathāvicchedāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2823: na tato jalpādanyatarādhikaraṇanirṇayāvasānatvena vādo vyavacchetuṃ śakyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2828: sā ca vivadamānayoḥ tattvabubhutsutayā tamuddhiśya pravṛttiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2834: jalpaḥ punaḥ kīdṛśa ityata āha--jalpe tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2843: kathaṃ ca parasparaviruddhayoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvo 'pītyata āha--viśiṣyete iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2845: pūrvaṃ vādavyākhyānāvasare bhede heturuddeśyaviśeṣābhisandhiruktaḥ tadapekṣayā aparamapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2846: yau tau vādajalpayoḥ prayoktātau tāvekatrāvijigīṣayā anyatra vijigīṣayā viśeṣitau vādajalpau parasparato vyavacchindāte ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2847: dūṣayitum ekadeśivyākhyānaṃ tanmatena vyācaṣṭe iti yojyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2849: yadyapi vyabhicārādarśane 'pi avinābhāvo na sidhyati pṛthagabhidhānasya puruṣecchādhīnatvāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2851: tathāpi vyabhicārasya sphuṭatvāt sa eva darśitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2852: tasmād vāde codanīyā bhaviṣyantītyanena pṛthagabhidhānaprayojanamātraṃ pratipāditam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2859: tadā kimiti na kvacit śāstrapradeśe svayameva darśitavānityata āha--etāvāneveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2865: tat kuto na virodha ityata āha--vādajalpavitaṇḍā ityādi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2868: yadi vidyāśabdenāsya vādādayo na vivakṣitāḥ kathamagre vādavyāpāraṃ darśayitvā jalpavitaṇḍayoḥ sarvāṇyeva nigrahasthānāni vyāpāratvenāha?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2869: tad yadayameva brūte nūnamayamasyārtho vivakṣita iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2873: tasmāt svarūpavad vyāpāraphalabheda apyamīṣāṃ pratipādanīyā bhavanti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2877: na tu teṣāmasti saṃbhavati prayoga iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2880: tat kuto lakṣaṇatantrtvamityata āha--lakṣyata iti lakṣaṇamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2881: nanu yadi pṛthagabhidhānenaiva vāde codanīyatvaṃ pratipādyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2883: athānyathāpi teṣāṃ tad gamyata eva tadā hetvābhāseṣvapi sa eva prakāro 'sta,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2886: na hi hetvābhāsāḥ pṛthagabhihitā ityeva vāde codanīyatvaṃ teṣāṃ gamyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2891: ayameva ca nyāyo viśeṣataḥ pṛthagabhidhānena sūcitaḥ sūtrakāreṇa /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2894: evaṃ ca vyavasthite vārtikakṛto 'pi praśno nāprāstāvika ityāha--tatra pṛcchatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2901: taccāpratibhādyudbhāvanaṃ vinā na syāditi tattvaṃ pratipipādayiṣatā kartavyamevedamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2902: nanuc chalādīnāṃ parijñānaṃ na sākṣānniḥśreyasa upayujyate ātmādivat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2908: svayaṃ ca sukaraḥ prayoga iti granthasya pratyakṣasiddhatvāt kimuktaṃ bhavatīti tatsvarūpapraśno 'saṃgata ityataḥ pūrayati--anena bhāṣyeṇeti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2910: kiṃ tu tadanuguṇam evetyāśayavān sautraṃ prayojanamanuvadati--sūtrakāreṇeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2916: ato niḥśreyasasya paramapuruṣārthasya tanmūlatāyāṃ viparyayaśaḍkaiva nāsti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2922: pramāṇavyavahāra sadbhāve tu kimānvīkṣikyā tatra prakāśayitavyam?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2926: nanu praṇetṛśrotrapramāṇopajīvanamānvīkṣikyāmapi samānamato na vidyāntarād viśeṣa ityata āha--na tu pramāṇādīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2929: nanu upajīvakatāsāmye 'pi parasparopajīvyopajīvakabhāvaḥ kva nāma dṛṣṭa ityata āha--yatheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2936: kiṃ tu prāgeva ityabhiprāyeṇa vyutpādyasajātīyāpekṣānirākaraṇāyoktam--na pratyakṣādiviṣayamapi tadānīmeveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2939: tasya grahaṇaṃ pramāṇādigrakāśitamarthamitarā vidyāḥ pratipādyante iti vārttikena /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2944: tadevaṃ svarūpeṇāpekṣāṃ darśayitvā viṣayagatā apekṣā bhāṣyakṛtā darśitā--upāya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2946: nanu vidyāntarāṇāṃ śabdātmakatayā pramāṇatvāt tasya ca svapratipādye 'napekṣatvāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2951: atha tarkamanapekṣamāṇasya kiṃ syādityata āha--mā bhūditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2957: tathāpīha gobalīvardanyāyena pramāṇasya svapadopāttatvāt prayojanajijñāsātarkā eva vivakṣitāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2963: evaṃ ca daṇḍanītyāṃ yathā yamo rājā kubero vā rājatyādi,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2964: vārttāyāṃ māghe parikarṣitā bhūmiḥ suvarṇamayaṃ phalamādhatta ityādi tarkānapekṣayā viphalāyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2966: viṣayamiti śeṣa ityatrāpi vidheyatayā niṣedhyatayeti śeṣaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:2999: ataḥ sādhye saṃśayaḥ kiṃ vidhipadasamabhivyāhṛtapadatvādagnihotrādivadvidhiviṣayo bhavatu svargo 'dhikārivad vā neti pūrvapakṣamādarśayanneva tatrāniṣṭaprasaṃgamāha--tatra yadīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3000: na ca śyenādisādhyāyā hiṃsāyā vihitatvenārthatvameva bhavatu kā kṣatiriti vācyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3001: vidhirhi pravartakaḥ svajñānena icchāmantarā kṛtvā prayatyanotpādakaṃ iti yāvat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3002: sa ca prayatno na sādhyaviṣayaḥ kartuṃ śakyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3003: upayo hi prayatnaviṣayo na tu phalam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3004: tasmāt prayatnaviṣayatvāt sādhanetikartavyate eva vidhīyete na tu sādhyam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3008: tasmāt śyenādisādhyā hiṃsā anarthabhūtaivārthaḥ syād yadi vidhiviṣayaḥ syāditi sādhūktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3009: siddhānte pramāṇamādarśayanneva sādhyapadasamabhivyāhārastarhi kvopayujyate ityāśaḍkāmapanayati--atha sādhyāṃśamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3015: nanu bhavatvevaṃ tāvat tathāpyānvīkṣikyā kimāyātamityata āha--tadiheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3017: yathā ābhikhyāyāḥ prayojakatvaṃ kṣīrahomasthāne tadviniveśanād rasādisāmyāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3020: sarvā vidyā iti vidyaśabdena taddharmān lakṣayatīti na bhāṣyavyākhyāvirodhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3034: jalpādayo hi madādihetavaḥ parābhibhavopāyatvāt dravyaśarīrasaṃpattivaditi prayogaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3038: kiṃ tu pratipannasya tattvapratipattipālanārthaṃ duravaliptapratipādanārthaṃ ca tayoradhikāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3046: anvayavyatirekābhyāmeva tu siddhacatvityata āha--madamānādihetutvaṃ ca heturasiddha iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3047: sati ca tattvavidāṃ na saṃbhavantīti vadatā yathāśrutasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3070: cātra vacana eva sākṣāt saṃśayaṃ darśayati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3071: tathāpi taddvārā artha eva draṣṭavya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3072: saṃbandhini ca prayojane tattvajñānakāryatayā parīkṣyamāṇe saṃbandha eva kāryakāraṇabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ parokṣito bhavatīti tadeva parīkṣyatayā nirdiśyate--tat khalu vai niḥśreyasamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3078: nanu jīvanmuktipakṣe tadvatāmavasthānaṃ na syāditi codyamānamanavakāśamityata āha--tadatyanteti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3089: [1.1.22] ityatāvadeva niḥśreyasamiti kena pratijñānaṃ yāvatā jīvanmuktirapi riḥśreyasaṃ bhavatyevetyata āha--na cānyaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3095: yasyābhāvānnāpavṛjyate so 'nyor'thaḥ iti sphuṭaṃ vārttikamiti ṭīkārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3097: yathāśrutaṃ vārttikaṃ na pūrvāpakṣācchādakaṃ na hyaparamapi niḥśreyasaṃ śāstrīyāt tattvajñānāt sākṣādbhavatīti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3098: yasmācca sākṣādbhavati na tacchāstrīyamityato bhūmimaracayati--catasro hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3104: na hi niścayātiriktaṃ kasyacit pramāṇasya phalamityata āha--na cāyamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3106: na hi niścayo mohaḥ aupadeśikenānumānikena vā tattvaniścayena nirākartuṃ pāryate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3113: kāryakāraṇabhāvasya bhedādhiṣṭhānatayā tayoḥ paramārthikatve bhedasyāpi pāramārthikatvaprasaṃgāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3117: dvitīye tu na śābdādānumānikād vā tattvajñānādaindriyakavyāmohavigamaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3118: kiṃ tarhi, sākṣātkārādeva dṛṣṭa iti tathaiva tadarthinaḥ pravṛttiryuktā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3121: yadi tu svasaṃviditasvarūpatayā kiṃ tatra dhyānādikamapūrvamādhāsrūtītyucyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3124: tatrāpi na kevalenaiva vākyena sākṣātkāraḥ kiṃ tu cakṣurādinaiva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3126: anekadhā śrutaśruterapi satyapi ca paṭīyasi manasi brahmasākṣātkārābhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3131: lokasiddhaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvastāttviko bhavatu mā vā bhavatu sarvasya puruṣārthapravṛttasya tāvat sa eva śaraṇam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3133: yadi nāma catasraḥ pratipattaya ātmādau prameye,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3135: etaduktaṃ bhavati--yadi śrautamānumānikaṃ vā tattvajñānamādāya pūrvapakṣaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3138: kiṃ tarhi? paramparayā saiva catasro hītyādinā darśitā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3145: na hi śravaṇāderiva pare niḥśreyase kartavye sākṣātkārasyāpi kiñcit kartavyāntaramastītyata āha--na caivamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3151: śakyatve vā surāpayetvānumānamapi durnivāramiti haitukānāṃ dattaḥ svahastaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3152: ata eva na prāyaścittācaraṇaduḥkhameva brāhmahatyādīnāṃ phalam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3157: tasmādadattaphalānyeva karmāṇi prāyaścittena kṣīyanta ityeva sādhu /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3159: atra cāgamabalapravṛttā āgamenaiva bodhayituṃ yujyanta ityāśayavānāha,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3165: syādapyevaṃ yadi nābhuktamityādismṛteranugrāhako nyāyo na syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3172: na cotsargasiddhāyāḥ smṛterasati bādhake 'nyathāmāvo yujyata ityāśayavānāha--autsargikasyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3175: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe parāvare //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3176: [muṇḍaka. 2.2.8] iti śrutau paripanthinyāṃ kathamucyate 'sati bādhaka iti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3177: kathaṃ ca tadvirodhena smṛternirṇāyakatvamanumānānugraho 'pītyata āha--kṣīyanta iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3178: na hīyaṃ śrutiradattaphalānāmeva karmaṇāṃ tattvajñānāt kṣayamāha,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3199: evaṃ ced varamadattaphalānyeva yogaprabhāvāt kṣīyanta iti kalpyatāṃ lāghavāyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3206: te ca sahakāriṇaḥ kvacitphalonneyāḥ yathā yugapadanekendriyopagrahe,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3207: kvacidāgamagamyā yathā vāsudevasaubhariprabhṛtīnāṃ kāyayaugapadya iti sarvatra pramāṇamasti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3209: yathā ca mahāpralaye sarvakarmaṇāmekadaiva vṛttinirodha āgamaprāmāṇyādāsthīyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3210: tathā yogarddhikāle 'pi sarveṣāṃ vṛttilābha āstheya āgamaprāmāṇyādeveti na kiñcit svapratibhāmātreṇa kalpitamityarthaḥ tādṛśaśca muniraparaniḥśreyasavānityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3212: atha paraṃ niḥśreyasaṃ kīdṛśamityata āha--paraṃ tviti /
