GSP29nvtp1_1u:3216: na hyasti sambhavo na tatra tṛṣyati tacca tasya sukhu yādṛśamajñāninaḥ tṛṣṇājanakam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3217: na tad dveṣṭi tacca tasya duḥkhamiti yādṛśamajñānino dveṣajanakamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3219: upabhogaprayatna āstheyo mokṣāya tvaramāṇenāpi kāyavyūhādāviti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3220: yastu ta tvarate yadā bhavitā karmakṣayastadā bhavitā mokṣo 'pi kiṃ tvarayā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3231: yadyapi duḥkhādīnāmekārthasamavāyalakṣaṇo 'pi yogaḥ saṃbhavati tathāpi śarīrāderjanmanaḥ sa nāsti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3232: kāryakāraṇabhāvastu tasyāpi sa eva grāhya ityāha--yogyatayeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3233: kāraṇasya hi pūrvavartitvaṃ yujyata ityata āha--atra
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3236: na ca pūrvaṃ kāryamityata āha--tadanantaratvaṃ ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3239: mithyājñāne kāraṇe tatkāryā doṣāḥ avyavadhānenaiva ādau paṭhitā iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3248: keṣāmiti duḥkhādīnāmiti ca padaṃ kiṃ bhavatīti sākāḍkṣam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3267: na khalu yathā kuṇḍe badaraṃ saṃyogena paṭe vā śauklyaṃ samavāyenetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3268: nanu na tāvat sattāmātreṇa sārūpyaṃ bhrāntāvupayujyate japākusumādisannidhānaparibhūtasitimni sphaṭhikādāvanupalabhyamānaviśeṣasmaraṇe 'pi rajatādiviparyāsābhāvāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3275: kiṃ tarhi? rajatādau yo dharmaścakacikyādiḥ upalabdhapūrvaḥ sa eva tajjātīyo vā purovartinyupalabhyate yadi tadā bhrānti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3280: vyavacchedakānabhibhūtatvaṃ ca tatra nāstītyataḥ sarvātmanā vā sārūpyamekadeśena vetyevamādi parāstaṃ veditavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3285: prathame tu na tāvata pītaguṇī śuklaguṇini śaḍkhe āropyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3295: ādye śuklatvasāmānyādhārā vyaktiḥ pītatvasāmānyātmanā prathamānā na deśakālaniyatā syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3298: na ca pītatvasāmānyameva śuklaguṇavyaktirūpeṇaropyata iti sāmpratam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3304: sarvathā apratītaṃ ca nāropaviṣaya ityasaṃgatirevāsya kalpasya,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3305: saṃsargitayā tu sāmānye āropyamāṇe śuklaguṇasya śuklatvenaiva pratītiḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3308: tasmāt pītaguṇa śaṅkhe samāropyata iti vācyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3311: na hyatra pītaguṇa āropyo 'pi tu pītaguṇaśca śaḍkhaśca āropaviṣayau,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3313: tathā ca saṃsṛṣṭasvabhāvābhyāṃ guṇaguṇibhyāmanayoḥ asaṃsṛṣṭasvabhāvayoḥ sārūpyamiha prayojakam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3314: upadarśitaṃ ca taditi kimaprayojakena guṇisārūpyeṇa guṇasārūpyeṇa vā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3332: asti hi kenacit kasyacit kathañcit sārūpyamityata āha--neti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3341: apsu daṇḍasya vakratābhrame taraṅgavakrimadaṇḍayorasaṃsargagraha ityevaṃ neyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3345: yathā hi, indriyādinā vinā nātmā duḥkhaṃ janayitumalam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3350: na tairvinā duḥkhaheturātmā cet te 'pi tādṛśāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3358: yadi jñātasya sato duḥkhaṃ pratyātmano hetutvaṃ sutamaraṇāderiva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3362: ātmadṛṣṭestu heyatvavyutpādanaṃ manāk sadalamityāśaḍkya nirākaroti--na tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3374: tannivṛttau tayorapi nivṛttiriti ko nāma nābhyupaiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3377: na hi śuktikāto rajataṃ bhedenāvyavasthāpayatastasya rajatabuddhiḥnivartate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3380: na hi te śarīrādiviviktam ahamiti pratiyanti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3406: tarhi bahirūpaplavavirahe svātmapratiṣṭhaṃ jñānaṃ rāgādinivṛttiheturityevaṃbhūtayātdṛṣṭyā kimaparāddham,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3413: tarhi nirātmīyatādṛṣṭiṃ vadan kuto nairātmyadṛṣṭiṃ supta iva pralapasīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3427: arthācca pravartayet pravṛttinivṛttī ca saiva dṛṣṭiḥ karoti yā rāgadveṣau prasūte,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3432: tasmād yaḥ paralokārtho tasya paralokinamātmānamaḍgīkṛtyaiva svarge 'paparge vā prayatnaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3433: yastu nityamātmānaṃ nābhyupaiti tasya cārvākasya iva svargāpavargāveva na staḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3440: api tu duḥkhaṃ jihāsamāna ātmānaṃ jahāti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3441: ātmānamanapahāya duḥkhasya hātumaśakyatvāditi manyamānastasmād duḥkhamajihāsataḥ sukhaṃ copādātumicchato nairātmyadṛṣṭerasaṃbhava eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3442: tathā ca tathābhūtasya nairātmyadarśino nityātmadarśino vā tulyaḥ saṃsāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3444: na hi sarvaduḥkhocchedam evopakāraṃ paśyati sukhāya tadupakārāya ca ghaṭata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3447: na hi parāpakāraḥ sarvaduḥkhocchedanidānamiti hṛdi nidhāyāha--abhyarhitatā ceti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3452: itarakārakaprayoktṛtvam bāhyakārakaprayojyatāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā bhedāgrahe sati śarīrādau kartṛtvamāropyātmatvena viparyasyatīti tadidamuktam--tāṃ khalviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3453: evaṃ siddhaṃ kṛtvā viparyayam anyathākhyātirūpamiti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3455: nanu sthāṇāvevāyaṃ mama corapratyayo vṛtta ityāgāpālāṅganaṃ prasiddhamiti tadatra saṃśaya eva nāstītyata āha--parīkṣakāṇāmiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3469: tathā sati nedaṃ rajatamiti śuktikāyāṃ rajatatvapratiṣedhe tadekajñānasaṃsargiṇo bhūtakāderapi rajatatvaṃ vidadhyāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3474: svātmāno 'pi rajatātmatvaṃ na kasyacidupalabdhigocaraḥ kadācit svapne 'pi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3477: tatrāpi hi purovartini rajate anubhūyamāne svātmano rajatākāratvaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3481: yathā hi nedaṃ rajatamiti bādhakabalena purovartino rajatatvapratiṣedhaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3492: tataśca yathedaṃ nedamahaṃ nāhamityanayorvirodhāt samuccayābhimāno 'pi nāsti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3493: tathā nedaṃ rajataṃ nāhaṃ rajatamityanayorapi virodhāt samuccayābhimāno 'pi na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3494: asti ca, tasmādubhayorapi rajatatvapratiṣedho 'nyasya rajatatvaṃ vyavasthāpayatīti pāṣāṇarekheyaṃ na durūttarapāṃsupūraṇamātreṇāpanetuṃ śakyate
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3517: nirūktinimittaṃ jñānaṃ vā syāt viṣayo vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3533: atrāpi nisaḥpratiṣedhārthatvena svabhāvaśabdasyāpi bhāvābhāvayoranyatarārthatve pūrvavat prasaṃgaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3537: yad yathā pratīyate tat tathā neti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3540: nanu yadyathāsatprakāśate prapañco 'pi tarhi tathaivāstu jātyādikaṃ cetyata āha---yaḥ punariti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3559: caturthe tu sāmyāpādane sati jñānadharmo vā agraho viśeṣaṇam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3609: anugatamekaṃ svarūpaṃ samānāsamānajātīyavyacchedako dharmo lakṣaṇamiti yāvat //2 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3612: svābhāvikaṃ tu śāstrasya traividhyaṃ nāstyeva tasya puruṣāyattatvādityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3625: cārthāpattyādīnāmupayogavatāmapi parairūdghuṣyamāṇānāmapi lakṣaṇākaraṇāt syāt sandehaḥ-- kiṃ lakṣaṇākaraṇādasanti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3629: tathā bauddhāpekṣayā mīmāṃsakānāmadhikapramāṇalakṣaṇābhidhānaṃ vinaiva pramāṇānām ādhikyāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3631: tad ihāpi sāṃkhyāpekṣayā adhikābhidhāne bhavati sandehaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3655: evaṃ ca sati yatra yadā yasya yathānukūlatve pratikūlatve vā pramāṇamasti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3658: sarvaśca pareṣāṃ vimarśasaṃbhavo 'tīndriyasāmarthye 'pi samāna ityarthāpattim upekṣyānyadevātīndriyaśaktisvīkārabījamāśaḍkya vimṛśati--syādetaditi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3659: svarūpasya pratyakṣatve sākalyasya ca kāryaikavyaḍgyatve 'numeyamatīndriyaṃ sāmarthyam avaśiṣyata iti pūrvapakṣārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3665: tasya tatkāraṇatve siddhe sati tatkāryatvaṃ siddhaṃ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3666: tatkāryatve sati ca tadupalakṣitaṃ kāraṇatvaṃ bhavedityata āha--idameva cāsya tadupadhānaṃ yat tatkāryotpādāt pūrvamavaśyaṃbhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3667: yudatpādāt pūrva yasyāvaśyaṃbhāvaḥ tat kāraṇamitarat kāryamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3668: nanvevaṃrūpaṃ kāraṇatvaṃ tajjātīyasya samāmanyato 'numīyeta prativyakti vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3673: yathā yo yo dhūmaḥ so 'gnimāniti sāmānyato 'vadhāraṇe 'pi eṣa dhūmo 'gnimāniti navādhāritam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3675: na ca kvacit kāryamakṛtvaiva vinaṣṭe vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3678: tasmād yā nobhayaprayatnaprasavahetuḥ sopekṣābuddhiḥ tṛtīyeti viṣayabhedād buddhibhedaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3679: sa ca sukhaheturduḥkhaheturataddhetuśceti trividha iti suvyaktamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3680: anumānapadaṃ vyutpādayatā bhāṣyakṛtā prasaṃgāt lakṣaṇamapyabhihitamiti ṭīkākṛd api smṛtyādivyavacchedyaṃ darśayati--tathā cetyādinā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3690: nanu hānādiviṣayaṃ prāmāṇyamucyamānamanumānasya svagocaraṃ pratyevoktaṃ bhavati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3692: ata āśaḍkaiveyamanupapannā kimatra samādhānenetyāśaḍkya vyāpārānubandhitayā hānādirasya gocaraḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3695: vijñāne yat prakāśate yena vijñānaṃ nirūpyat ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3700: nanu heyādibuddhayaḥ kena viśeṣeṇa dvitīyānumānasya phalam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3702: nanu sāmīpyasya sādṛśyasya mānaṃ mitiḥ saṃjñāsaṃjñiparicchede pramāṇamityukte kuto vyāghātāvakāśa ityata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3709: anupayuktasamayānāmasmaryamāṇapadārthānāṃ śabdasmaraṇe 'pi tadabhāvādityata āha--yat khalu caitreti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3711: tat kutaḥ pratyakṣasya pradhānatvād iti ekadeśī vaktītyata āha--pratyakṣaparā hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3718: yadyapi śabdasyapi pramāṇasya vākyarūpasya smṛtisthasya padārthasmṛti padārthasmṛtisahakṛtasyaiva vākyārthabodhakatvam, tathāpi na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3719: kvacidapyanubhūyamānasya liḍgaṃ tvanubhūyamānamapi śabdasya viśeṣābhidhāne nyāyasiddhe 'pyekadeśyabhimataprayojanābhidhānaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3721: tathāpi dūṣaṇābhāsena ta tad duṣayituṃ śakyamiti śikṣayituṃ vārttikakṛtamanarañjayannevottaragranthamavatārayati--tadetadekadeśimatamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3724: tatra mahāviṣayatvamanaikāntikāmiti śabdasya mahāviṣayatvāt ādyatvamāpādayatā pratyakṣasyānādyatvamicchatā anya eva dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇīyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3725: tathā ca citrādau vipakṣabhūte pratyakṣa'pi gatatvena mahāviṣayatvamanaikāntikatvamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3732: mahāviṣayatvāditi sādhāraṇo dharmaḥ pratyakṣaṃ vā śabdo veti saṃdehaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3734: prādhānyakhyāpanaṃ prayojanaṃ yadi prāthamyaṃ vinā na siddhyet tadānumānasyāpi prādhānyāt prāthamyaṃ syādityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3735: nanvasati ca saṃplave kā no hāniḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3736: sati vā kiṃ bhevad yena bhāṣyakāro vicārayati smetyata āha--syādetaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3738: yadyanumānamapi vyavasthitaviṣayaṃ bhavedityata āha---na cānumānaviṣaye sāmānyarūpa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3740: avyākhyāne kāraṇamiti kimiti na vyākhyātamiti śaṅgānivṛttikāraṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3741: sandigdhena hīti upadeśaprāmāṇye taddvāra vahnāvapyuttarakālamiti mantavyam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3742: ato vahinaṃ pratyāhita utpāditaḥ pratyayo niścayo yasyetyanena na virodhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3744: nanu ca niścavaphalatvāviśeṣe 'pi pratyakṣata eva ākākṣānivṛttiriti kuta etadityata āha--tāvadayamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3748: kutaśca pūrvācāryapradaśitaḥ panthāḥ parihnīyata ityata āha--tatta prakṛtānupayogitayeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3765: viśeṣavibhāgaṃ ca kṛtvā śiṣyasya jijñāsāmutthāpya viśeṣalakṣaṇāvatāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3766: tathā ca sāmānyalakṣaṇavibhāgoddeśajñānasya jijñāsadijananadvārā viśeṣalakṣaṇajñānaṃ prati hetutvāt tadgocarayorapi hetuhetumabhdāvaṃ vivakṣitvoktam--hetutveneti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3767: vyavacchedo nāsyāmidheya ityata āha--prayojanamiti samānajātīyamanumānādi pramāṇatvena,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3772: ataḥ kārakāt phalabhūtāṃ kriyāṃ niṣkṛṣya darśayati--viśeṣakatvaṃ viśeṣa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3774: kaḥ punaranena lakṣaṇena pratipādayiṣyata ityata āha--yaḥ khalviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3777: na ca sarvatra vyāmoho yenānavasthā syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3778: na ca sarve vyāmohahetavo yenāpratipattiḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3785: nanu lakṣaṇaṃ yadi prasiddhaṃ kiṃ vidheyam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3791: pratipādyaśca vidheḥ pratītyaiva lakṣaṇaṃ yāgamiva paścāt sādhyaṃ sādhayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3794: satyapi tasmin paramāṇvādiṣu indriyasaṃyuktavyavaghāyakasaṃyukteṣu ca ghaṭādiṣu tadanupapatteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3797: tat kimarthaṃ saṃyuktasamavetasamavāyābhyupagama ityata āha--na ceti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3800: nanvasannikṛṣṭasyaiva sannikṛṣṭāśrayasya vā grahaṇamagrahaṇameva vā bhaviṣyati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3810: na ca rūpatvādisāmānyaviśeṣaviśiṣṭarūpādyupalabdhimantareṇa pramāṇamasti parasparavyāvṛtteṣu cakṣurādiṣu viśiṣṭopalabdhereva pramāṇatve parasparāśrayatvam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3821: na ca viśeṣaṇabhāvapadenobhayasaṃgrahe samavāyapadenāpi catuṣṭayasaṃgraho 'stviti vācyam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3822: viśeṣaṇabhāvasya śuddhasya pratyakṣānaṅgasvena tadaṅgaprastāva viśiṣṭasya sulabhatvāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3823: samavāyasya śaphaddhasyāpi pratyakṣāṅgatvena prastutatayā tatpadasya tāvanmātrābhidhānenaiva paryavasitatvāditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3830: pratipattiḥ parasparāsambaddhebhyo vyāvartamānā parasparasambaddheṣu viśrāmyatīti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3831: nanu sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ samānenādhikaraṇena sambandha iti paryāyau,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3836: api tu ya eva śuklaḥ sa eva paṭa ityabhedenaiva pratītirityāśayavānāśaḍte--tādātmyamiti cediti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3838: yadi hi guṇaguṇinorabheda eva syāt tadā tadvācakayorekārthatvāt tarūvṛkṣaśabdavat sahaprayogo na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3841: apaṭaḥ paṭa itivadaśuklaḥ paṭa ityapi virudhyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3844: mahārajanādisaṃyukte śuklatvavat paṭo 'pi tirohita iti na pratīyetetyevamāditarkasahāyaṃ pratyakṣameva paṭaśuklatvayorbhedamākalayatīti parihārārthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3849: abhedamādāya ca sāmānādhikaraṇyamityata āha--na caikaṃ vastviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3853: sā cābhedaṃ nollikhatīti cintitamadhastādityato lokaprasiddhayorbhedābhedayorasaṃkīrṇatayā virodha eva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3858: tathāpi bhedasambandhābhyāṃ vyāvartamānā abhedaṃ vā abhedasambandhaṃ vā sādhayet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3862: ye punarbhinne sambaddhe na te samānādhikaraṇe yathā dadhikuṇḍe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3871: ca heturyathā bhedasambandhābhyāṃ vyāvartate tathā abhedasambandhābhyāmapītyasādhāraṇaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3873: na caivaṃbhūtamubhayavādisaṃpratipannaṃ kiñcidasti yato vyāvṛtterasādhāraṇo hetuḥ syāditi cet na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3882: abhedastvasambandhenaiveti katham abhinne sambandhe iti pratijñā na vyāhatā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3895: sattā tu tābhyāmasādhāraṇābhyāṃ sādhāraṇī bhinnā kathamiva tayoḥ svabhāvaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3897: na vaidravyaguṇakarmasādhāraṇādākārādasādhāraṇamākāraṃ sattāyāḥ paśyāmo yena sā tathā syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3898: evaṃ teṣāmapi dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ parasparāsaḍkīrṇāt rūpānna svabhāvāntaraṃ paśyāmaḥ pratīyamānarūpamevābhinnamityucyamāne sattā vā na syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3904: vā pare menire iti yadyupanibandhenāha--śabdānāṃ tviti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3906: sā guṇaguṇibhyāṃ vyāvartamānā svavyāpyamaikāntikaṃ bhedamapi vyāvartayatīti ata āha--ayutasiddhyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3912: bhinnasaṃmbandhyanubhave 'pi kutaḥ sambandhānubhava ityata āha---na cāsāviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3915: yo viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ sarvaḥ saṃndhāntarapūrvakaṃ iti vyāptirihaiva bhajyata iti pareṇāpi svīkaraṇīyameva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3916: na hyasau samavāyamabhāvaṃ vā abhyupagacchan viśeṣaṇatāmasya na svīkaroti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3919: sambandhāntararahito viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ pratyakṣāḍgaṃ na bhavatīti kadācid brūyāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3940: ataḥ kiṃ tadarthena viśeṣaṇabhāvenetyata āha---na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3944: kevalyaṃ hi bhūtaladharmo ghaṭādyavirodhī yudyucyeta na ghaṭādinā saha saṃbhavet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3958: tatrāpyasau bhāvaniṣedhākāro vā syāt, anyathā vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3965: ataḥ padārthānāṃ saptamo niṣedharūpo 'nutpannapradhvaṃsī ca utpannavināśī ca bhūtalādidharmaḥ kaivalyamabhāva iti ekor'tha iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3969: viṣayaśca tasya dṛśye pratiyogini bhūtalamevetyata āha--na ceti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3972: nanu dṛśye pratiyoginītyuktaṃ ghaṭavabhdūtalajñāne tu ghaṭo na dṛśyaḥ kiṃ tu dṛśyamāna ityata āha---nahīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3974: darśanārhe hi ghaṭaḥ tatra yadi na nāsti tadā bhūtalavadakāmenāpyupalabhyetaiva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3979: tathāpi svavacanavirodhamapyapaśyantaṃ prati kiṃ tenāpītyāśayavānāha---dṛśye 'nupalabhyamāna iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3984: smaryamāṇe dṛśyamāne ghaṭe bhūtalopalambhe sati ghaṭavatyapi prasaṅgasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3989: bhavati hi ghaṭaṃ nopalabhaitivat ghaṭo nāstīti pratītiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:3991: nimīlitalocanasya hyupalambhābhāvaniścaya upalabhyābhāve ca sandeho jijñāsā ca kathañcid bhūtalaniścaye 'pi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4004: mamāpi yadabhāvo 'nupalabdhyā bodhyaḥ tadgrāhakeṇendriyeṇādhikaraṇagrahaṇe sa gṛhyata iti siddhāntasāramiti cet---na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4010: nāpi pratiyogismaraṇe rūpābhāvapratītyā ca niyamena apekṣata ityāyātam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4012: āntarālikameva vyāpāraṃ vyavadhāyakamiti bhrāntaṃ pratibodhayannāha---na ca pratiyogīti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4014: abhāvajñānotpattāvindriyārthasannikarṣo na kāraṇaṃ vyabhicārāditi vādinam utthāpayati---nanu svarūpeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4026: bhavati hi kadācit pratiyogyadhikaraṇayoḥ smaraṇe 'pyasato 'pi sabhdāvapratītiḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4034: na ca svarasasiddhasya smaraṇasyānupalabhyamānasyaiva viparyayaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4035: iyatī ca sāmāgrī yaduta pratiyogyadhikaraṇasmaraṇaṃ tattāsmaraṇaṃ ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4036: na vā sādhāraṇaṃ pramākaraṇamadūṣayanta eva doṣā viparyayahetavaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4041: yadā tu sunipuṇaikajñānagrahaṇayogyasya caitrasya gehasmaraṇai'pyasmaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ liṅgamavadhāryate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4045: asmaraṇamātrasya hi vyabhicāram upalabhya tadanādṛtya viśiṣṭāsmaraṇaṃ jñātukāmasya praṇidhānamupapadyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4056: ata evānutpannapādavihārasya acalacakṣuṣa ityādi vyadhikaraṇameva darśayati sma vārttikakāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4065: iyaṃ tvānumānikī pārokṣyavatī tasmānna kvacid vyabhicāraśaḍkā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4070: na tarhi ityādibhāṣyeṇa kaḥ sūtrāvayavo vyākhyāta iti śaḍkāmapanayanneva vārttikamavatārayati---saṃpratīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4075: nanu mahattvānekadravyavattvayoḥ parasparāvinābhūtayoragṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatvenobhayorapi cākṣaṣatvaṃ prati kāraṇatvāt samuccaya eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4078: parasparavyabhicāriṇo hyarthakriyāyāṃ vikalpasambhavo na tvime tathā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4081: ata evāgre satyapyevaṃ lakṣaṇakatva ityāha uktasāmagrīsambhave 'pi cakṣuravayavino na pratyakṣatā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4082: ata uktaṃ vārttikakṛtā upalabdhiphalaḥ saṃskāra iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4087: na tu kvacid grahaṇam agrahaṇaṃ ca kvaciditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4092: nityastu sāmānyarūpo na saṃskāraśabdavācyo nāpyupalabdhiphalaḥ, tasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4094: rūpādīnā svakāraṇavaśādeva sa svabhāvabhedo jāyate keṣāñcit,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4107: nanu yadyapi svarūpataḥ santānato vā indriyābhedādindriyamanaḥsannikarṣābhedo yathāyathaṃ saṃbhavati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4108: tathāpi vijñānābhedo vyaktikṛto jātikṛto vā syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4112: tat ekadeśiparihāro garbhastrāveṇaiva gata upanyāsayogyo 'pi na bhavatītyāśayavānāha---yadā hīti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4113: asti hi svarūpajātikṛtabhedātirikto viṣayakṛto viśeṣo buddhīnām /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4117: tatra jñānasyāpi na viṣayakṛto bheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4120: tasyaiva goścakṣuṣā saṃyogena tatraiva gavi samavāyena prathamaṃ śuklaguṇajñānaṃ paścād gamanakarmajñānamiti bhede 'bhedāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4126: ubhayātīndriyādhāratā tu ātmamanaḥsannikarṣasyāpi nāstītyata āha--ātmā tu yadyapīti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4128: na hi rūpopabhogānarthinaḥ kṛṣṇasāre tṛṣṇā tatkarmasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4134: yadi hi rathādisaṃyogānāṃ nabhovyāpakatvaṃ bhavet tadā tatkāryasyapi śabdasya sarvatrotpādaprasaḍgeḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4138: tataśca taddvāreṇopalamyamānā rathādayastatsaṃyogāśca na niyatadeśatayā pratīyerannityāśayavānāha---mā bhūtasarvatreti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4142: tathā ghrāṇodāharaṇaṃ pūtigrandhābhāvaviśiṣṭā surabhitarā kastūriketyato bahuvacanāvirodhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4148: nanu mā bhūt sahāntareṇa grahaṇaṃ sāntara iti vā grahaṇaṃ hetvarthaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4151: etasyaivottaropādhitvena prayojakatvādityata āha---indriyasambandho bhavatu mā veti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4153: yadindriyasambaddhaṃ tadavaśyaṃ śarīrasambaddhamiti vā na pramāṇamasti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4156: na hyasti niyamo yat pradīpena sambaṇsate tadavaśyaṃ mallimayāpi yad vā mallimayā tadavaśyaṃ pradīpenāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4158: tasmāt tadanyathāsiddhirevetyasiddhivyavacchedārthaṃ sajalasatejaḥpaṭādigrāhiṇā prāpyakāriṇā tvagindriyeṇa viruddhamapi sahāntareṇa grahaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4174: evaṃ tarhi viṣaya eva sa kaścit tādṛśo yo gṛhyate netara ityabhyupeyatām,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4178: na hi sparśarasādayo grahaṇayogyā ityaprāptaireva tvagādibhirgṛhyante,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4179: prāpyakāritvād vā tairanubhdūtābhibhūtā api te prāptatvamātreṇa gṛhyanta ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4180: yadyapi kṣaṇabhaṅgapariṇāmanaye 'pi prāptānāmeva parasparaṃ kartṛkaraṇakarmaṇāṃ kāryajananam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4182: na hi parasparamapratyāsīdantaḥ sahakāripratyayā bhāvānatiśāyayanto dṛśyante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4185: tathā ca svarūpayogyatāmindriyārthayobruvatā nirantarotpāda eva vaktavyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4188: na tu nirantarotpāde 'pi tatrādhikāprāptiḥ sādhanamarhatītyāśayavānāha---niṣetsyete hīti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4189: evaṃ nivāritābhimānaḥ paradarśane 'pi pramāṇamapaśyan sandigdha iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4190: nanu janakatve satīti nirṇayahetuṃ paśyan kathaṃ nāma sandigdha ityata āha---ayamabhisandhiriti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4192: tvagādīnāṃ daṇḍādīnāṃ ca prāptānāmeva kāryajanakatvaṃ paśyan kathamiva sarvatra vipratipadyata ityato vipratipattibījamāha---yogyatayaiveti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4193: nanvayaskāntasyāprāpyakāritve hetvantare 'pi kaḥ pratīkāra ityata āha---ayaskāntamaṇeriti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4194: nanu tasya vṛttibhedaḥ anupalambhabādhita ityata uktam---cakṣuṣa iveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4200: na ca kṛṣpāsārasyārthena maṇervā lohena nirantarotpādaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4204: sa ca bauddhanaye kāraṇajātīyasya nirantarotpādānna bhidyata ityuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4205: tasmāt sthiranaye kāryaṃ janayanti kāraṇāni parasparaprāptiṃ vā vyabhicaranti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4208: nanu lakṣaṇāntareṇa vyavasthite lakṣye kathamanyonyāśrayatvamityata āha---agatirveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4211: uttaratra tu avagate lakṣye tatsāpekṣeṇa lakṣaṇena kiṃ gamayitavyamityagatirevetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4213: yadi vijñānābhinnahetujatvāt sukhaṃ vijñānajātīyaṃ syāt sukhābhinnahetujatvāt tadapi sukhajātīyaṃ bhavet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4221: na tu sarvasya yavāḍkuratvam tatkāraṇānugamābhāvādityāśayavān āśaṅkate---avāntareti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4222: na hyasti niyamo yajjātīyakāryahetucakrānagamo yatra tatra tajjātīyatvamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4227: sa ca kāryabhedaḥ kiñcitkāraṇabhedenaiva bījāḍkurādivat jñānasukhādāvapyanākasmika ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4230: na hyasti saṃbhavo rūpādyupādānaṃ cārūpādikaṃ ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4232: ajñānatve vā na jñānopādānatvamiti yadi pratyavatiṣṭhate tatrāha---na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4236: dṛśyate ca rūpajñānād rūpajñānaṃ rasajñānādijātīyaṃ ca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4241: so 'yamekopādānakatve 'pyavāntarajātibhedābhyupagamaḥ pareṣāṃ dṛṣṭāntārthamubhdāvitaḥ api cetyādyubhdāvitaṃ sandigdhavyāvṛttikatvaṃ sphuṭhayitumato nāsaṅgatamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4243: paramārthatastu yadupādānavat tatsajātīyaṃ yadvyāpakopādānavat tadguṇajātīyamiti niyamaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4245: tadyadi sattayā guṇatvena vā sukhajñānayorekajātīyatvaṃ sādhyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4249: nāpyavāntara jātikṛtaḥ nāpi guṇatayā piṭharopādānatve 'pi karmaṇo 'guṇatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4258: utkṣepaṇasya ca pāṭavādibhedastathā jñānasyāpi darśanādibhedaḥ sukhasyāpi tāratamyādibhedo bhaviṣyatītyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4259: syādetat, ajñānarūpatāyāṃ punaḥ kiṃ pramāṇamityata upasaṃhāravyājenāha---tasmāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4261: na hi candanamahaṃ jānāmītyatra sukhaṃ parisphurati tadāhaṃ sukhīti syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4262: nāpi sukhyahamityatra jñānaṃ parisphurati tadā jānāmīti syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4264: jñānaviśeṣaḥ sukhaṃ tathāvidhe ca sukhabuddhirbhavatyeveti cet---hanta bhostasya jñānaviśeṣasya viṣayaviśeṣo 'pyasti na vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4267: na caitad dṛṣṭamiṣṭaṃ śakayaṃ vā sādhayitum /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4270: yadeva hi rāgavatā gītamanubhūyate tadeva vītarāgeṇāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4282: tasmāt tasya jñānaviśeṣasya sukhatvenābhimatasyābhyantara eva viṣayaviśeṣo nisargānukūlasvabhāva eṣṭavyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4283: yaddhetutayā bāhyo viṣayo 'nukūlatayābhimatatveneṣyamāṇo bhavati sa evoktarūpo viṣayaḥ sukhamityucyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4284: tathāpi mūḍhadhiyāṃ vyavahārārthaṃ samānāsamānajātīyavyavacchedakā dharmā jñānādīnāmuktāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4294: santi hi padārthāḥ svakarmopārjitatvāviśeṣe 'pi kecidadhyakṣā eva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4298: evamajñānatvāviśeṣe 'pi kāraṇalabdhasvabhāvabhedāḥ kecit avaśyasaṃvedyāḥ sukhādayaḥ kecidanyathetyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4309: jñānaṃ punaḥ kāryāvasānamapi indriyārthasannikarṣam atipatatyeva svapnāntike /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4315: ālambnaṃ tvasya viparyāsasya yathā pūrvānubhūtā smaraṇārhā kāminītyevaṃ tajjānmapūrvānubhūtaṃ smaraṇārhaṃ sukhameva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4316: viparyāsatvaṃ punaretāvataivāsya yat viprakṛṣṭadeśakālayoḥ kāminītajjanyasukhayoḥ sannikṛṣṭadeśakālatayāvabhāsaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4318: tathā sati kāminītvasukhatvaniṣedhenānyasya kasyacit pratibhāsanaṃ bādhakaṃ bhavet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4319: na ca vācyam yadi na svapnāntike sukhamutpadyate na
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4324: smaraṇe prāpte viparyāsaḥ smaraṇaviparyāsaḥ anubhavalakṣaṇastadviṣaya evetyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4325: nanu sukhaduḥkhotpādaprayojanau dharmādharmau yadasukhaduḥkhārūpān dehādīn utpādayataḥ tattadarthatayaiva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4335: sa ca pratyutpannasukhādyanālambanatve 'pi pūrvotpannam ālambya jāyamānaḥ sarvaṃ samañjasayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4340: tatra tu bādhakaṃ bhavad dvirūpaṃ bhavet---asukhametaditi vā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4343: jāgarāvasthāyāṃ tu nāsīt kāminīti yujyate bādhakaṃ sthiratvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4348: nāstīdānīṃ sukhamiti tvidānīntarasukhasya bādho na prāktanasya,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4350: tatkāryāṇāṃ ca harṣāśrupulakādīnāmanuvartamānānāmupalambhādanyathā āśutaravināśināṃ kṣaṇāntare 'darśanāt tadanubhavānāmaprāmāṇikatvameva syāt
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4351: tasmātabādhitānubhavasiddhatvādasti svapnāntike sukhamiti taṃ pratyāha---na cāsatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4353: tathāpi svapnāntika eva tatkāraṇatvena pratītānāṃ candanavanitādīnāmasti bādhakam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4354: kāraṇe ca bādhite kāryaṃ bādhitameva yathā svapnāntikadṛṣṭapayodapaṭalabādhe
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4356: harṣāśruprabhṛtayastu na sukhakāryāḥ kiṃ tu sukhajñānakāryā iti na tāvanmātreṇa tatsaṃbhavopapattiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4357: tasmāt svapnāntikodāharaṇabalena jñānamātrakāryato sukhasya sidhyatīti manorathādyudāhṛtya parihṛtam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4364: na hi yathā manoratheṣu sukhaṃ tathā viṣayasaṃbhoge /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4376: sa ca kāraṇabhedo 'nuvihitabhāvābhāva eva sidhyatītyatra vivakṣitamiti pratipipādayiṣuruktam evānubhāṣate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4381: jñānābhede hi bhinnajātīyaṃ sukhaṃ kāraṇāntaraṃ bhinnamākṣipet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4385: sa ca tādṛśo nāstīśvare tasya bubhukṣāvirahāt ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4387: nanu te 'pyalaṃpratyayavantaḥ kathamiva sukhabhājo bhaveyurityata āha--asatyāmiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4388: na hi te sarvadaiva pratipakṣadhāraṇāvanto mā bhūdamīṣāṃ sarvadā bhogavirahād dharmādharmapracayatādavasthyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4389: tasmād yadā pratipakṣadhāraṇā nāsti tadā viṣayasākṣātkāramātrādeva teṣāṃ sukhaṃ prasajyetetyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4394: na cendriyāṇāmarthānāṃ ca parasparamasannikṛṣṭānāmeva sattāmātraiṇa kvacidātmadharmasamutpāde sāmarthyamadhigatam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4395: tasmād yogarddhimatāṃ satyapi viṣayasākṣātkāre indriyārthasannikarṣābhāvāt sukhaṃ nāstītyabhipretyopasaṃharati--tasmāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4406: so 'yaṃ sannikarṣo yadā nāsti tadā teṣāmapi na sukhādikamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4410: ato na teṣāṃ sukhotpādaprasaṅga ityata āha--api ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4414: kathaṃ na tasya kāraṇatā sukhādikaṃ prati?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4418: tasmāt caramabhāvinyeva sākṣātkāre sati kimindriyeṇetyahṛdayasyābhiprāyaḥ avaśiṣyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4427: nanvavyapadeśyavyavasāyātmakapadayoḥ saṃgrāhyaṃ vyavacchedyaṃ vā na paśyāmḥ pratyuta parasparaviruddhayoranayorekasmin pratyakṣe 'samāveśa evetyata āha--iha dvayīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4432: sā ca vyavacchittirvyāvṛttipratītirūbhābhyāṃ kriyata iti tadubhayamāha--viśeṣaṇamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4447: tasmāt sad vā asad vā samānādhikaraṇaṃ vyavacchedakaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ viparītamupalakṣaṇamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4458: tairityatra kāraṇatābhramo mā bhūdityetadarthamupetadenāpūrya vyācaṣṭe--arthā hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4461: yat punaryadātmakaṃ na bhavati na tat tatsāmānādhikaraṇyena
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4464: pratīyante cārthāḥ śabdasāmānādhikaraṇyena tasmāt tadātmāna iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4465: nanu gavāśvādīnāṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyavyāvṛtti kimabhedavyāvṛtterūta tatpratītyorūpāyopeyabhāvavyāvṛtteriti saṃdihyata ityata āha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4466: api ca yadi śabdārthayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇye upāyopeyabhāva upādhiḥ syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4468: na ca nivartata ityata āha--api ceti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4475: yathā ṣaḍjādyutkarṣāpakarṣavyavahāranibandhano mayūrādyutkarṣāpakarṣavyavahāra iti dṛṣṭāntārthaṃ ṣaḍjādiṣvityuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4479: yat punaryadātmakaṃ na bhavati na tat tadutkarṣādyanuvidhāyi,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4481: nanu yadyarthapratyayo nāmadheyotkārṣādyavidhatte tat tasyaiva tādātmyamastu,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4483: sākṣādanabhidhāne 'pi guṇaguṇyāderapi yogyatayā sapakṣatvena tadgatasāmānādhikaraṇyena virodha ubhdāvayituṃ na śakyata iti tadupekṣyānyathā śaṅkate--astīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4484: asti hi śuklabhāsvaratvādibhiḥ yuktikāgatai rajatatvasya sāmānādhikaraṇyapratyayo natu tādātmyaṃ parasparaṃ dharmiṇorityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4492: na tanniyamatastena vyapadiśyate yathā rūpavijñānaṃ raseneti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4508: tadato bāle 'pi prathamataḥ śabdamuccārayati eṣa eva krama unnīyata ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4509: prathame pakṣe 'siddho hetuḥ aprasiddhaviśeṣaṇaśca pakṣaḥ śabdabrahmaṇa eva vājiviṣāṇāyamānatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4513: na hi bhāvanā vā tajjanitā smṛtirvā pūrvānubhūtasya sattāyām idānīmanubhūyamānasaṃbhede vā pramāṇamasti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4514: tathā sati vinaṣṭo ghaṭaḥ smaryamāṇatvāt sanneva syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4515: anubhūyamānaṃ na bhūtalaṃ ghaṭasaṃbhinnaṃ bhavedevaṃ cocchinnamaghaṭaṃ bhūtalamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4527: tadayaṃ bālo yad rūpaṃ paśyati sa eva rūpaśabda iti loṣṭalaḍḍukadṛṣṭāntamanuharatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4528: so 'yaṃ bhedapratyayo bhrānata iti yadi śaṅkate tatrāha--na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4532: vyutpannānāṃ punaḥ savikalpā dhiyaḥ śabdasāmānādhikaraṇyena jāyamānāḥ śabdātmakatvamarthasya vyavasthāpayantu /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4537: ayaṃ śabdo gakārādyākāro na tu sāsnādyākāra iti tātparyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4539: na tvayaṃ ḍitthaśabda iti tameva niṣedhasi ceti kimidamityata āha--autsargikaṃ hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4543: yatra tarhi asaṃbhadena saṃketagrahe nityādipadāni santi,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4545: svaparo 'pi yadi na syād vyarthaḥ prayogaḥ syādityata āha--yatrāpīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4546: yathā hi gaurvāhīka ityatra gotvaṃ goguṇayogalakṣakatvena vāhikopādhirna tatsamavāyāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4548: tathā hi ḍittho 'yamityatrāpi ḍitthaśabdo vācyatvopalakṣakatayā piṇḍopādhirna tu tatsamavāyāt tādātmyād veti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4549: yathā cātra vāhīke gauriti pratyayābhāvaḥ pramāṇam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4550: tathātrāpi vṛkṣaviśaiṣe ḍittho 'yamiti pratyayābhāvaḥ pramāṇamiti samudāyārthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4551: nanu śabdapuraḥsaratvaniyamād vikalpasya tadupāyatā vā tadviṣayatvaṃ vā syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4552: tatpuraḥsaratvaniyamasyātadupāyādatadviṣayatvānniyamato vyāvṛtteḥ tatra yadyarthavikalpastacchabdavipayastadā siddhaṃ naḥ samīhitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4555: tasmāt śabda upāyo bhavan jñāta eva vaktavyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4557: tasmādarthatādātmyāt śabdasyārthasannidhānameva tatsannidhiḥ ityarthālocanameva tadālocanamityanicchatāpi svīkartavyamityata āha--yattviti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4558: na tāvat śabdaḥ pūrvaṃ niyamato bhavati vikalpasya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4559: kiṃ nāma? vyutpannasya śabdasmaraṇapuraḥsaratvaṃ niyamavad dṛṣṭam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4563: tasmād ghaṭe vikalpayitatavye anupāyo viṣayaśca ghaṭaśabdaḥ kimiti niyamataḥ smaryata ityavaśiṣyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4575: sarva eva vyavahāraḥ svārthaḥ parārtho vā vikalpasādhyo na tvālocanenāpi kaścidarthaḥ sādhayitavyo 'sti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4577: na tāvat sarvasyaivotpattimataḥ prayojanaṃ piśitacakṣuṣaḥ sākṣātkurmaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4578: na ca prayojanāpratipattimātreṇa paṭutarapratyakṣaparikalitamapi kāryaṃ nānumanyāmahe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4580: tathāpi sphuṭaṃ savikalpakotpattirevāsya prayojanam iti sādarśiteti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4582: nāmāvacchinne vikalpe kartavye yato na viśiṣyate viśeṣeṇa na gṛhyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4583: ato vaidharmyasya yogyapramāṇabādhitatvāt tadarthajñānaṃ tādṛgeva bhavati tatsamānajātīyameva bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4584: ato bhāṣyapaunarūktyaṃ pariharato na sādhyāviśiṣṭo heturiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4588: tasya ca tadvyapadeśaviṣayatā tadā syāt yadi rūpatadvyapadeśayorabhedaḥ syādityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4589: anyenānyasya vyapadeśe atiprasaḍgo vyavahāravilopaśca vipralambhādityatra tannāmadheyatvādeva niyama iti sphuṭaṃ bhāṣya eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4590: svarūpeṇaiva viṣayeṇaiva vā kimiti jñānaṃ na vyapadiśyata ityetad vivṛṇvan pariharati--arthākārameveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4591: ātmānaṃ prati tāvat svarūpeṇaiva jñānamajñānād vyavacchidyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4592: jñānāntarāt tu viṣayeṇāpītyetat ko nāma nābhyupaiti?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4594: ata eva tadviṣayo 'pi tat kathaṃ svarūpaviṣayābhyāṃ paro bodhyatām?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4600: na hi pramāṇavyatirekeṇa prameyamadhigantuṃ na śakyate ityetāvataiva tayorabhedaḥ syāditi tadidamuktam--anyathā aśakyatvāditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4606: na hi gośabde karṇajapite 'pabhraṣṭe vā aṇīyān gauḥ kṛśa upahatākṛtirvikṛto vā pratīyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4608: nāpi sādhutvādibhedavato gośabdasya prāśastyamaprāśastyaṃ ca kiñcidasti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4613: śabdānuvyādharahitatā śabdārthānuvyādharahitatopapattirityato 'sya nirākaraṇaṃ sūcitamiti pūrvoktena na virodhaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4616: śabdo hi yatkāryo yatkāraṇaṃ yadgrāhyo yatpramāṇaṃ yadvirodhi yaddharmā yadrūpo yadviṣayaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4634: śabdasāmānyasya vā śrotrendriyaikavedyatvāt arthasāmānyamapi śrotrendriyaikavedyaṃ bhavet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4640: atrāpyanutpādo vināśo 'tyantābhāva iti viruddhaṃ syāditi mantavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4642: indriyasya ca grāhyaḥ sa eva yastajjanyajñānaviṣayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4647: tasmādaprasakte 'pyarthaśabdasya padārthamātraparatvamabhyupagamya parihāre gatyantaraṃ vārttikakṛtā darśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4650: indriyārthasannikarṣo hyajñāyamāna eva sattāmātravyavasthitaḥ pratyakṣe vivakṣitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4653: nanvanumāne 'pi liḍgāsattaiva ki na vivakṣitetyata āha--ata eveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4658: catra hi viṣayānapekṣaṃ jñānameva kāraṇaṃ tatra na viṣayakālānuvidhānam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4660: api ca liḍgānapekṣasya liṅgajñānasya liḍgijñānajanakatve pramāṇādīnāṃ gatidvayavādo 'pi tatra tatra na syāt //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4665: nanvindriyaviṣayeṣvityadhyāhārastarhi sūtre pūrveṣāṃ kiṃ mūlam ityata āha--imaṃ ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4666: na hyanumeyasyendriyeṇa sannikarṣāditi vadatā hyevamuktaṃ yasyendriyeṇa sannikarṣāt tajjñānamutpadyate nāsau tasya viṣayaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4667: yastu viṣayo na tasyendriyeṇa sannikarṣāt idaṃ jāyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4671: tasmād vārttikakṛtā eva kṛto 'yamadhyāhāra iti keścid buddham / sa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4675: indriyārthasannikarṣādutpannasya hi jñānasya vyabhicārasaṃbhādavyabhicārīti viśeṣaṇaṃ yadyapi nānupapannam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4678: na hi yata ityadhyāhṛtapadena karaṇamātraṃ parāmṛśyate tasyāprakṛtatvāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4681: indriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ jñānaṃ yataḥ pramāṇād bhavati tatpratyakṣam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4682: evaṃ ca vyabhicāriṇi kaḥ prasaṅga ityata āha--yadyapīti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4683: nanvavyabhicāripadakaraṇaṃ pramāṇapadānuvartanaṃ veti kaścid viśeṣa ityata āha--anyatheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4687: na hyuktarūpe dve pratyakṣe pūrvaṃ yasya jñānasya tadvyabhicāriṇīmapi pramāṃ janayet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4689: tathāpyevaṃbhūtapratyakṣadvayajanite saṃskāre nirṇaye ca anumānatvaprasaṅgastadavastha eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4690: tasmāt tannivṛttyarthaṃ pramāṇapadaṃ na kṛtaṃ cedavaśyamanuvartanīyamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4691: yadyevaṃ kimavyabhicāripadaprayojanamityata āha--tathāpīti nopayujyate na ca śakyate parasparāśrayaprasaḍgādityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4692: tathāpi niyamo na sphuṭībhūta ityata āha--tatreti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4699: ayaṃ ca niyamaḥ svarūpato 'pi phaladvāraiva pratyakṣamunnīyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4705: kāraṇamutpādakaṃ pratyāyakaṃ ca ubhayaṃ sādhayati---na hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4707: āgamasyāpi ca vaktṛśrotṛgatatvena pratyakṣāpekṣā utpattau jñaptau ca cato 'taḥ saṃmugdhamāha--evamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4708: tathāpyayamarthaḥ kathamavyabhicāripadopādānamātrat labhyata ityata āha--na hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4710: so 'yaṃ sūtrakārasyeha viśeṣataḥ prayatno jñāpayati yadetasminnavyabhicāriṇyanyatra vyabhicāraśaḍkaiva nāsti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4725: na cārthena kaścidartha upadarśito yamaprāpayannartho vyabhicaret /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4735: yathā hi sthāṇuradṛśyamānastathaiva puruṣatvenāpi daśyamāna iti tātparyam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4744: ayaṃ tu na tathetyata āha--no khalviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4750: na ca vācyaṃ bhrānterabhrāntipratiyogitvādaniyatasya cārthasya kvacidapi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4754: nanu sthāṇupuruṣāvubhāvapi yadyāropitau tadobhayopamardātmanā bādhakena bhavitavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4756: yathā yuktau rajatāṃśasya mithyātve śuklabhāsvaratvādiniścayasya satyatvam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4757: tathā ca sthāṇvaṃśe niścayaḥ puruṣāṃśe tvekakoṭisanniveśavāneva vibhrama iti saṃśayo dattajalāñjaliḥ prasaktaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4759: na syāt, yatra tāvadubhayoranubhayātmake pāṣāṇastambhādau samāropastatrobhayopamardātmaka eva bādhaka iti kimatra vaktavyam?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4762: yatra hi rajatatvārope 'pi śuklatvādau niścayastatrāropitānānopitayormitho virodhābhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4764: yatra tu parasparaviruddhau sa saṃśaya iti sarvamavadātam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4767: san vā sa udārārtho vyākhyātṛbhiḥ kimityupekṣitaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4777: sa ca saṃyogasamavāyakāryakāraṇabhāvarūpastāvanna saṃbhavatītyāha--na hyarthe śabdāḥ santīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4783: sa hi saṃvedanadharmo grāhyākārarūpo vā syāt?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4792: etaduktaṃ bhavati saṃvedanākāro hi jñātṛtvādistatsāmānādhikaraṇyena pratīyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4794: tasmād viṣayataḥ svarūpataśca yato 'sya nābhibhalāpasaṃsargayogyatāsambhavastasmādidamarthāt sarūpakādupajāyamānaṃ jñānaṃ vikalparūpamarthamevādarśayediti prasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4798: evaṃ cārthādupajātasyāpyaneko 'bhilāpo 'pyasya viṣayo yadi syāt ko doṣa ityata āha---na hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4799: rūpāccakṣuṣo viṣayādupajāyamānaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ vijñānaṃ nayanāviṣayarasasahitamatad rūpamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4817: yadi hi pratibhāsamānor'thopi vikalpasya janako bhavet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4831: anyathotprekṣāvyāpāratvād vikalpasya pravartakatvamapi na nirvahedityata āha--ātmīyamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4832: utprekṣā asadāropaṇaṃ yato bhavatyavaśyamato 'pyevamutprekṣāmaha iti vyāhāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4850: tadatra saḍketa eva niyāmako yadi syāt ko doṣa ityāśayavānāśaṅkate--saḍketeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4856: kimetāvatāpītyata āha--na ca tattat dṛṣṭaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ kiṃ tu svalakṣaṇaṃ darśanagocaraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4862: nanu sāmānyamapi kiṃ na darśanagocara ityata āha--na tu sāmānyamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4870: nanu sāmānyasya tāvadarthakriyāvirahād darśanagocaratvaṃ mā bhūt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4874: prayojyavṛddhāśca tathāvidhārthapratipattimantaḥ śābde vyavahāre upalabhyanta ityata āha--api ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4876: na cobhayavādisaṃpratipattiviṣayaḥ pratītamauṣṇyaṃ śītāpanodanaṃ karotītyapi kadācit /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4877: akurvaddhi sarvathā apratītaṃ na kuryādāropitaṃ vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4885: sā cāto nivarttamānā svavyāpyaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvamādāyaiva nivartate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4886: tataśca jātyādīnāṃ parasparamasambandhānna svatanatreṣu teṣu śabdo 'pi sukarasaḍketeḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4888: etena śabdasya vivekagrahasaṃbhave 'pi tadyojanā nirasto boddhavyā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4897: nanu na hyekajñānaviṣayau samānakāle 'ḍgulyau na kāryakāraṇabhūte iti niyatapūrvāparatve 'pi te sarvajñaikavijñānagocarau na tatheti yuktaṃ vaktum /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4900: kiṃ tarhi? yadanapekṣaṃ tat kāraṇam sāpekṣaṃ ca kāryamiti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4905: yattu naivaṃ na tat yathetyata āha--viśeṣaṇaṃ khalviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4913: sa cāyamekajñānagocarayorekakālayośca dvirūpo 'pi niyato nāsti yasmādityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4917: kṣaṇabhaṅgastu tvayāpyupapādanīyo mayāpibhañjanīya ityata āha--api ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4918: yadyapi tīrthikaiḥ kuṇḍādhāvaśānna badarasyaiva apatanadharmakasyotpādaḥ svīkriyate sthaimaśraddhājaḍatvāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4919: tathāpi gatinivṛttilakṣaṇāṃ gurutvapratibandhakasaṃyogalakṣaṇāṃ vā sthitiṃ taddharmabhūtā vidadhadeva badarasya kuṇḍamādhāratayā abhyupetaṃ taiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4922: yadyapi badaravajjātyādīnāṃ dharmasya kasyacidupajanāpāyarūpamupakāraṃ nābhyupagacchatyeva paraḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4925: sannityanena hi vikalpena sattvopakārasamartho viṣayīkṛtaḥ na ca tato 'nyaḥ kaścid dravyatvādyupakārasamartho 'sattvopakārasamartho 'sti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4927: tasmādete dravyavatvādyupakārasamarther'the sattvopakārasamarthābhedini pravartamānāstadadhikaraṇamarthamaspṛśanto 'narthakāḥ prasaktā iti samudāyārthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4928: bauddhasyātiparāmarśakuśalatāṃ codyasya cātitucchatāmālakṣyāsmākameva matilāghavaṃ saṃbhāvayiṣyatītyāśaḍkya tadgranthaṃ likhati--yadāheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4930: yasya darśane nānopādherapyarthasya dhīḥ vikalpadhīrgrāhikā bhedino viśiṣṭasya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4932: sarvātmanā sarvaiḥ upādhibhirekasvabhāvasyaivopakāryasya viśeṣyasya grahe sati ko bhedo bhidyata iti bhedo viśiṣyata iti yāvat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4934: api tu sarvopādhimirviśiṣṭo niścita eva syādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4935: emasyopādheḥ upakārakasvabhāve grāhye gṛhyamāṇe sati nopakārā upakārakāḥ svabhāvā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4936: upādhyantarāṇāṃ tato 'pare bhinna vidyante ye tasminnekopakārakasvabhāve dṛṣṭe 'pi na dṛṣṭāḥ syuḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4937: kiṃ nāma? sa ervekasvabhāvaḥ sarveṣāmupakārakaḥ tatasadgrahe tadekopādhiviśiṣṭagrahe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4939: nanu varaṃ vastusvabhāvavādamāsthāyānupakāryānupakārakayorapi viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaṃ spaṣṭadṛṣṭamupapādayituṃ śaktāḥ pare /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4942: evaṃ ca tvaccharāstvayyeva nipatitā ityata āha--asmākaṃ tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4952: atra tu viparyayo viṣayasyaiva pratibhāsasattayā buddhyadhīnatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4954: tattadvadviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭatayāpi kiṃ bhinno 'bhinno vetyatra vikalpa eva sākṣī,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4960: artho vikalpasya na gocaro janako 'pi netyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4982: tathā sati tasmānna kadācit apyālocanaṃ jāyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4984: sa khalu vāsanāparipāko yadi niyamādindriyārthamadhyamadhiśete kathaṃ na tadapekṣā kāryasya?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4986: sannidhisannihiteṣvapīndriyārtheṣu kadācid viśiṣṭād vāsanāparipākāt sākṣātkāravān vikalpa utpadyata /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4988: kiṃ tu nirvikalpakabhedāgrahāt tadvānivāvabhāsata iti cet--na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:4998: tathā ca vikalpasānnidhyādaupādhiko darśanavyāpāro 'yamālocanamiti kiṃ na syāt?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5000: anāgate vikalpe kathamiva taddharmo nirvikalpake pratibhāseteti cet--na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5008: hanta yadi sākṣātkāraḥ sākṣātkāravānutpadyate kathamasya tathātvamaupādhikam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5026: ajanakasyaiva tu vastusato viṣayatve pratyakṣatvamarthasāmarthyasamutthatvena vyāptamiti suptapralāpaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5031: tathā ca kathamasya viparītāroparūpasya saṃvādo nāmeti cet--na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5034: na hyanyadasādhāraṇādrūpāt samarthaṃ nāma tava darśane /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5042: na hi yad yatrāviruddhaṃ sat prathate tat tatrāropitaṃ nāma /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5050: na tāvat kalpanāgocarasyālīkasya kalpanayā abhedaḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5055: sa khalvākāro vikalpādabhinno 'pi bhinna āropyata iti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5058: grāhyākāre 'prāmāṇyaṃ vikalpasyāpi svātmani ca saṃvedanatvādubhayorapi prāmāṇyameveti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5060: tathāpi yādṛśākāro vikalpastādṛśākāra eva bāhyatayā pratibhāseta?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5062: tato yedatat sādhāraṇaṃ rūpamābhāti tanna vikalpākāramabhiniviśate
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5084: vyāvṛttyorbheda eva na tu vastunīti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5096: evaṃ sati sarva eva saugatenaprayujyamānāḥ kālātyayāpadiṣṭatayā pratipakṣahetavaḥ padamadhyāropayitumasamarthāḥ prāgeva vikalpasyāpratyakṣatāṃ sādhayitum /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5098: yadetāvatāpi na paramārthasad viṣayasya prāmāṇyaṃ sādhitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5100: nanu paramārthasato 'bhilāpasaṃsargayogyatā aśakyavyutpādanaiva kṣaṇikatvāt jagata ityata uktam--sthemabhājamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5101: nanu sthairyasiddhāvapi jātyādīnāṃ durūpapādatvāt kathaṃ paramārthasato 'bhilāpasaṃsargayogyatetyata uktam--jātyādimantam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5105: na hyasti saṃbhavo vikalpasyārthasāmarthyasamutthatvaṃ niścitamaniścitaṃ ca tadarthasya paramārthasattvam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5106: tathāpi paro 'pi tannirākaraṇasiddhyaiva pratyavasthito na rājājñayā nirākaraṇīyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5109: namu santu jātyādayaḥ paramārthabhūtāstathāpi yadi te 'pi piṇḍātmabhūtāḥ kathaṃ bhedena pratibhāsaren?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5112: tathāpi śabdo bhinnātmā atadvṛttiḥ kathamavacchedakaḥ syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5118: uktametat iti na hi tadvṛttitayaiva tatsaṃsarga iti niyamaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5119: api tu taṭasthenāpi jñāneneva jñeyasya vācakena vācyasya na viruddha ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5122: na tu śabdajñāne tadānīṃ śravaṇasya vyāpāraḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5125: tasmādyathā svpnāvasthāyāmindriyoparame 'pi pūrvasaṃskārapāṭavānmanasaivaikena avidyamānā apyarthā viṣayīkriyante,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5126: tathā aśabdavyāvṛttivikalpajanitavāsanāpaṭunā cakṣuṣaiva manasā vā śabdo 'pi viṣayīkriyata ityavidyamānaśabdālambanatvād bhrāntirevetyata āha--na ca śabdārthayoriti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5140: kevalaṃ kimiti niyamataḥ smaryate śabda ityavaśiṣyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5142: tatkimidānīṃ śabdasmaraṇasya na kaścidastyupayoga ityata āha--indriyajavikalpotpādaṃ prati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5147: śabdastu na niveśayatyātmānaṃ gṛhītaḥ smṛto 'pīti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5153: yadyapi saṃjñā hītyādi śloke sā taṭasthetyetāvadeva prakṛtopayogi,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5159: iti nyāyenātiśayaparamparotpādena pūrvāvasthāsmaraṇādisahakārimadhyamadhyāsīnaṃ yadevendriyaṃ tadeva vikalpajanakaṃ netaraditi nāsti kaścid virodhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5160: tathāpi vikalpasya sthiraviṣayatvāt kṣaṇikatvasvīkāre nirviṣayatvamāpādyeteti nisphalaḥ prayāsaḥ syāditi manyamānaḥ sthairyamālambyaiva pariharati--na ca janakatveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5165: indriyasaṃskārayoḥ parasparādhipatyaṃ viṣayabhedāt kīdṛśānna bhavati kiṃ pratipattyanubandhino,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5172: nanu vyāpāranubandhitayā saṃskārasya yadi purovartī viṣayaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5176: tasmādatītaviṣayatvāt kriyāyāḥ vyāpārānubandhitayāpi saṃskārasya sa eva viṣayaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5180: tasmāt tasyāpi vyāpāravataḥ purovartyeva viṣaya iti vyāpārato 'pi kathamekaviṣayateti?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5183: na hi cakṣuṣyapi sahakāriṇi gandhajñānād gamdhajñānam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5188: tathā sati gandhajñānād rasanādisahakāriṇo 'pi rūpajñānameva syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5190: tasmāt kevalasya cakṣuṣo yadyapi rūpameva vyāpāraviṣayaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5191: tathāpi pūrvāvasthāsaṃskārasahakārimatastadvāneva purovartī vyāpāraviṣaya iti na kaścid virodhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5192: pūrvāvasthā cakṣuṣā asannikṛṣṭā kathaṃ tadvyāpāraviṣaya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5200: atha savikalpake janayitavye pūrvāvasthāsmaraṇamevāvāntaravyāpāro na tu viṣayasambandhaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5210: tathāpi vidyamānadharmaviṣayaiva sā vyavasthitiriti na kaścit sūtravirodha iti yadyapi rahasyam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5219: tadeva tvekamanayoḥ kuta ityāśayavān codayati--nanu pūrvāpareti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5226: tannirākaraṇenaiva hi jātyādyabhāve apratisandhānātmakasyāpi vikalpasya pratyākhyānamayatnasiddhamityabhisandhiḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5238: tatra prathamaṃ yadi paro 'bhyupagacchedanukūlayedevāsmān tasmāt nānāvasthāviśiṣṭapāramārthikaikaviṣayatayāstyekatvaṃ parābhiprāyagocaraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5245: kiṃ tu sannihitaviṣayamasannihitaviṣayaṃ vā yadeva liḍgādinirapekṣeṇa indriyeṇa vijñānaṃ janyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5251: tathāpyabhyupagamavāde 'pi na kaścid virodha iti pratibandigraha iti mantavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5252: tasmād viṣayabhedādavirodha iti tvayā samādhātavyamiti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5255: nanvevaṃ sati dattaḥ svahasto bauddhānāmityata āha--sambandheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5263: na ca kadalīkāṇḍapratyabhijñānataḥ padmarāgapratyabhijñānasya kañcid viśeṣamupalabhāmahe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5266: atha nānādigdeśasaṃsargaḥ svāśrayaṃ bhedayitvā na nivartata iti niḥsvabhāvatā vāpādayet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5271: tathā hi yadi pūrvāparakālasaṃbandho vastuni virudhyeta,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5274: evaṃ ca buddhīnāṃ niyatārthatayā pratisandhānagandho 'pi na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5277: atītavartamānaviṣayatve 'pi naikaṃ jñānamatītaṃ vartamānaṃ ca svīkriyata iti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5278: atha kimidra ca vartamānatvam sattvaṃ sadantarasaṃbandho vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5280: tatra sadantaranaṣṭāntarasaṃbandhaḥ pratisandhāne sarvajñavijñāne cāstyeva naṣṭānaṣṭaviṣayatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5284: te caikatra pratisandhāne na sta iti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5287: sa eva tu satā kenacit saṃsṛṣṭaḥ kenacidasatā pratisandhānamiva sadasabhdyāṃ viṣayābhyāmiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5290: te yatra padmarāgādau na santi tatrautsargikamekatvameveti samaḥ samādhirityabhiprāyeṇa deśamantarbhāvyopasaṃharati--tasmāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5291: na cānyasya saṃbandhinaḥ kālasya bhedo viruddhadharmasaṃsargaḥ anyasya padmarāgamaṇerbhedaṃ nānātvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5295: na hi vayamapi vikalpamātraṃ prati tasya kāraṇatvaṃ brūmaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5302: aupādhikatvāt tasyeti āśaḍkya nirākaroti---na ca vikalpagata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5306: tasmād darśanavyāpārā vikalpā indriyārthasannikarṣajanmāna iti yojanā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5313: tasmād śabdaikaviṣayatayā pravartamāno vikalpo nendriyaviśayaṃ spṛśati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5314: tadasparśe ca na svābhāvikamasya sākṣātkāritvamityāśanayavānāśaḍkya nirākaroti---na ca śabdeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5315: ekatrārthe indriyaṃ kāraṇam anyatra tannirapekṣaḥ śabdādirityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5322: anyathā sannipātamūḍhasya svedane 'pi doṣāpagamo na syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5324: tuhinācalaguhāmadhyavartini ca sarvajñe vaḍavānalasākṣātkāravati tuhinācalavilayaḥ syādityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5333: sa eṣa nyāyo yadi paramārthasatyapi syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5335: na kevalaṃ kālpanike vyavahāre tavedaṃ samarthanamapi tu pāramārthike 'pītyāha---api ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5339: tathā caikekaparamāṇuniyame sthūlapratibhāso bhrānto 'pi na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5340: jñānasvabhāvatve 'pi ca paramāṇunāmapyekatvaprasaḍgādamūrtatvādiprasaḍgācceti sa eva doṣa ityādyuttānaṃ dūṣaṇamutsṛjya anyamāha---teṣāṃ sarvān pratīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5341: paramāṇūnāmekajñānasvabhāvatve vā na te dvitīyena viditā syurityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5342: yadyapi tādātmyābhāve 'pi jñānajñeyayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ saṃbandho viṣayaviṣayiniyamārthaṃ bauddhena svīkṛtastathāpi kāryakāraṇabhāve 'pi ko niyanteti tulyo 'nuyogaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5344: bhāvābhāvayoḥ samavāyatadvatorviṣayaviṣayiṇośca vayamapi svabhāvenaiva parasparopahitaṃ sambandhamātiṣṭhāmahe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5346: tathāpi sambandho 'pyanubhūyamāno vinā bādhakaṃ nopekṣituṃ yujyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5354: nanvasti vyavahāro na tu vāstavaḥ, sa ca
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5358: tvaduktameva vāsanādvāramupādāya yeti vāstava evāyaṃ vyavahāraḥ syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5360: tathāpi vāstava evāyamityatra kiṃ pramāṇamityata āha---tathā satīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5365: manasaḥ sarvaviṣayatvaṃ na tāvad vyāpārānubandhitayā parasya vivakṣitam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5370: asmākaṃ tu manaḥ sarvaviṣayakamapi na pratipattyanubandhitayā asarvaviṣayamapratipattirūpatvāt iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5371: na ca sakalasaṃskārādhāratayetyāha--acetanatayā na vicārakam iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5373: tvadabhipretasya ca manasaḥ sakalavāsanādhārakatvaṃ niṣetsyata ityanenābhiprāyeṇāha--tasmādātmaiveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5380: tarhi nirvikalpakotpattikāla eva labdhasaskārasacivatayā vikalpameva janayedityata āha--sa khalviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5385: tatsahāyaśca vikalpayatīti na cakṣuṣaḥ kaścidupayoga ityata āha--cakṣuṣeti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5386: nanvevaṃbhūtā sāmagrī militāpi yadi cakṣurvyāpāravirahe na vikalpikāṃ dhiyam upajanayet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5389: etena sākṣātkāraṃ prati tasyānvayavyātirekau sta iti darśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5392: tathāpi ka upakāraḥ samarthita ityata āha--teneti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5396: tadarthālocanānugataṃ smaraṇaṃ yayoste viśeṣaṇaviśeṣye tathokte tayoḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5398: yadyapi svābhāviko viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo nopakāramapekṣata iti tatra tatra vakṣyati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5403: prathamataḥ svabhāve gṛhyamāṇe kiṃ na gṛhītam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5404: na ca svabhāvastadānīṃ na gṛhīta ityata āha--arthau hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5405: na khalu rūpaparamāṇuṣu sparśādiparamāṇavo 'pi svabhāvataḥ sthitā ityetāvataiva pratītipathamavataranti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5408: ata eva pramāṇaṃ kṛtsnavṛttīti matvā yadāpāditam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5411: svābhāvikasamastasambandhābhiprāyeṇa tu sarvajñetaradhiyāmaprāmāṇyamāpādayatīti upasaṃhāraṃ sthāne saṃkalayyāhā---savikalpakaṃ tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5419: pītaḥ śaḍkha ityādinā vyabhicāranivṛttyartham avyabhicāritve satīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5421: na caitanmantavyamiti bhāṣyamiti indriyārthasannikarṣamantareṇāpi saṃśayotpattidarśanāt atatkāraṇatayā prasaṅga evāsya nāsti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5423: yadyapi na savaḥ saṃśayaḥ indriyārthasannikarṣajastathāpi sākṣātkāravānavaśya tajjanyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5426: mana eva kevalamindrayanirapekṣaṃ bahirvyāpriyamāṇaṃ sākṣātkārisaṃśayādi janayati, dṛṣṭo
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5437: bāhyena viśeṣyeṇāpyasannikṛṣṭaṃ manaḥ kathamiva jñānamutpādayet? utpādane
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5449: saṃvedanatve hi teṣāṃ svasaṃvedanatā śaḍkāspadamapi syāditi śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5450: nanvindriyasya vai sata iti vadato bhāṣyakṛto manasa indriyatvamiṣṭamevetyata āha---na ca taditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5451: manasa indriyatvābhyupagamo vātsyāyanīye gautamīyasūtra viruddha ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5453: tathāpi sūtrākārasya mana indriyaṃ yadyabhimatamindriyaprakaraṇa eva lakṣayedityata āha---tatra ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5454: indriyatvena tatprakaraṇa evābhighāne prāpte yadanyatra karoti tenādhikamasya kiñcid rūpaṃ vijñeyamiti sūcayati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5456: darśayiṣyati hi vātikakāra ityāgāmikā phakkikā bhramanirāsārthaṃ bhūtābhūteti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5461: manastu na saguṇamindrayamityatrāpi yo viśeṣaguṇo yenendriyeṇa gṛhyate tajjātīyena guṇena saha vṛttiḥ saguṇatvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5462: grāhyaviśeṣaguṇajātīyavirahaśca manasa iti yadyabhipretaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā tadaitadapi vaidharmyameva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5465: tathā hi, indriyabhūtānāmeṣāṃ saguṇatvaṃ grāhyairguṇaiḥ saha saṃbandhaścakṣurādīnām /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5467: na grāhyena guṇena saha saṃbandha iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5475: satrākāravacanasya vivādāspadatvāt kathaṃ tenaiva nirṇaya ityata āheti pūrayati bhāṣyakāra iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5476: śābdetyanena śabdendriyasamāhārajamayamasāvaśva iti jñānaṃ vyavacchedyamabhimataṃ vārttikakṛta iti keṣāñcinmatamapanayati---na khalviti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5477: vācyatvena hi viśeṣaṇatayā gṛhītena niśeṣyaniṣṭhena bhavitvayamataḥ kevalavācyatvaprastāve 'pi tathaivodāhṛtam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5479: gṛhīte hyaśvatve tadasannikarṣe 'pi yo 'yaṃ piṇḍastvayā dṛṣṭo 'yamasāvaśva ityupadeśāt kevalādeva vācyatvapratītidarśanāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5487: tayośca ko 'tra manasā vedyata iti bhavāneva paribhāvayatu /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5489: asākṣātkāritvapakṣe ca nedam aindriyakamiti prathamapadeneva vyudastam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5497: sa ca tadābhāseṣu āviṣkṛteṣu bhavatītyāśayavataḥ ayamārambha ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5498: tator'thādityatra hi pañcamyā hetutvamarthasya vijñānaṃ pratidarśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5499: tatparaśca evakāraḥ evaṃ saṃbadhyate--sa vyapadeśakor'tho hetureva yasya na punaraheturapi tadvijñānaṃ pratyakṣamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5501: tathāpyanyayogavyavacchedo 'pi vārttikakṛtā nirākartavya iti vyākhyāyāmubhayaṃ darśitavān /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5505: tato na tasya vyudāsaḥ kṛta ityata āha--tator'thādityatra hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5513: tena vyapadeśo hi tadupādhikaṃ nirūpaṇami vivakṣitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5514: na ca jñānaṃ kartrā karaṇena vā nirūpyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5527: indriyādayo hyavyapadeśakā api vyapadeśakādhipatyenaiva jñānajanakā ityavirodhitayā na te vyavacchedyāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5528: liḍgādayastu vyapadeśakādhipatyanirapekṣatayā tadvirodhina iti ta evānye vyavacchettavyā ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5531: nanu bhrāntijñānamapi na vyapadeśakam antareṇa bhavati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5535: tadidamuktam--yena viśeṣarūpeṇa tasya vyapadiśyate na tatastabhdavatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5536: tasmād yattata eva bhavati tato bhavatyevetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5538: nanu vyapadeśakādanutpatterityavyapadeśakādutpatteriti vā codyamupakrābhyāśakte rajatāt notpadyata iti vākchalamātrāmityata āha--na hyatasmādāropitād rūpāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5552: kathaṃ punā rajataṃ vyapadeśakaṃ svātantryeṇa purovartyātmanā vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5556: purovartyātmanā ca pratyantare tad bhavati vyapadeśakam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5568: vyapadeśako hyartho vartamānatayā sarvatra pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5570: tathā ca pratyakṣatve sādhye 'pratyakṣatvameva sidhyatīti bhavati viruddhatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5571: atha vartamāna eva vyapadeśakastadā samānakālatayā tator'thādityasiddhamāha--tatsamāneti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5578: sa ca bhinnakālayoreva bhavatīti svabhāṣayā samarthitaṃ pareṇa /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5579: na ca vayaṃ bhinnakālayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaviśeṣam avajānīmahe;
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5580: kiṃ tvatītasya vartamānatayāvabhāsanaṃ tasya vā satyatvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5583: anene hi na pratibhāsamānatayārtho grāhya iti vyavahniyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5586: sa ca jñānātmabhūtatayā vartamāna eveti na kaścid virodha ityata āha--anahaḍkāreti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5589: asatyaścenna pratayakṣaṃ pramāṇamiti seyamubhayataḥ pāśā rajjurityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5610: yadāhuḥ--pratyakṣasiddhenākāreṇa artho 'numīyata iti phalataḥ pratyakṣor'tha iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5615: yaśca sarvathaiva jñānāgocaraḥ sa vyavahniyata iti kutaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5619: na hi kiñcid vastubhūtaṃ vācyaṃ nāma saugatānāṃ samasti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5622: jñānasya kalpanāpoḍhasya pratyakṣatayā vyutpādyamānasya kathaṃ sarver'thā pratyakṣatayā prasajyerannityata āha--na hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5631: manuṣyaśabdasya brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇatvādijātimattayā avācyo 'pi manuṣyatvajātimattayā vācya evetyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5634: na tu tattacchabdasya prakṛtatayā viṣayaḥ kaścidastītyāha--buddhyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5635: yadyapi pratyakṣajñānamapyanena lakṣaṇena svātmani pratyakṣaṃ na syādeva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5636: tathāpīndriyārthasannikarṣajanyatvamātraṃ tāvat tatrāpyastīti kadācit paro brūyādityata āha--anumānādīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5649: nāpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamityanena hi viśeṣaniṣedhena kaṇṭhataḥ anumānaprāmāṇyaniṣedhor'thataḥ pratyakṣaprāmāṇyavidhiśca vivakṣitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5671: vyāptismṛtisahāyād dvitīyaliṅgadarśanādevānumitisiddheralaṃ tṛtīyaliṅgadarśanakalpanayeti yathāśrutabhāṣyānusāriṇaḥ tān risyati na ceti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5673: yastu sahakārilābhādanyo na kaścidudbodho nāmeti manyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5679: na ca vyāptiviśiṣṭaṃ liṅgamekaikasyobhayasya vā gocaraḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5685: dvitīyaliṅgadarśanaṃ hi vasatugatyā liṅgaviṣayamityetāvataiva vyāptismṛteḥ sahakāriliṅgatvarūpollekhitayā vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5693: iha tādātmyatadutpattisvarūpādiniścaye pratibandhaniścayastadā na syāt yadi te eva pratibandhaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5702: tatra ca sahacārāvasāyaḥ tāvadindriyasannikarṣādhīnotpattiḥ tadutpattyaniścaye 'pi vahnidhūmayoḥ sidhyati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5704: atīndriyāstu upādhayaḥ anyatra pramāṇaparidṛṣṭāḥ śaḍkitā api yathā nivartante,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5710: tadāsmākamapi svābhāvikasaṃbandhasiddhau vipakṣe bādhakapramāṇavṛttyaiva śaḍkānivṛttiriti samaḥ samādhiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5713: tadidamuktam--sa ca yo vā sa veti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5714: na ca samānopāyatvādubhayoranyatarāniścaye nānyataraniścaya iti sāmpratam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5718: tayoreva pratibandhaḥ paryavasyatīti pakṣaṃ nirācaṣṭe--api ca rasāditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5719: yattu bhede sati vyāpyavyāpakābhāva eva kāryakāraṇabhāva eva kāryakāraṇabhāva iti vyudapādi prajñākareṇa tat pāpādapi pāpīyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5720: tathā hi niyāmakavirahe bhinnāyoravyabhicāraḥ śaḍkākalaḍkāḍkitatvāt duravadhāraṇa iti tāmapanetuṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'nenopanītaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5721: sa ced rūpa eva kathaṃ tanniścayenaivāvyabhicāraniścayaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5722: na caitat kīrteranumataṃ yad rasena rūpānumāne 'nyathābhyupāyamāha--yadi ca sarvalokasiddhamativāhya svayaṅkṛtalakṣaṇairvyavahāraḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5739: api ca rasarūpayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaniścayo vahnidhūmayoriva pratyakṣānupalambhasādhyo vā syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5745: na hi vahneriva rūpasya pūrvakālatāniyamaṃ dhūmasyeva rasasya praścādbhāvitāniyamaṃ laukikāḥ pratipadyante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5746: kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhinyāyastu na laukika iti vastuto laukikānāṃ rasato rūpānumānaṃ na syādityāha---laukikānāṃ cedamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5747: api ca ityanena te eva pratibandha iti nirastam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5748: tādātmyaṃ tu gamyagamakabhāve pratyuta viruddhamityāha--api ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5754: na hyasti saṃbhavaḥ sāmānyamaniścitaṃ niścitastu viśeṣa ityāśaḍkya kenacit samarthitam utthāpya dūṣayati---yatviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5755: bhinnayoreva vyāvṛttyorgamyagamakabhāvaḥ kiṃ tvabhinnādhyavaseyasaṃbandhāt tayorapi tādātmyaṃ vyavahniyata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5771: tathāpi yatra sphuṭo vyabhicārastatra niṣphalamupādhyanusaraṇaṃ tadarthatvāt tasya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5778: atha dhūmādīnāmapi vahnyādibhiḥ kathaṃ svābhāvika ityata āha---svābhāvikastviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5781: tat kimatra nāsau sphuṭa ityata āha---kvacidvyabhicārasyādarśanāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5782: nanu kvacit kadācid vyabhicāro 'pi syādayogyatvācca na dṛśyetāpītyata āha---anupalabhyamānasyāpi kalpanānupatteḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5786: sa eva tūpādhyabhāvaḥ kutastya ityāśaṅkate---na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5789: anyathā sarvaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ sarvadā sarvatra sarveṣāṃ jātyā kaścit anupalabhyamāno 'pi syādupādhiriti śaḍkā tadutpattāvapi brahmaṇāpyapanetumaśakyā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5790: nānāpramāṇagocarārthasākṣātkāravataḥ sarvajñasyāpi svabhāvata evānupalabhyaḥ kaścidartho bhavet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5797: yatra pramāṇāni paribhūya śaḍkāpiśācī prasarati kutastatrārthasaṃbhāvanāpi?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5801: yadyapi viśiṣṭāhārānantaraṃ bhūyo bhūyaḥ puṣṭidhātusāmyādi daśyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5803: tathāpi āhāraviśeṣo maraṇasyaiva hetuḥ kadācid bhavet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5811: na hi puṣṭyādikāraṇairdṛśyaireva bhavitavyamityapi kadācit syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5820: sādhane sopādhiḥ sādhye nirūpādhireva upādhitvena niśceyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5841: na ca kṛtakatvānuṣṇatvayoḥ saṃbandhe tejojātīyetaratvavadihāpi sādhyadharmajātīyetaratvamupādhiḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5843: ata eva upādhimapaśyanto 'pi virodhipramāṇasadasadbhāvaniścayavyagratayā muhūrtam anumitau vilambāmahe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5844: tadevaṃ sarvathopādhyanupalambhāt tadabhāvaniścayo yathā dhūmasaṃbandhe tathānyatrāpi draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5847: na tu svabhāvāvalambanenaiva vastuvyavasthetyāśayavān pṛcchati---kena punariti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5849: dvitīyādibhistu śaḍkāmātramapanīyata iti keṣāñcinmatamapanayanneva prakṛtaṃ prapañcayati---yadā tāvaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5851: yo 'yamupādhimādāya yena saha saṃbadhyate sa nirūpādhyavasthāyāṃ tasyāgamako yathā vahnirdhūmasya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5853: kevalasyaiva sāmarthye sa eva gamako na tūpahitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5855: yatra tūpādhiḥ kevalo vyabhicārī tatra sopādhirapi gamaka eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5876: anyato 'nāgatasya tatrāsatastadanantaram upalambhe 'pi tato 'nyasmādanutpatteḥ bhāvamātreṇa niścetumaśakyatvāt ;
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5882: dhūmādīnāṃ maitratanayatvādīnāṃ ca bhūyodarśanatvāviśeṣe 'pi kuto viśeṣādekasya gamakatvamaparasya natyata āha---na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5884: yathā hyanārdendhane vahnau na dhūma iti vahnestatsaṃbandhe tathāvidhamindhanamupādhiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5885: tathā yadi maitrājjātasyāpi kasyacid vivakṣitāhārapariṇativiraheṇa śyāmatopālapsyata sa
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5891: tathā hi nopahitasya niścita eva sādhyavyabhicāraḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5899: nanu vajre lohalekhyatvaṃ prati pārthivatvahetoḥ ka upādhiḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5902: na khalu nibiḍāvayavatvena ubhayoḥ kaścid viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5904: na hyadbhyo medinī nibiḍeti na praśithilāvayavā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5906: yathā yathā śaithilyāpakarṣastathā tathā lekhituḥ prayatnaprakarṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5907: yadi tu śaithilyamaprayojakaṃ tadā mṛtkāṣṭhapāṣāṇādiṣu prayatnaprakarṣo 'pi viphalaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5917: sa ca bādhaikaniyataviṣaya iti nātiprasaṅga ityuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5919: yadyapi dvitīyaliṅgadarśanasya smṛtyā saha vinaśyadavasthasyaiva parāmarśajanakatvaṃ kvacit,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5920: tathāpi yatra dṛṣṭamātra eva vahninivṛttau nivṛtto dhūmaḥ kālāntare jijñāsāvaśāt parāmṛśyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5922: yena ca parāmarśo neṣyate tena vākyasya caturtho 'vayava apanayo 'pi neṣitavyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5924: svārthānumāne tu sā dvitīyaliṅga darśanādevāvagateti kiṃ parāmarśeneti cet---na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5933: nāsti cet, parārthānumāne 'pi liṅgaparāmarśaikārthaḥ upanayo 'pi nādaraṇīyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5938: tathāpyasaṃbaddhatvāviśeṣāt kathaṃ tasyaiva vyāpārānubandhitetyāśaḍkya pariharati--na cātiprasaṅga iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5939: na dhūmajñānasyāgniḥ svatantrasya vyāpāraviṣayo yenāsaṃbaddhatvāviśeṣādatiprasaṅgaḥ syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5941: tasya ca jñāyamānasya dhūmasyāgninā saha niyāmakaḥ svabhāvasaṃbandha eva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5943: pūrvaṃ lakṣyapadārthapraśnāvasare anumīyate 'neneti kāraṇārtha ityuttaraṃ dattam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5944: idānīmanumitiḥ kasyāñcidavasthāyāmanumānaṃ pramāṇaṃ bhavena veti vijñāsāpraśne bhāvaḥ karaṇaṃ vetyuttaram /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5947: ataḥ ṭīkākṛd api vyāpāratvenāpramāṇyaṃ pūrvapakṣayitvā phalāntarahetutvena prāmāṇyaṃ samarthayati sma /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5954: tathāpi vivakṣābhedāt vikalpenobhayamubhayatra saṃbhantsyata iti vivakṣitvā ekaikakaniṣṭhatayaikaikaṃ darśitamiti tathaiva vyākhyātavān /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5956: vipakṣāvṛttiriti vārttike bahuvrīhisamāsasthito viśeṣaṇatayā vyatireko niṣkṛṣya svapradhānatayā tatpuruṣapadena pradarśito vipakṣāvṛttirvyatireka iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5963: mūḍhapraśnānurodhād vā dharmāntaraṃ prati pūrvavadeva svavacanavirodhabhayād veti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5970: na tvekena satā niṣedhyena niṣedhādhikaraṇena vetyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5971: nanu sata eva kutaścit pramāṇapratītānnivartsyatītyata āha---pakṣādanyasyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5977: yatra khalu bhāvaḥ sarvathaiva na nirūpitaḥ tadadhikaraṇatayā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5980: yatra tu śṛḍgābhāvo 'pi gaganakamalādau nirūpayituṃ na śakyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5990: yadyapi svavacanavirodhabhiyāpi sarvathāvicārāsahor'thaḥ svīkartuṃ na śakyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5992: anyathā vikalpaśabdau na vastugocarāviti svavacanavirodhādeva parihartavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:5994: śabdasya ca samayādhīnapravṛttikatayā vikalpasya ca tadekaviṣayatayā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6001: tathāpi tattvaṃ nirūpayan pariharati---na vai tattvata iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6002: nanu yadi naikataraniṣedho vidhirvā tat kimubhayavidhiḥ niṣedho vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6003: tathā sati atitarā durghaṭamāpadyetetyata āha---no khalviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6005: anyathā punarapi svavacanapratirodha ityata āha---upayoge veti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6009: no khalu sakalavyavahārābhājanaṃ ca tanniṣedhavyavahārabhājanaṃ ceti vacanaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6018: vyavahniyata iti pakṣe tu viṣayasvarūpaparyālocanenaiva virodhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6019: na hi sarvavyavahārābhājanaṃ ca vyavahniyate ceti ca //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6026: na hi bandhyāyāḥ suto na sutaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6028: vacanamātrametanna tu paramārthataḥ suta evāsāviti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6034: asutatvanivṛttimātrasya svarūpataḥ kṛtijñaptyorasāmarthye samarthamarthāntaramavaseyam anantarbhāvya kuto hetutvamiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6042: na hi bandhyāsutaścetanādiva devadattāderacetanādapi kāṣṭhāderna vyāvartate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6044: vaktṛtvaṃ vastvekaniyato dharmaḥ sa kathamavastuni sādhyo virodhāditi cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6045: sa punarayaṃ virodhaḥ kutaḥ pramāṇāt siddhaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6051: na hyavaktṛtvamapi vastuviviktaṃ kasyacit pramāṇasya viṣayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6059: sarvasāmarthyavirahe vacanasāmarthyaviraho na viruddha iti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6060: atha sarvasāmarthyaviraho bandhyāsutasya kutaḥ pramāṇāt siddhaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6064: soyaṃ kevalairvacanairitastato nirdhanādhamarṇika iva sādhūn bhrāmayan parasparāśrayadoṣamapi na paśyati //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6083: na hyapratīte devadattādau sa kiṃ gaurakṛṣṇo veti vaiyātyaṃ vinā praśnaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6084: tatrāpi yadyeko 'pratītaparamārthaviṣaya evottaraṃ dadāti na gaura iti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6085: aparo 'pi kiṃ na dadyād gaura iti?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6092: na ca pramāṇāspadameva vyavahārāspadamityasti niyama ityata āha---na cātyanteti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6093: yadyapi sarvathāpratīte vyavahārābhāva iti vadato bauddhasyāpi svavacanavirodha eva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6094: tathāpyayaṃ virodhaḥ prāgevodbhāvitaprāya ityenamupekṣya śaḍkāmātraṃ samarthitam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6097: tathā sati kiñcidāropyaṃ kiñcidāropaviṣaya iti syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6111: tathā cānanvitāḥ padārthā evānvitatayā parisphurantīti viparītakhyātirevāvartate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6130: sa vicāryamāṇaḥ pūrvaṃ nyāyaṃ nātivartata iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6133: na cārthakriyāviśeṣo 'pyasti yato viṣayaviśeṣamunnīya tatra saḍketo gṛhyatām /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6138: tadviṣayo 'sya vācya iti sugrahaḥ samaya iti vācyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6141: na ca viśeṣāntaravinākṛtaḥ kalpanāmātraviṣayo 'sya vācya iti sāmpratam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6143: na ca sarve pratipattāraḥ svavāsanayā asadarthaśabdasambandhapratipattibhāja iti sāmpratam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6145: na hi svayaṅkṛtaṃ saḍketamagrāhayitvā paro vyavahārayituṃ śakyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6147: na ca gāṃ badhānetivat śaśaviṣāṇāpadārthe vṛddhavyavahāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6149: na ca yathā gaustathā gavaya iti vadupalakṣaṇātideśaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6150: na ceha prabhinnakamalodare madhūni madhukaraḥ pibatītivat prasiddhapadasāmānādhikaraṇyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6158: tatra na tāvat kramayaugapadyayoḥ śaśaviṣāṇe 'bhāvaḥ pramāṇagocaraḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6166: etāvataiva tadabhāvo 'pi ghaṭavirahasvabhāvaḥ siddha iti cet---na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6168: na cānyasya svabhāve pramāṇagocare tadanyo 'pi siddhaḥ syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6170: evaṃbhūtāveva ghaṭatadabhāvau yadekasya paricchittirevāparasya vyavasthitiriti cet---na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6173: na tu svabhāvavādālambanenaiva vastuparicchittiriti hi bhavatāmeva tatra tatra jayadundubhiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6179: tat kimidānīṃ svābhāvavirahasvabhāvo ghaṭaḥ pramāṇānaiva siddhaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6181: ghaṭo hi yādṛktādṛksvabhāvastāvat pramāṇapathamavatīrṇaḥ tasya yadi paramārthataḥ abhāvo 'pi kaścit syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6182: paramārthataḥ so 'pi tadvirahasvabhāva iti tathaiva pramāṇāveditaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6185: aprāmāṇikatve vā anayorapi na tathābhāva iti śaśaviṣāṇādiṣvapīyameva gatiḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6187: dahanavattvādisādhane prameyatvādau śabdānityatvādisādhane cākṣuṣatvādau nityatvādisādhane kṛtakatvādāvityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6195: sā ca na siddheti kutastasya hetutvam?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6196: evaṃ prāmāṇikāt śabde 'pi pakṣīkṛte prāmāṇika eva hetusadbhāvo /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6197: vaktavyaḥ na cāsau cākṣuṣatvasyāstīti so 'pi kathaṃ hetuḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6198: evaṃ kṛtakatvasyāpi vastvekaniyatasya dharmasya vāstava evānvayo vaktavyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6199: vastuno vipakṣācca vāstava eva vyatireko vaktavyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6203: na hi niyāmakamantareṇa saṃpadaṃ prati kalpanā tvarate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6204: vipadaṃ prati tu vilambata iti śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6205: tathā ca niragnikamapi kūrmaroma sadhūmamiti kalpanāmātreṇa vipakṣavṛttitvād dhūmo nāgni gamayet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6207: tarhi vāstavyāmasaṃpattau kiṃ kālpanikyā tayeti samānam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6212: dhūmo vastubhūto yena kūrmaromṇastena saha virodhaḥ syāt?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6214: nirdhūmatvamapi kvacid vastubhūtamiti tenāpi virodha eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6216: tathā kālpanikī saṃpattirapi na guṇāyeti tasyāśca sarvatra sulabhatvāditi ṭīkārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6217: etaccābhyupetyoktam---vastutastu na na nirūpākhyaṃ kasyacid vyavahārasya bhājanamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6220: yatra vacane sarvathaiva virodhasatatrāvacanameva śreya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6223: gamakatve vā vyatirekavikalavad rūpāntaravikalamapi tathā kiṃ na syādaviśeṣādityāśaḍkyāha---na caitāvateti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6225: evaṃ tarhi satyapi vipakṣe vyatireko na paryeṣaṇīya ityata āha---vipakṣasambhave tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6230: na hi tāyābhyavaharaṇe 'pyasamarthasya mumūrṣoḥ śaṣkulībhakṣaṇaṃ śaṅkate cetana ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6232: asya tu kālpaniko 'pi vipakṣaḥ pareṇābhidhātuṃ na śakyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6235: tasya kiṃ vipakṣe vṛttiravṛttirveti praśne anenottarakovidena kiṃ vaktavyam?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6236: mūkībhūya tiṣṭhāsostu na kaścit pratimalla iti svayamevollapitamanena /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6238: arūcimātrasya sarvatra sulabhatvāditi bhāgāsiddhinirākāraṇāya vyāptyeti vadataḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6241: tadidam uktaṃ ṭīkākṛtā---asti gandhavatvasya sādhyaṃ na tu vyāptyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6242: nanu sādhyasajātīye śeṣaśabdasya na kācid vṛttirityata āha---sādhyasyopayuktatvāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6255: kiṃ lakṣaṇam iti jijñāsāyāṃ pūrvavadityādyekavākyatayā vyākhyānena parāmarśaviṣayaḥ saṃjñito vibhakto lakṣitaśca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6274: śeṣavallakṣaṇayoge 'pi tadudāharaṇāntaravailakṣaṇyenedameva sāmānyatodṛṣṭapadārthe bhaviṣyatītyata āhā---na caitāvateti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6285: prāḍmukhopalabhyatve cetyasya ṭīkayā sphoritasya prāḍmukhopalabdhasya prāḍmukhenānupalambhe satītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6287: anyathā mārtaṇḍamaṇḍalasyāpi lokāntaravartipuruṣāpekṣayā prāḍmukhopalabhyatā durvāretyasiddhaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6290: na hi yathātathā pādavihāraṇamātramasya hetoḥ kṣatimāvahatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6291: satyavināśe iti ca draṣṭavyam sati draṣṭavyatva iti veti śeṣaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6292: iha yadyapi diśaḥ pratyakṣatve sādhye 'ḍgulyā nirdeśo vyadhikaraṇaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6295: tathāpi yasyāṃ diśi ete taravaḥ sā prācīti tarvādibhedena apyaḍgulyā vyapadeśo 'stīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6296: na vyadhikaraṇatvamāhatyābhidhātuṃ śakyata ityanenābhiprāyeṇa anyathāsiddhimeva vārtikārthamāha---anyathāsiddhatayeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6298: calantīṃ patākāmupalabhyāyaṃ vāyurvātīti aḍagulīnirdeśasyācākṣuṣe vāyāvapi gatatvena vyabhicārasya api saṃbhavāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6301: vṛkṣādarśane sandehe vā na śiśapādarśana niścayo vā tato 'navasaraparāhatamevānumānam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6312: tathā sati śiśapātvādayaṃ vṛkṣo vyavahartavyaḥ iti śiśapātvameva vṛkṣaśabdapravṛttinimittamākalayet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6326: sāmānyena kāryaṃ vā kāraṇaṃ vā anubhayātmakaṃ vā avinābhāvitayā dṛṣṭaṃ niścitaṃ sāmānyatodṛṣṭameva ca yojanā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6331: yadyapi pratipannaṃ pratyanumānasya na saṃśayaviparyayanivṛttirajñātajñānaṃ vopayogaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6333: tenādivākye pratipannaḥ pratipādayiteti pratipanna eva pratipādayitā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6349: kāryatvaṃ punarasyānupalabdhikāraṇabhāve sati anupalabdhasyopalabhyamānatvād vā pratyakṣād veti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6354: tathāpi bhāṣyakārīyo heturūpekṣitaḥ syādityato 'vyāpakatāmātraṃ prasādhyaiva prakṛte lagayati---karṇeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6370: kṣityādikaṃ sakartṛkaṃ kāryatvādityatra sarvajñatvamantareṇa kṣityādīnāṃ kartṛtvameva nopapadyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6382: etaduttarakālaṃ kṣityādau bādhite tadanyāsiddhau vidhāyakapramāṇābhāvānniṣedhamukhena vyatirekī pravartate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6383: tamimaṃ viśeṣaṃ hṛdi nidhāyoktam---bādhakairapanīte dravyāṣṭakaguṇatva iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6392: na hi vākyārthasayāpūrvatayā padārthānāṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo vihanyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6407: athavā pratyekotthitaḥ saṃśayaḥ samudāye viśrāmyatīti nyāyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6412: uta tadatiriktāśritā ityanenākāreṇa sarvadravyeṣu bhavan sandehaḥ samānadharmadarśanādeva dravyāṣṭakatadatiriktakoṭyoreva paryavasito bhavati
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6416: tadiha vartamānāvartamānārthatvavyākhyānaṃ tadviruddhamapi kuta upādīya ityata āha---pratyakṣaṃ hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6417: atha tathaiva kiṃ na syādityata āha---yadyapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6422: nyāyābhāvena hi tarkasya niścayāparyāptau sandehastadavastha ityāśaḍkitam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6428: na tatsādhye samavāya ityata āha---nimittatvaṃ kāraṇatvamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6435: deśasyāvacchedakatāmātreṇa saptamyā nirdeśo vane sihanāda itivat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6437: na hyātmādayaḥ sarvatropalabhyante ityata uktam---satyupalabdhikāraṇa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6438: tathāpi viṣayasyāpyupalabdhikāraṇatvād yatra yatra ghaṭādiparamāṇvantāḥ svopalabdhisāmagrīsahitāḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6439: tatra tatropalabhyanta eveti taireva vyabhicāra ityata uktam---antareti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6450: kartrā avyāpāryamāṇasya karaṇasya svayaṃ vyāpārāyogādityāśayavāniti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6453: na syāt? na hi kāryasyānādhāratvamasyeṣṭamevetyata āha---syādetaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6455: na hyutpanno 'pyasaṃyukta eva turyā prathamekṣaṇe paṭa iti kasyacinniścayaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6457: tathotpanne 'pi prathame kṣaṇe tantuṣvasamaveta eveṣyata iti pādau prasārya tiṣṭhato nedamuttaramityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6461: anavasthābhiyā avaśyamantataḥ kācit prāptiśca na ca vṛttimatīti svīkartavyam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6464: anāditāyāṃ hyaḍkurotpādānuguṇasamayasaṃbhavinā bījena janite 'ḍkureṇa janite bīje vartamānaṃ bījatvaṃ tasyāḍkurapūrvakatāmavagamayatīti yujyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6466: idaṃprathamatāyāṃ tu kāryotpādānuguṇasamaye bhaviṣyatpravāhasyāsattvāt prathamasyānutpāde tadāśrayasya hetostasminnasatyāśrayāsiddhatayā sarvasyāgamakatve pramāṇābhāva ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6468: kāryamakṛtakasaṃbandhavaditi pratijñāyāṃ ghaṭāderbhūtalādināpyakṛtaka eva saṃbandhaḥ syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6472: anyathā jātyādiṣu vipakṣeṣu saṃbhave hetorvirodhaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6490: nanu vidhīyamānaniṣidhyamānavyatirekeṇa jagati na svatantro nāma /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6499: tadevaṃ vidhīyamānaḥ svatantro vidhīyamānaḥ paratantraḥ pratiṣidhyamānaḥ svatantraśceti tisro vidhā ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6516: asattayā sattayā vānabhyupagamāditi sattāyā jāyamānatayā virodhāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6518: kathaṃ nābhyupagamyate na hi sattāsattābhyāmanyaḥ prakāro 'stītyata āha---niṣedhaviṣayatayā tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6521: tasmāt jāyamāne ghaṭe na vidhāyakapratyakṣapravṛttiḥ, virodhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6522: niṣedhakaṃ taṃ pratyakṣaṃ pravartamānamapi tanniṣedhameva gocarayet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6532: nanu tathāpyubhayorapi pṛthivīdravyaśabdayorūbhayavācitvāt kathaṃ viśeṣapratipattirityata āha---na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6535: dravyatvaṃ ca pṛthivītyapi na bhavatītyapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6542: nanu aniyataprasareṇāsati nāstīti sahiteneṣṭalābho yadyapi tathāpi sarvathā sapakṣāvṛttirasādhāraṇo 'pi nivartayitavyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6543: na hi pakṣavyāpako vipakṣe ca nāstyevaitāvataiva tasya nirākaraṇam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6550: prathame pade saṃbhavasya vidheyatvena ivāsaṃbhavasya niṣedhyatvenānupādānāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6568: vivakṣite tasminnanenaiva vākyena viśiṣṭo vādaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6572: athārtirapi kathaṃ haviṣā viśeṣyata ityata āha---atra hi yadyapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6584: ubhayatvavivakṣāpakṣe tu naikaikahavirārtau prāyaścittavidhiḥ syāditi doṣaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6595: atra naiyāyikasamādhānamāśaḍkya bauddhaḥ svabhāṣayā nirākaroti---na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6596: yadyapi tattulya evetyanyayogavyavacchedasya vipakṣamātraviṣayatvaṃ tadā syād yadi viṣayāntarasaṃkocaḥ syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6598: anyathobhayorapi tattulyānyatvāviśeṣe vipakṣayogasya vyavacchedo na tvanumeyayogasyeti kutaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6601: yasmāt tadekavākyatāyāmeva satyāṃ vipakṣamātraviṣayatvamasya vaktuṃ śakyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6603: tathāpi bauddhanaye śābddhaṃ vyavahāramāśritya samuccaya eva na nirvahet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6619: nityasyānekāśrayatve jātitvaprasaḍgāt ekāśrayatve tasya nāśe anāśrayasyāvasthānānupapatteḥ nityatve pramāṇābhāvaprasaḍgācca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6622: idaṃ tu na tatheti kathaṃ nityamiti jñātavyam?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6631: guṇeṣu ca karmasu ca sādṛśyavyavahāro na syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6639: tathāpi karaṇavyutpattyā sādhanapadavyākhyānasya parityāge na kācidupapattirdarśitā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6642: pratyakṣāt sādṛśyāt prajānan tena prajñāpyata iti vadan sādṛśyasyaiva prajñāyamānasya kāraṇatvamabhipraiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6643: tathā ca tena saha sādhyasādhanapadasya vyadhikaraṇatvādanyasya ca karaṇasyābhāvāt sādhyasādhanapadamanarthakamāpadyeta,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6652: tathāpi prajñānaṃ prasiddhipadārthona tu prajñāpanamityata āha---ityetadarthe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6654: jñāyamānasya sādṛśyasya karaṇatvamāviṣkartuṃ tasyānyatra acaritārthaḥ phalānuguṇo vyāpāro darśita iti tātparyār'thaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6657: lakṣyapadaṃ hi lakṣaṇavyavasthāpakaṃ na bhavati parasparāśrayatvamagatirveti doṣāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6667: tasmāt tadavabodhāya niṣkṛṣya phalamasya darśanīyamiti tathaiva sūcitavān /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6673: prasiddhaṃ sādharmyaṃ yasyeti bahuvrīhāvapi karmadhārayārthasya praviṣṭatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6674: evaṃ prasiddhena sādharmyamityatra tṛtīyātatpuruṣasya praveśād virodhāntaramāśaḍkyāha---bhāṣyakāreṇa hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6682: atropamānasya phale vipratipadyamānān prati sāśaḍkaṃ jarannaiyāyikajayanta prabhṛtīnāṃ parihāramāha--yadyapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6684: mānāntaraṃ śabdo vā śabdārtho vā liṅgabhūtaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6687: śabdādavagatena gosādṛśyena pratipādyamānaḥ piṇḍa samānāsamānajātīyebhyo vyavacchinnaḥ śakyamavaganatumiti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6689: tu gosādṛśyenopalakṣito viśiṣṭaḥ śabdādavagamyamānaḥ piṇḍaḥ samānāsamānajātīyebhyo vyavacchinnaḥ śakyo 'vagantum,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6692: atha gosadṛśa eva ka ityāśaḍkānivartanāsāmarthyamateḥ pariplavaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6695: tarhi viśiṣṭaiva pratipattirvākyādastu ityata āha---na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6712: asti tarhi sādṛśyādijñānakāle 'pi vistāritasya cakṣuṣo vyāpāraḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6717: pūrve hi yathā gaustathetyeva vākyaṃ gavayapadenāpratītasamayenāpi prayogamātropayoginā sahitaṃ saṃbandhapratipattihetuḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6721: avācakaprayogasya vākyānaṅgatayeti tadvirahiṇaśca saṃbandhyupalakṣaṇaparyavasānāditi manyamānā etadeva
