GSP29nvtp1_1u:6726: atha na vidita iti tatrākāḍkṣānuvṛtterevamucyata iti cet--tadapyayuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6731: avagatireva tarhi saṃndhasya saṃbandhino 'navagamāditi kiṃ pariplutaṃ pramātuḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6734: anyathā piṇḍopakṣepe 'pi nimittānupakṣepe manodharmādiśabdānāṃ jātiśabdatvaṃ na syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6744: tatra prathamadvitīyayorasaṃbhāvitatvādiha viditavṛttāntatayā tṛtīyaṃ prakāraṃ nirasya pañcamaścaturthamupayātīti caturthaṃ vyavasthāpayati---na tāvaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6749: tataśca tathābhūta eva piṇḍe saṃbandho grāhyo,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6762: nanu sādṛśyameva jātibhedamanantarbhāvya pratyetuṃ na śakyam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6775: ado 'ravindamivedamaravindamiti caturdhā sādṛśyagatau bhinnapradhānasāmānyaniyamāyogena tadanantarbhāvyaiva sādṛśyapratipattyupapatteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6779: tasmād gosāmānyenopalakṣyamāṇaḥ piṇḍaḥ kiṃ tadvāneva gavayaśabdasya vācyo bhavatu?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6782: tadupalakṣita eva piṇḍa ākāśavat tasya vācyo bhavet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6786: etāsvavaśyamanyatamā koṭirgavayapadārtho bhaviṣyatīti nirdhāraṇasaṃbhāvanāṃ hṛdi nidhāya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6793: yadyapi gavayatvāvagame 'pi saṃjñāsaṃjñisaṃbandhānavagame tatra prayujyamānatvāditi heturasiddha eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6794: na hyasati vṛttyantare tadviṣayatayā prayogaḥ saṅgatimavijñāya jñātuṃ śakayate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6795: prāgeva pramāṇāntarāt tadavagame tu kimanumānena sādhanīyam?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6797: tathāpi saṃbandhyavagame gavayapadasamabhivyāhṛtaṃ vākyameva saṃbandhaṃ bodhayiṣyati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6798: avācakasyāpi ca samabhivyāhāra upayokṣyate upamānapakṣa iva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6807: yadyapi vinigamanāyāṃ hetvabhāve 'pi nopamānasya kācit kṣatiḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6814: sa ca prasiddho dharmaḥ samānaḥ pratiyogitayā tadupakṣipto 'samānaśceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6817: jaranmīmāṃsakamataṃ gosādṛśyaṃ gavayasthaṃ pratyakṣameveti vadatā nirastam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6838: tatra vipratipadyamānaṃ prati tu parīkṣāvatāra ityāśayavān siddhavat saṅgatibhāṣyaṃ vyākhyāya lakṣaṇamavatārayati---atheti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6839: tatra samayabalena samyakparokṣānubhavasādhanaṃ śabda iti eke /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6852: tasmāt śabda eva ceṣṭāyāḥ praveśaḥ samayabalapravṛtteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6853: śabda eva tu śabdavyavahāro laukikaḥ prāyikatvāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6858: arthena ca smṛtyutpādanāt śabdaviṣayam evāsyāḥ prāmāṇyam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6861: yadi ceṣṭopadhānamantareṇāvagato 'pi śabdo nārthaṃ gamayedevamapi saṃbhavet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6866: ---ata eva taṃ prati samayabalena śabdavadarthe 'pi ceṣṭāyāḥ kuṇṭhatvameva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6871: atha kṛtasamayāpi ceṣṭaiva kiṃ na syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6882: tathā ca gauraśvaḥ puruṣa ityādipadairiva svatantreṣu padārtheṣu smāriteṣu parasparānvayayogaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6883: padaikadeśavibhaktiviśeṣavat ceṣṭaikadeśaviśeṣāt prakaraṇādiviśeṣād vā kārakādismṛtiniyama iti cet---ceṣṭaikadeśaviśeṣābhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6887: tathātve vā gauraśvaḥ puruṣo hastītyādāvapi karmatvādīnyunnīya vivakṣitārthāvasāyaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6893: saṃśayapratibhayoranyatarasmād viśeṣānupalambhe vidūravartini samānadharmiṇi sthāṇvarthina iveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6897: sāvyavahārikānapyakīrtayatā sūtrakṛtā sūcitamapi mandamatayo na gṛhṇantīti tadanukampayā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6908: tadanena nirākāḍkṣāyogyānāsannāni padāni nirasyātā ceṣṭādayo 'pi nirastā bhavantīti vijātīyavyudāsaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6913: nanu nāyamupadeśaśabdasyārtho yathāśruti cāvyāpakatā siddhārthāsaṃgrahādivadityata āha---yadyapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6914: na kevalaṃ bhūtārthāsaṃgrahaḥ sādhyārthamapi na kiñcit saṃgṛhṇātītyāha---yadyapi ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6916: yenānayorūpadeśapadenāsaṃgraha ityatastābhyāṃ vidhervaidharmyaṃ pratipādya tayorapi tato vaidharmyamuktam---te hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6920: yadyapi lakṣaṇayā te api saṃgrahītuṃ śakyete parasthāne prayoktṛpadaṃ prakṣipya,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6922: svargāpavargopāyaviṣayasya śabdaviśeṣasya lakṣaṇārambhāt śāstrasya tadadhikāreṇa pravṛtteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6923: sāmānyalakṣaṇe tvakṛte viśeṣalakṣaṇānavatāra ityataḥ prathamaṃ tathaiva vyākhyātam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6926: parapadamapahāya prayojanavānityeva vākyārthapratipattiḥ phalamiti ca lākṣaṇikapadaprayogasya cāyamevopayogo yadubhayalakṣaṇalābhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6932: nūnaṃ kañcidarthaṃ pratipādayantyaḥ kvacit paraṃ pravartayeyuḥ pravṛttyaḍkitatvāt prayojanasadbhāvasya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6933: na cet paraṃ pravartayeyuḥ kathaṃ paraprayojanavattyaḥ pravṛttivirahāḍkitatvāt prayojanābhāvasyetyata āha---yadyapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6942: tathā ca sthānakaraṇādīnāmanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ varṇanipatti prati sāmarthyāvagamāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6950: api tvāyatanatayā kartṛtvanirvāhakatayā vyāpakatayā ca tat tasya neṣyate bhogābhāvāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6954: tadevaṃ rūpa āptaḥ kutaḥ pramāṇāt niścetavyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6957: anyathāpi saṃbhavādityāśaḍkya mlecchā api hītyādinā bhāṣyatātparyaṃ bruvāṇaḥ tanniścayopāyamapi leśato darśayati---hetudarśanaśūnyā iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6960: tatra pūrvasya tāvat sattvaprasādhakādeva pramāṇād rāgadveṣamohavirahasiddhāvanāptatvaṃ nirastam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6964: icchāpi pratipipādayiṣā vipralipsā vā syāditi sandeho 'vaśiṣyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6965: tatrāpyabhyāsadaśāpanne 'yamartho 'syeti sāmānyato niścaye bhavatyeva tajjñānasya yathārthatvaniścayaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6966: yathābhyāsadaśāpannamidamaraṇyamamīṣāṃ mlecchānāmataḥ asminnete mārgāmārgavibhāgajñā iti pānthānāmevaṃ niścayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6967: vipralipsā ca hetudarśanena vyāptā hetau sati syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6970: tatra tāvat pāntheṣu vimārgeṇa pratiṣṭhamāneṣu mlecchādīnāṃ na kaścit svopakāraḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6975: nāpi parāpakāramātraṃ puruṣārthaḥ tathā sati sarvaḥ sarvamapakuryādityevaṃ vipralipsāpi nivāryate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6976: anabhyāsadaśāpannaviṣaye tu pravṛttisāmarthyāt pramāṇāntarasaṃvādād vā mohavipralipsayornivṛttiriti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6978: tataḥ kaḥ sandeho mahādhiyām āryāṇāṃ ca tattvāvadhāraṇa iti apiśabdārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6979: etena yad yena rūpeṇa na niścitam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6982: na pratīyate cābhimataḥ puruṣa āptatveneti vyāpakānupalabdherasiddhatvamuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6991: satpratipakṣatayā cet svargādīnāṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ kutaḥ setsyatītyata āha---yogaje tviti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6995: tasmādāpātatastāvat satpratipakṣā evaite hetava ityata āha---asmākaṃ tu sabhyañca iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:6999: na hi smaraṇānubhavavibhāge api sākṣī praṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7000: kiṃ tarhi? idaṃ smarāmīdamanubhavāmīti pratītyā svasākṣiko 'yam arthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7010: tathā ca sa ghaṭa ityutpannāyāṃ smṛtau bhrāmyatastaṃ ghaṭamanubhavāmīti syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7014: asti ca svapnānubhavasyāpi kasyacit satyatvam, saṃvādāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7024: asmākaṃ tu sabhyañca iti bahavaśceti anvācaye cakāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7025: yadyapi cāsmākaṃ paramasarvajñasiddhāvavāntarasarvajñe na sidhyatyapi na kācit prakṛtahāniḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7026: tathāpi tatsadbhāve api pramāṇasadbhāvāt so 'pi nopekṣāmarhatīti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7027: iha dignāgena bhāvasādhanatvakarmasādhanatvābhyāmupadeśapadaṃ vikalpya dūṣitam karaṇasādhanatvapakṣastvasmadamito 'pi kuta upekṣita ityata āha---anyasmādanyasyeti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7032: apratibandhe tvaprāmāṇyameva ityasaṃbhava eva karaṇavyutpattipakṣasyeti manyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7041: atha vā āpte niścayaṃ kṛtvā tatsahāyo vākyārthaniścayaṃ janayannityubhayaṃ dūṣayatītyāha--imamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7054: āptiniścaye 'pi śabdasya vyāpāro nāstīti darśayitumarthatathātvaniścayo 'pi pratyakṣeṇetyuktam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7057: atra cobhayorapi pakṣayorāptoktatvapravṛttisāmarthyahetupradhānayoḥ śabdasya prāmāṇyaniścayaḥ phalamiti śaḍkitumucitamapi na śaḍkitam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7064: nanvanabhyupagatebhyaḥ pakṣebhyo na kañcidabhyupagatasya viśeṣaṃ paśyāma ityata āha---etaduktaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7074: yadyevaṃ tarhi kkāptoktatvaniścaya upayujyata ityata āha---āptatvaṃ ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7078: tataśca punarāptoktatvenārthaniścaya āyāta ityata āha---na ca yata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7091: jñātāptatvena tūpadeṣṭrā tathātvena niścīyata iti pratyakṣavat svaviṣaye vyavastheti jñānamātramanumāpayet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7099: tathā hi, na tāvat tādātmyatatprāptī saṃbhavataḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7108: tasmād vacanamātraliṅgapakṣe yad vacanaṃ tad buddhipūrvakamityudāharaṇīyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7118: tasya ca na kaścid viśeṣor'thāhitākārādilakṣaṇaḥ samasti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7121: sa cet jñānasiddhāvantarbhūtaḥ kimaparaṃ tena sādhanīyam?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7138: ākāṅkṣādimattve satīti viśeṣaṇānna vyabhicāra iti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7147: tathā ca prāgeva sādhyaviśeṣasiddhaye hetuviśeṣasiddhimicchatā vākyādeva vākyārthaviśeṣapratyaya eṣitavya ityupasaṃharannāha---tasmāditi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7149: tathāpyasaṃbaddhasya prakāśakatve 'tiprasaṅga ityata āha---na ceti nanu na hi saṃbandha ityeva gamako 'tiprasaḍgāt api tvavinābhāva eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7150: sa ca śabdasyārthena nāstītyata āha---na cāvineti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7157: na hyavinābhāvasyaiṣa mahimā yadayaṃ sattāmātreṇaiva gamayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7158: tathātve vā dhūmādapi cakṣuṣa iva sattāmātrāvasthitādevāgniḥ pratīyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7177: tathāpi samayasya puruṣāyattatvāt kimayaṃ sāṃvyavahārikasaḍketāneva śabdān prayuḍkte?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7178: kiṃ vā svayamidānīmarthabhedeṣu saḍketyeti sandeho na nivartata iti cet---na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7181: jānātyeva hyayaṃ nāviditasamayā ete pratipādakā iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7186: tatrāpi na pratipādyaṃ prati samayo gopyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7193: yeṣāṃ vaśe nanu vaśe jagadeva teṣām //8 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7200: tarhi uktāni pramāṇānīdānīṃ parīkṣayantāṃ kiṃ prameyalakṣaṇenetyata āha---lakṣaṇaṃ ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7203: nanu pramāṇaṃ tāvat prathamata eva vaktavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7205: idānīṃ tu pañcadaśasu prathamaṃ kimabhidhīyatāmiti jijñāsā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7220: prathamastu viśiṣṭaṃ prameyamadyāpi na sidhyatīti tadarthaṃ praśna ityanena /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7221: tatra vārttikakāreṇa tuśabdasūcitaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ gṛhītvā vibhāganiṣṭhaḥ praśna ityanena /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7222: tatra vārttikakāreṇa tuśabdasūcitaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ gṛhītvā vibhāganiṣṭhaḥ praśnaḥ kṛta ityāha---sa ca viśeṣa iti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7223: nanvayameva ca sūtrārtha iti vibhāga evāsya sūtrāsyārtha iti gamyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7236: nanu yadā digādayo 'bhihitā evārthata iti samādhānam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7237: tadā tadabhidhāne ka upayoga ityapi samarthanīyamityata āha---kauśalamātramiti //9 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7253: tasmād vāsanāvādamātraṃ vihāya āgantukamapi kiñcit kāraṇaṃ vācyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7254: taccāptānāptaśabdau vā liṅgatadābhāse vā pratyakṣatadābhāse vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7266: yadyapi savastuko 'yaṃ tathāpi śarīrapratyayasāmānādhikaraṇyāt tadvastuka evāyamityapi syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7267: ato na tadatirikte vastuni pramāṇayituṃ śakyate tāvad yāvad dehādibhyo bhinna ātmā pramāṇāntareṇa na sādhyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7276: nirūpādhiśarīrabuddhitatsamudāyālambanatvena ahaṃ pratyayasyātiprasaḍgāt svasaṃbandhini śarīrādāvayamahaṃpratyaya iti vācyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7279: tathā ca yadā tenaiva tadanubhūyate tadā pratyetuḥ pratyetavyādananyatvādahamiti syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7280: ata eva ghaṭādayo na kadācidapyananyānubhavitṛkā iti na kadācidapyahamāspadamiti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7281: evaṃ tarhi tvanmate 'pyayamahamiti pratyayaḥ śarīrādāvāroparūpa eva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7284: tasyāḥ kriyātvenānubhūyamānāyā bhinnasya tatkarturahaṃ chinadmītivadahaṃ jānāmītyanubhavāt nīlādipratyetavyākāravat pratipattrākāro 'pi pratīterevāyamātmā tathā bhāsata iti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7285: tarhi pratyetavyākārasamānayogakṣematvena pratipatrākārasyāpi siddhaṃ naḥ samīhitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7305: tadatra pratisaṃdhāne kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ pareṇopanyastaḥ kimupādhitayā vipakṣavyāvṛttisaṃdehamudbhāvayitum?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7308: tatra pratyabhijñānaṃ pratisandhānamiti gṛhītvopādhilakṣaṇamapaninīṣān kāryakāraṇabhāvapratisandhānayoḥ paraspareṇa vyāpti khaṇḍayati---na hi yatreti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7315: viśiṣṭo 'pi kāryakāraṇabhāvo na pratisandhānaṃ prati prayojako yatastannivṛttāvapi nedaṃ nivartata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7318: tadagrahapakṣastu vācya iti tamupekṣyāsmadabhipretaṃ pratisandhānamādāya śaṅkate---pūrvāpareti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7319: yatra kartari pratisandhānaṃ tatrāvaśyaṃ pratisandhayānāṃ buddhīnāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7326: sa kimātmanaḥ pūrvāparapratyayānekakartṛkatayā pratisaṃdhatte na vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7332: na hyasti saṃbhavo yadanvaye 'pi yasyānanvayastat tāvanmātranibandhanamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7339: yadi pāralaukiker'the vipralambhakā eva vaktāra iti niścayaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7343: tataśca na kāṣakāraṇabhāvo na tasya nibandhanam avyabhicārāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7351: upadeśastu pūrvapratisandhānabalopanītakarūṇābhyāsaprakarṣādeva virodhapratisandhānabalena suptasyeva prabodha iti śaḍkārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7353: na ca sphaṭikavad viṣayoparāgaparihāreṇa buddhiṣu bhedagraha iti yuktam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7355: tathābhāve buddhimātreṇa bhedāgrahe pārthivatayā vṛkṣāt kāṣṭhaṃ kāṣṭhādaḍgāraḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7372: cālayavijñānopāttaṃ pravṛttivijñānaṃ na kiñcidupādatta ityapi yuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7380: asya hi bhedāgrahaḥ svarūpato vā syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7390: na ca tebhyo 'pi bhedāgraha iti coktameva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7403: sa hi vidyamāna eva bhedo na gṛhyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7411: na ca paramārthata eva nānāvikalpollikhitamalīkamekātmakam anātmakatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7425: sa iha na gṛhyate ityabhedānusaṃdhānamiti cet---na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7431: na caitadalīkaviṣayatvapakṣe saṃbhavatīti sthiravastugocaratvam eva sattvabuddherjyāyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7433: tadidamuktarūpaṃ pratisandhānaṃ nimittavattayā vyāptaṃ nirnimittatve niyamānupapatteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7434: taccānekakartṛtve nāstīti vyāpakānupalabdhyā vipakṣānnivartamānaṃ nimittavatyekakartṛkatve viśrāmyatīti pratibandhasiddhiḥ ityanenābhiprāyeṇopasaṃharati---tasmāditi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7437: tathā hi vyavahitakālā api pratyayā yadyekakartṛkāḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7450: tasya vāstavasya kṣaṇikapakṣe viṣayasamayānāṃ kṣaṇānāmabhāvāt kālpanikasya tvatiprasaṃjakatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7456: kāṣṭhasya tu prakṛtervikṛtiraḍgāra iti kuto niścitaṃ bhavatā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7457: yāvatā vahnerevāsau vikāraḥ kiṃ na syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7459: kāṣṭhasaṃbandhe vahnereva tadutpattirityevaṃ kiṃ na syāt?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7467: asti hi teṣāṃ tadutpattau satyāṃ mamatā ābhimānikaikatvāvasāyaśca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7469: astu piṇḍitānāṃ rūparasaparamāṇūnāṃ sarveṣā sarvopādānatvamityapi na yuktam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7477: kiñcideva svakāraṇasāmagrīvaśādutpadyate jñānaṃ yat kāṃścideva kāraṇasāntānikān pratyayān pratyavekṣate nānyat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7484: yatra yathā kāryaṃ dṛśyate tatra tathā kalpyata iti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7485: tat kimidānīṃ kiṃbhūtasya kutra sāmarthyamityanuyogo 'nuttara eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7486: evaṃ tarhi sarvatra jñāpakajanakeṣvanāśvasāt nirīhaṃ jagat jāyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7492: nanvidamapi te vyasanaṃ nivartayiṣyāmo mā tvariṣṭā
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7494: yadi hi sarvajñasya cetaso 'smadādicittamālambanapratyayatvenodāhniyate vaisadṛśyād daṇḍaghaṭavanna pratisaṃdhatta ityapi pariharedata uktam---yogicittamapīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7495: tasyāpi yogicittena pratisandhānaṃ syāditi viparyayo hetuviparyāsasyāpi saṃbhavāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7496: tasyāpi yogicittena pratisandhānaṃ syāditi viparyayo hetuviparyāsasyāpi saṃbhavāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7513: na hi karmakarakaropanītam eva bījaṃ kṣitimāsādyaḍkuraṃ kurute /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7516: nīlādyanubhavenaiva veti na kaścit svarūpakṛto viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7517: evaṃ cānanubhūte 'pi smaraṇaprasaḍgo na cānubhūte 'pīti vaijātyaṃ tu viśeṣo bhavet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7518: yathā kṣīrāvasekādamlatvaṃ parihṛtya mādhuryamādāyānuvartamānāmalakī kālāntare api phale mādhuryamunmīlayati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7519: lākṣārasāvasekād dhavalatāṃ parihṛtya raktatāmupādāyānuvartamānaṃ kārpāsabījaṃ kusumeṣu raktatām,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7521: javākusumādyupadhānāt tadrūpatāṃ parihṛtya dhavalimānamupādāyaiva saṃtanyamānasya sphaṭikasyeva jñānasyāpi viṣayoparāgaṃ parihṛtya cidrūpatāmātramupādāyānuvṛtteḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7522: sarvākāratvameva sarvavijñānānāṃ kiṃ tu kaścidākāra ḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7523: sphuṭaḥ, anye tvapaṭava iti tu svadarśanaśraddhā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7531: na hyupādānanivṛttāvapi upādeyamavatiṣṭhata ityāśayavānāha---iti pūrvotpanna iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7532: saṃtanyamāna evātīndriyaḥ saṃskāro bhaviṣyatītyāśayavānāśaṅkate---punaḥ para ityādi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7533: pṛthaksaṃskārasantāno hi na tāvat parābhyupeto nāpyupapannaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7536: tasmāt pravṛttisantāne phalānavakāśāt anyatra saṃskāre 'nyatra phale 'tiprasaḍgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7537: tasmād pravṛttisantāne phalānavakāśāt anyatra saṃskāre 'nyatra phale 'tiprasaḍgāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7541: yatra ca sa tatra smṛtyādiphalamiti paramupapadyate //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7544: etena yo yaḥ saṃskāraḥ kvacit santāna āhitaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7555: nanu yadi vaiyarthyamasya hṛdi nihitameva vārttikakṛtā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7559: na cāsiddhaṃ sādhanaṃ nāmeti kṛtvā iti garbhaśoṣaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7565: na tāvadanayoḥ sādhanatvaṃ prati kaścid viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7567: so 'pi nāsti, ekahetusiddhe 'pi hetvantarajijñāsuṃ prati bhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7581: tatra yadyapi dvitīyasya nivṛttau na sādhyanivṛttiḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7584: ārambhake sati ca tat kāryadravyaṃ sāvayavaṃ vyavasthāpyeta, vāyuvat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7592: tathā satyeva hīcchādīnāṃ sārvatrikatvamupapadyate yata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7596: atha gatereva kiṃ na taṃ tamāpnotītyata āha---gatikalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7598: tayā aparidṛśyamānāpi gatiḥ kalpyate manasi paramāṇuṣu ca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7602: niravayavadravyāśritatvaṃ ca sādhayatā sāvayāśritatvaṃ prāgeva nirastam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7607: tathā hi icchādayo guṇā anityatve satyekendriyagrāhyajātimattvāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7615: teṣāmapi śarīramāśritya tathābhāvāt śarīrādapakarṣa iti saṃgatisaṃkṣepaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7617: indriyāṇāṃ manasaḥ aṃśator'thādeḥ paramparayā tu śarīrāśritatvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7622: samuccayapakṣe vyabhicāradarśinaḥ kathaṃ ceṣṭāśraya iti praśno 'nupapannaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7625: yadyapi ceṣṭā kāyavyāpārastathāpi tasyaiva lakṣyatvāditaretarāśrayabhiyā vyāpāramātraṃ vaktavyamityāha---ceṣṭā vyāpāra iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7631: tadidamubhayaṃ vivakṣatoktam---api tu viśiṣṭo vyāpāra iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7637: atra ca sparśavaddravyaparimāṇaṃ mūrtiriti paralakṣaṇābhiprāyeṇa mūrtiśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7649: āgāmivārttikaparyālocanāyāṃ tu ceṣṭāśabda evāyamevambhūter'thaviśeṣe vartata iti na nyūnaṃ sūtramāśaṅkanīyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7651: na ca tasyāpi prāṇitvenocchvāsaniḥśvāsānumānāt nayanodarādyavayavasaṃkocavikāśalakṣaṇā ceṣṭāstīti vācyam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7657: tāvataiva āśrayārtha upapanna ityato vārttikakārasya bhāvamāviṣkaroti---saṃyogitayā tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7660: na hi golakamātrasyopadhāte 'nugrahe vā tvagādīnyupahanyante anugṛhyante vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7661: yathā jarāyauvanādinā śarīropaghātānugrahābhyāṃ sarvāṇi vikalāyante paṭūni vā sampadyanta iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7662: tadetad bhāṣyavārttikakārābhyāmevānugṛhyante upahanyanta iti bahuvacanaprayogeṇa spaṣṭaṃ darśitamityupekṣitavān /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7666: na tu tadeva kāryamityata āha---prayojanaṃ tadadhikāreṇa tatra pravṛtteriti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7668: yadavacchinne ātmani arthā bhogaṃ janayanti taccharīram /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7675: tadetat tasya bhogadhiṣṭhānamiti vadatā bhāṣyakṛtā eva prāk darśitaṃ sphuṭamiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7679: ceṣṭādayaḥ sāmānyaśabdā iti vārttike bahuvacanaṃ dṛṣṭāntabrahmaṇādiśabdāntarbhāvena /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7701: śarīrāvayavāntareṇa ghrāṇasya samavāyo vā saṃyogo vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7707: na hi kāraṇaṃ kāryakārye samavaitītyarthaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhatatpuruṣapakṣe /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7710: ghrāṇasya śarīrāvayave samavāya iti tu na sambhavatyeva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7722: tathā ca na tatra śarīrasamavāyasambhava iti kimanena śaḍkitenāpītyupekṣitavān /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7736: paramārthatastu yadi dvandvānantaraṃ bahuvrīhiḥ ka liṅgasaṅgatirarthasaṅgatiśca?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7741: śarīrādīnāmeva dharmaḥ pretyabhāvo dharminirūpaṇādhīnatvācca dharmasya tebhyaḥ pretyabhāvasyāpakarṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7742: arthādīnāṃ doṣāntānāṃ śarīramāśritya duḥkhahetutvāviśeṣe 'pi paramparayā śarīrāśriyatvādindriyāṇāṃ tu sākṣāt tathābhāvādebhyasteṣāmapakarṣaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7743: manasastvevaṃrūpatve satyapi bāhyendriyavaidharmyajñāpanārthatvāt buddhikramānumeyatvācca buddheḥ sakāśādapakarṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7754: iti bhogau sukhaduḥkhe iti sākṣādeva bhogasādhanatvaṃ sarveṣāṃ sambhavati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7755: tathāpi bhogo buddhiriti tatra tatra bhāṣyadarśanāt tadanusāreṇa vyācaṣṭe---pāramparyeṇa ceti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7758: tadetadevaṃlakṣaṇakamindriyaṃ bāhyamābhyantaraṃ cetīndriprakaraṇāt mano 'nyatra nayatā sūtrakṛtā eva sūcitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7760: gandharasarūpasparśaśabdā iti pratiniyatārthavibhāgaṃ kurvatā sūtrakṛtā eva darśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7762: kathaṃ pañcaiva pratiniyatā viṣayā iti tadeva vyavacchedyaṃ darśayanneva manāk smārayati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7768: tat kathaṃ tato na viśeṣa ityata āha---pramāṇādyudyeśeneti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7770: atha vibhāgasūtratve 'pi lakṣaṇasūtraṃ kiṃ na syāt?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7771: na hyanayoḥ kaścid virodha ityata āha---lakṣaṇaṃ hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7777: tathāpi kathamebhya eva padebhyo vivakṣitobhayalābha ityata āha---atra ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7780: tena śrotrapadamapyavayavārthaṃ nimittīkṛtya nabhaso viśiṣṭādṛṣṭopagṛhītakarṇaśaṣkulyavacchinnatve vartata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7787: na tu samuccitaṃ padaṃ nirūcyate tvakpadaṃ tvanavayavaṃ vṛddhikṣayavaddravyasahajāvaraṇamātre vartata ityabhiprāyavatā bhāṣyakṛtā lakṣaṇaṃ tadbījaṃ ca darśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7791: saṃyogādhāratvāditi grāhyasya mṛgamadādigandhasya tatrāsamavāyāt mṛgamadādīnāṃ svāvayavasamavāyena samavetasamavāyābhāvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7795: kiṃ yajjātīyaṃ yadindriyaṃ tattajjātīyasyaiva guṇaviśeṣaṃ gṛhṇāti?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7796: atha yajjātīyaṃ yadindriyaṃ tajjātīyasya tenaiva guṇaviśeṣo gṛhyate ityata āha---na caivamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7799: tathāpi bhūtebhya iti sūtrapadasya kiṃ tātparyam ityata āha---anena khalviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7802: na tvekaprakṛtikatvamāha sāṃkhyo na tvekasvābhāvyamindriyāṇāmityata āha---śliṣṭaṃ padamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7808: tathā ca lakṣyahāniriti---na hyasti saṃbhavo nirhetuko vyavahāra iti bhāvaḥ //12 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7819: yeṣāṃ mithyājñānaviṣayīkṛtānāṃ nimittānuvyañjanasaṃjñāviṣayīkṛtānāṃ saṃsārahetutvaṃ ta hame lakṣyanta ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7827: ke te? ya indriyāṇāmarthā viṣayā ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7828: āgāmino vārttikasya bhāṣyeṇa virodhaṃ parijihīrṣurāha---na ṣaṣṭhīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7830: vyadhikaraṇabahuvrīhau na kevalaṃ lakṣaṇābhāvaḥ prayojanābhāvaścetyāha---na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7847: majjadhātumalā hame bahavaḥ śmaśāne tarāviva śarīre saṃyuktā ityudvegaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7857: śarīrāpekṣayā parāparabhāvo na madapekṣayeti na kiñcit /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7862: vakrabhrūḥ ṛjuromarājī gabhīranābhirūnnatapayodharā pṛthunitambā kṛśamadhyeti snehaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7864: acirasthāyinīti nirveda iti nimattasaṃjñayā saha aśubhasaṃjñeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7873: na hi bhavati yadeva rūpaṃ sa eva sparśa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7876: na caikameva vastu kāraṇabhedādanyathā prathata iti yuktam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7886: saṃbhave vā tadeva dravyamiti paryavasitaṃ vivādena /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7888: tathā hi cakṣuṣopalabhyamāne bhūtale rūpaviśeṣe ghaṭo 'pi cakṣuṣaivopalabhyamāno rūpaviśeṣastadādhāra iti śakyate niścetum,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7890: tadadhikaraṇāḥ sparśādayo 'pīti tu kasya pramāṇasya viṣayaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7918: na teṣāṃ kiṃ tu tasyaivetyeva kiṃ na syāt?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7934: abhedasādhanāni pramāṇāni bādhakamiti tu cintyata ityāśayavān paryanuyogārthamāha---svasaṃvedaneneti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7935: atra para āha anākalitasamaya iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7938: yathā nīladravyasamparkād dhavalo 'pi nīlo mahārajanasaṃparkādrakta iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7939: atra nīlādayo dravyavyapadeśaṃ vihāya rūpavyapadeśameva labhante,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7941: ādiśabdena gandhādīnāṃ vāsanādikāḥ vāsanādikāḥ kriyāḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7950: dṛṣṭisṛṣṭiviṣaye hi kasmiścid ghaṭa iti vyavahāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7958: tathā ca dṛṣṭisṛṣṭiviṣayo naikaḥ samarthitaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7961: yadyapi kṣaṇikaparamāṇurūpe dravye na kaścid vicāravirodhaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7982: na ca viparyaye bādhakābhāvād vibhramaśca syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7986: tathā hi mithyāpratyayā apyābhimānika pākṣikaṃ vā prāmāṇyamupādāyaiva pravartayeyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7992: tathāpi ghaṭādipratyayānāṃ satyatve kiṃ nibandhanā bauddhasyerṣyeti jijñāsuṃ pratibubodhayiṣurāhetyāha---taṃ pratīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:7998: asti hi viṣayāgrahe buddhijātīyāgraho na cābhedobāhyasthitau satyāṃ guṇaguṇivādārambhāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8015: tato na pāribhāṣikeṇa vyabhicāraśaḍkāsamānārthānāṃ prakṛtīnāmiti prakṛte 'bhyupagamavādaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8020: yadyupanibandhena yadi toyaparamāṇāvapyāpa iti śiṣṭaprayogastadaivaṃ neyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8033: vastutastu pītaśaḍkhavibhrame ayam api na pītasyaiva śaḍkhasyotpādamicchati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8052: na kevalaṃ hetusvarūpālocanena pratijñālocanenāpi candanasyopālambhābhyupagamo 'vasīyate parasya /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8055: svātantryeṇa vā sattve sādhye āśrayāsiddho heturiti tṛtīye vyutpādanīyamiti ihopekṣitavāniti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8057: tathā hi, ayaṃ cakṣurgocaraḥ candano rasādibhyo bhidyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8063: spamātrāttu vyavacchedaḥ sandigdhaḥ tatra vyapadeśo heturiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8069: atra ca hetutayā vyāpti pradhānīkṛtya ṣaṣṭhyanto heturūktaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8084: atra yadi ghaṭamanatareṇāpi jāyamānatvādityetāvanmātraṃ kriyeta tadaikaghaṭaparityāge ghaṭāntare jāyamānaghaṭapratyayena vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8099: tadguṇayogāt tu tadvyavahāro māṇavake siṃhavyavahāravat tadavayavārabdhatvāt tadīyatāvyavahāraḥ kṣīrasya dadhīvivat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8100: sarpeṇāntyāvayavinā ekenānārambhāt tadavayavānāṃ kāryāvaṣṭabdhatvāt sarpakuṇḍalakaṃ saṃsthānameva sphuṭam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8105: rāhoḥ śira ityatra tu saṃsthāne śiraḥ śabdopacāramātram /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8109: vyatirekopadeśaviveko yadi syāt tadā buddhiśarīrābhyāmevānaikāntikaṃ syādata āha---atādātmyeti //14 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8113: sarvajanīnenāpi samayena gośabdavad yadyarthāntare 'pyete pravarteran tadā ko virodha ityata āha---tatra sarvajanīnaḥ śaknotīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8121: tathābhūtāyāṃ ca tasyāmeteṣāṃ samayo grāhya ityanyonyāśrayatvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8124: tarhi buddhirjñānamityevāstu kimanekaśabdoccāraṇenetyāśaḍkya paramatamapākartṛm ityāha---bhāṣyakāra eveti sphuṭamiti---upapattisārthyāditi bhāṣyāvayayavaṃ vyācaṣṭe---paryāyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8147: mayeti hi cetanoparāgo darpaṇasyeva mukhoparāgo bhedāgrahādatāttvikaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8148: idamiti viṣayoparāgaḥ indriyapraṇālikayā pariṇātibhedo darpaṇasyeva malasaṃbandhaḥ pāramārthikaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8152: tena saha yaḥ puruṣoparāgasyātāttvikasya saṃbandho darpaṇapratibimbitasya mukhasyeva tadgatamalinimnā sopalabdhiriti teṣāṃ rahasyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8165: na hi tatra darpaṇasya śarīrasya vā bhrama iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8169: na ca svataḥ parato vā aprakāśamānaiva buddhirbhrāmyatīti yuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8170: na hyadṛśyamāna eva darpaṇaḥ timire maitrasannidhānamātreṇa tatpratibimbamudgrāhayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8173: vaidharmyādindriyaprakaraṇādapasāritasya buddhikramonneyatayā pravṛttihetutayā ca tayoḥ madhyer'thādavasaro manasa ityāha---kramapraptamiti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8180: indriyaṃ pradhānīkṛtya vā ātmani sahakārivāda iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8188: tathā hi yadā sukhādyupalabdhīnāṃ kriyātvena karaṇatayā mano 'numitam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8196: tathā ca tadavacchedena vṛttilābhe śirasi me vedanā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8202: tathāpi tasyaivendriyatve svābhāvike adhikakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt dharmigrāhakapramāṇabādhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8203: atha jñānakrameṇendriyasahakāritayā tadanumānaṃ tadā sutarāmeva prāguktadoṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8204: yadi tu manaso vaibhave 'pi adṛṣṭavaśāt krama upapadyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8211: balavatā kulālena dṛḍhadaṇḍanunnamapi cakraṃ na bhrāmyet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8212: yatra tu dṛṣṭānusaṃhāreṇa adṛṣṭasya vyāpāraḥ tatra tadveguṇyāt kāryānudayo yathā paramāṇukarmaṇāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8231: yadabubhutsite viṣaye jñānasāmagryāṃ satyāmapi na jñānamapi tu tatra saṃskāraviśeṣādhāyakaḥ pratyayaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8233: tathā ca ghaṭāyonmīlitaṃ cakṣuḥ paṭaṃ na darśayet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8234: tasmād bubhutsāpīndriyāntarādākṛṣya bubhutsitārthagrāhiṇīndriye mano niveśayantī yugapat jñānānutpattāvupayujyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8237: gandhādikriyānyatve satīti vārttikaṃ yathāśrutaṃ dravyakarmādijñānenānaikāntikamato vyācaṣṭe---cakṣurādibhya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8240: tato naite karaṇāntarakalpanāyāṃ prabhavantītyata āha---atra ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8242: nanvindriyatvenaiva mano 'pi janakaṃ smṛtyādīnāṃ tathātve sākṣātkāritvaprasaḍgāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8249: na ca tadantareṇa viśeṣalakṣaṇāvakāśa ityāśaḍkya sūtravākyaṃ bhinatti---ārambhaḥ pravṛttiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8253: yadi tvayatamānasyaivecchāmātraṃ jñānamātraṃ dveṣamātraṃ vā pravṛttiḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8256: atra yadyapi vāgityādiyathāśrutaviśeṣalakṣaṇāvasare dayādyasaṃgraha iti vuddhipadaṃ mano 'bhiprāyeṇa vyākhyātaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8257: tathāpi viśiṣṭadevatādyanucintanādyasaṃgraha ityata āha---sa ca dvividheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8258: jñātuṃ jñāpayituṃ vā prayatnaḥ ubhayathāpi jñānahetuḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8260: kartuṃ kārayituṃ vā prayatnaḥ ubhayathāpi kriyāhetuḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8263: tadarthaṃ prayatno jñānaṃ janayan jñāpakahetuviṣayo bhavatīti jñāpakaikadeśena vācopalakṣayatā svasamavetajñānamātraheturityapi bhramo nirastaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8264: kāyanimitteti kāyo nimittaṃ viṣayatayā yasyāḥ sā tathoktā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8265: dānasteyādyartha yaḥ khalu prayatnaḥ sa kāyaviṣayo bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8266: evaṃ manonimittaṃ dayādrohādyarthaṃ yaḥ khalu prayatnaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8268: anyathā nāstyevāsau puruṣavyāpāro yatra kāyamanasī na nimittamiti //17 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8279: atra ca samavāyo yadyapi na vyāpāraḥ tathāpi mohādeḥ pravartakasya svāśrayasamavetarāgadveṣamohajananāvāntaravyāpārasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8281: tena phalagocarau moharāgau mohadvaiṣau vā tatsādhanaviṣayau moharāgau mohadveṣau vā janayantau
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8285: vyāpāro 'pi ca kāryānuguṇa iti kṛtvā rāgādayaḥ pravartayanti pravṛttihetutvād doṣā ityucyatante //18 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8288: śarīrādīnāṃ doṣaparyantānāṃ parityāgapūrvakaḥ prāptilakṣaṇo dharmaḥ pretyabhāva iti tadanantaramevāsyāvasara ityāha---uddeśakrameti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8297: tathāpi kiṃ vakrokteḥ prayojanamityata āha---tathā ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8298: nanu dvitīyasūtre duḥkhādīnāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāva saṃsāra ityuktam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8300: tat kuto na virodha ityāśayavato vārttikakṛta ākṣepaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8303: tatasteṣāṃ tathābhūtapravāhavicchede pretyabhāvāparanāmā saṃsāro vicchidyeta iti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8304: tulyapravṛttinimittatvāt sa eva tatra saṃsāra uktaityayo na virodha ityāśayavataḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8309: seyamuktarūpā punarūtpattiryadyacetanasya manasaḥ saṃsāraḥ kimiti nivartanīyaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8312: neyaṃ bhogenaviśeṣitā punarūtpattiḥ saṃsāra ityāśayavatā parihṛtam---yadīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8317: sāmānyena jñātā hi viśiṣṭatayā jñātuṃ śakyante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8322: yadyapi svarūpato 'pi pravṛtteḥ kāryabhūtau dharmādharmau prati doṣāṇāmatiśayenopayogo,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8325: tathāpi pravṛttiphale doṣāṇāmupayogo darśanīyaḥ sūtre prakṛtatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8330: svarūpatastu pravṛtti prati doṣāṇāṃ sahakāritvaṃ sūtrakāra eva caturthe vakṣyatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8331: tat kiṃ nirdeṣasya sukhaduḥkhe na sta ityupāttakarmapracayasya tādavasthyamadattaphalasyaiva vā vināśa ityata āha---na cāstīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8332: na brūmo nirdeṣasya upabhoga eva nāsti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8347: duḥkhatayā tadviṣayatvaṃ tathātve ca duḥkhatvamiti lokasuprasiddhena bādhanābuddhiviṣayatvena heyatāyāḥ prasādhanāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8348: yo hi duḥkhaṃ taddhetuṃ vā śarīrādi tadanuṣaktaṃ vā sukhaṃ jānāno 'pi sukhatṛṣṇāpariplutamatirna hātumicchati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8354: yadyapi rāgābhāvo vairāgyaṃ tathāpi suṣuptyādau tasya bhāve mokṣānupayuktatayā ātyantiko vivakṣitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8358: upanateṣvapi viṣayeṣvaudāsīnyaṃ kiṃ tadupekṣābuddhiḥ prabalatattvasākṣātkārasamunmūlitaniravaśeṣamavidyāsaṃskāre heyopādeyapakṣavyavacchedavatī buddhirityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8359: śarīrādiṣu uktaḥ uktarūpa eva grāhya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8366: dharmaphalaṃ hi duḥkhābhāvo bhavan pradhvaṃso vaktavyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8370: na hi brahmalokopabhogānantaramevāvaśyaṃ duḥkhena bhavitavyamityasti niyāmakam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8371: yathā ca viśiṣṭaśālisūpādinā kulmāṣapiṇḍikayā codarapūraṇe kṛte duḥkhanivṛttistulyā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8372: tathendrabrāhmapadayorapīti na kaścit svarūpato viśeṣaḥ syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8373: api ca svargārthī yāgādikaṃ kṛtvā kadācillabdhavṛtteradharmānnarakaduḥkhamanubhūya svargamanubhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8377: na cānutpannasya pradhvaṃsaḥ tasmād dharmaṃ caritvā avaśyamakāmayamāno 'pi prathamatastāvannarakādiduḥkhamanubhavet /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8382: śarīrādiṣu pratiyogiṣu lakṣiteṣu tannivṛttirūpasyāpavargasya lakṣaṇāvasara ityāha---krameti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8384: tathāpi karmopagrahamantareṇa tasyākiñcitkaratvāt sa eva tasya janmeti jāyamānāḥ sarva ityuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8385: atra ca pratiyogināṃ śarīrādīnāmādhyātmikatvāt tatpradhvaṃso 'pyādhyātmika eva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8386: tadviśiṣṭasya jīvanmuktyuttarakāle duḥkhasyātyanatābhāvo mokṣa iti nākāśādigatena duḥkhasyātyantābhāvena vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8387: pariṇāmo hi pūrvadharminivṛttau dharmyantarotpādo vā syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8407: na caikāntabhinna evāyaṃ brahmadharmaprapañco 'stu iti vācyam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8411: nityamityādi bhāṣyaṃ na yathāśrutaṃ paramatotthāpanamityata āha---asyārtha iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8420: yathā paṭena tantava ityutthāpya dūṣayatītyāha---atra ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8422: nanu sukhatatsaṃvedanena brahmayaṇo bhinno brahma cānuditānastamitarūpaṃ śuddhabuddhasvabhāvaṃ svata eva siddham /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8431: na ca kalpito virūddhadharmādhyāso bhedahetuḥ sphaṭikasyāpi javātāpicchādisannidhānāpāditārūṇimanīlimādinā bhedaprasaḍgādityāśaḍkya pariharati---na cātmaiveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8432: na hyasti saṃbhavaḥ sphaṭikaḥ svarūpeṇa pūrvāparakālaikatayā sphuranneva nīlīdivyāvṛttātmā nīlādyātmanāropyata iti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8438: na tāvat sa eva tasminneva tadānīmeva bhrānto 'bhrāntaśceti saṃbhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8439: tasmādavidyāyā durghaṭatvaṃ nāmālaḍkāra eveti pādaprasārikayā pratyavastheyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8442: pratibimbe tu suvyakta eva bhrama iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8445: ki tvātmaiva nityacaitanyasvabhāva ityata āha---na cātmaiveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8447: ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmīti tadajñāsiṣamitivat sukhenāhaṃ svapimīti tadajñāsiṣamityevamapi smaraṇaprasaḍgāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8448: tarhi kimidaṃ sukhamahamasvāpsamiti duḥkhābhāvānumānamātraṃ supto 'haṃ na kiñcidajñāsiṣamiti jñānābhāvānumānavat /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8450: ko dharmī? ātmā anubhūyamānaḥ smaryamāṇo vā pratyabhijñāyamānaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8455: yathā prāgupalabdhaḥ paścādupalabhyamāno ghaṭo madhyāvasthāyāṃ nāyaṃ jñāta iti jñānābhāvaviśiṣṭo 'numīyata iti na kiñcidanupapannam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8456: stāmātmano jñānasukhe bhinne na tu mithastathā ca sukhātmakaṃ jñānamātmani jñānāntareṇa yadi nānubhūyata /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8457: evametat, svayamapi na prakāśata iti tvasiddhamityata āha---sukhaṃ ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8458: tadevamātmani sukhaṃ nityaṃ bhinnaṃ bhinnanaiva jñānena prakāśyamānamāstheyam tatra bhāṣyavārtike ityāha---tadevamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8460: yena tatrāpi viṣayamātrāpekṣāyāṃ manasaiva rūpādyupalabdhiprasaḍgo na syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8461: atha bahirmanaḥsāpekṣaṃ nanvantariti parihāraḥ, sa ihāpīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8463: āpāditaprayāsavaiyarthyaparihāraṃ parasya vārttikakṛto hṛdisthaṃ sphuṭīkaroti siddhāntavārttikaṃ saṃgamayitum---nanu tvanmata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8470: na hi tasya saṃbandhalakṣaṇā prāptirapratisaṃkramatvāt nāpi tādātmyalakṣaṇā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8489: tadidaṃ pūrvoktaṃ hṛdi nidhāyoktam---śakyau bhogena kṣetumiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8496: na viparītaprayojano vā bhavitumarhatīti bhāktatvamevānandaśrutīnāṃ nyāyyamityāha---tasmāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8498: yadyapi kiñcinnārabhate nopādatte tathāpi nimittatayā kiñcitkurvan san bhaviṣyatīti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8511: sarveṣāṃ pramāṇādhīnatvāt prameyasya tu bubhutsitatamatvāt tābhyāṃ saṃśayādīnāmapakarṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8512: sāṅgepāṅge ca nyāye vyutpādye pūrvāṅgatayā prakaraṇāntarebhyaḥ saṃśayādiprakāraṇasyotkarṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8514: na ca prayojanamanusandhāya saṃśaya iti saṃśayasya prāthamyamevaṃlakṣaṇakrame 'pi nyāyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8523: vimarśa ityanena ca viṣayataḥ svarūpataśca sāmānyalakṣaṇadvayaṃ sūcitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8535: saṃśayapadasannidhaśca vimarśapadaṃ vivakṣitamarthamāheti tatsahitamevoktavāniti parasparaniṣedhavadubhayavidhipradhāna ekaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8537: parasparaviraharūpavidhiniṣedhapradhāno 'nya iti yathāsaṃkhyaṃ viśiṣṭaḥ saṃśayo lakṣya ityāha---atra viśiṣṭa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8539: guṇagataṃ saṃśayo lakṣya ityāha---atra viśiṣṭa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8546: iha vārtikakāreṇa samānadharmopapatterityādau sattāmātreṇa saṃśayāhetutayā upalabdheraśrutyā ca pūrvapakṣayitvā samādhānatrayamabhihitaṃ tadvivecayati---yadyapīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8550: tṛtīye tu sattāvacana eva lakṣaṇayopalabdhipara iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8551: tatra viśeṣāpekṣa iti padaṃ tadā sāmānyajñānamākṣipet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8555: yadyapi viśeṣāpekṣaśabdaḥ sākṣād viśeṣopalabdhi na niṣedhati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8561: yathā hi gaḍgātīrayoḥ saṃyogamantarbhāvyāvinābhāvastathā agṛhyamāṇasmaraṇabubhutsayorekaviṣayatayā saṃśayamantarākṛtvā paurvāparyaniyamenāvinābhāva eva saṃbandha ityarthaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8564: viśeṣamapekṣata iti hi viśeṣāpekṣaḥ saṃśaya uktaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8565: tathā ca viśeṣe jijñāsājanaka ityukte phalamasya darśitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8571: tad vārttikamukhenaiva pariharati---na ceyamalaukikī lakṣaṇetyādi yena prayojanamanurudhyeteti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8574: nanu tathāpi vivakṣitatajjātīyavṛttitve satyanyavṛttireva dharmaḥ samānaśabdavācya iti kuto niyama ityata āha---samāno hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8577: yadi hi samāno dharmo vyavacchedaheturiti kutaḥ sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāvaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8582: tasmāt tasminnasatyapi na vaktavyasyāvakāśa iti darśayitumiyaṃ yuktirukteti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8589: tathā hi saptamo rasaḥ saṃśayajñāne dharmitayā viṣayaḥ syād,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8591: na kadācilloka evaṃ sandigdhe yadayaṃ saptamo rasaḥ sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8593: nāpyevaṃ sandigdhe ayamupalabhyamānaḥ padārthaḥ saptamo vā raso daśamaṃ vā dravyamiti?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8594: saptamo rasaḥ kimasti nāsti veti sandeho bhavatyeveti cet na,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8604: vārttikakṛt ityata āha---aneketi na sarvatra dravyādau saṃyogajatvamato viśeṣayati---kāryadravya ityādi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8606: bādhakaṃ dṛṣṭavā jaghanyāṃ vṛttim ālambya bhāṣyakṛtā sūtraṃ vyākhyātamiti darśayanniva vārttikam avatārayati---bhāṣyakṛdvyākhyayeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8608: yadi lākṣaṇikamidaṃ padaṃ kaḥ saṃbandha ityāśayavāniti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8609: avadhyavadhimadbhāvaḥ saṃbandhaḥ iti saṃkalayya vārttikārthamāha---etaduktaṃ bhavatīti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8614: pūrvaṃ hi vibhāgajatvādinā svāśraya eva śabdastadviparītebhyo vyāvartata ityuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8615: idānīṃ tu svāśrayācchabdāntara eveti na nivartyata ityabhisandhiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8617: tasyānekasya dharmo nivartakatayā yaḥ sa evāneka ityucyate iti vyākhyātamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8618: nanvevaṃ sati kiṃ lakṣaṇayā yāvatā mukhya evānekaśabdo 'stu /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8619: tathā hi pūrvam anekasya dharmo 'nekadharmaḥ sākṣāt samavāyādivṛttyā cet samānapadenaiva gatārtha iti matvā dūṣitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8622: yadi saṃbandhivacana evānekaśabdaḥ syānna dharmaśabdena samānādhikaraṇaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8623: tathā ca bahuvrīheralābhe dharmī na labhyetetyarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8624: evaṃ bhāṣyānugataṃ vārttikamupasaṃhṛtya svatantraṃ vārttikamutthāpya lakṣaṇānurodhena tāvad vyācaṣṭe---prakāreti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8628: tena viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayorviśiṣṭabuddhihetutvenābhedamupacarya viśaiṣyavacano 'yam anekaśabdo viśeṣaṇe dharme prayuktaḥ ityāśayavānāha---bhedābhedapratyayaheturityartha iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8635: tathā pyasādhāraṇāt saṃśayo bhavan tajjātīyatāyāmeva paryavasyati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8636: na tu tadvyaktitāyām tajjātoyā api hi vidharmāṇo dṛśyante /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8637: na tu ta evetyetat sūcayitumanekavyaktiniṣṭhatā darśitā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8642: udāharaṇaparatāṃ sphuṭayitumasādhāraṇāvasare sādhāraṇamapi sadādi kimityupanyastamiti śaṅkāṃ nivārayati---dravyatvādikoṭīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8650: tat siddhāntaprasaṅgena niṣedhamupakramya vidhiparyavasānena darśayati---dravyakarmabhyāṃ vyāvartamānaḥ kiṃ guṇa ityādi //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8656: tato dravyanāśaviśiṣṭaṃ kālaṃ svatantraṃ vā avayavamapekṣya dalayorvartamāno vibhāga ākāśādideśād vibhāgaṃ karotīti vaiśeṣikāḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8658: prakṛtasya hi karmaṇo vibhāgadvayajanakatvaṃ krameṇa vā syād,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8667: yadā ākāśādideśād vibhāgaṃ karoti karma ta tadāvayavāntarāditi sthitiriti vaiśeṣikāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8669: ādye vibhāge hi kartavye karmaṇo nirapekṣatvāt sa eva kālaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8670: dvitīye tu kartavye prathamānantarakāla eva nairapekṣyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8677: tathātve vā yataḥ kutaścit karmaṇo yugapadubhayavibhāgopapattau calatyevāvayave sarvadravyanāśaprasaṅgaḥ, na caivam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8683: tadanurodhāt karmaṇo 'pi jātikṛtaṃ sahakārikṛtaṃ vā vailakṣaṇyamavaśyaṃ svīkartavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8691: anyathā tatrāpyanayaiva diśā kāraṇamātrasaṃyogapūrvakāḥ kāraṇākāraṇasaṃyogāḥ kalpanīyāḥ syuḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8692: yathā ca tatra krame pramāṇaṃ nāsti tathehāpīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8695: yathā caitadvailakṣṇyaṃ tathā varamevamasatu yadekānārambhakasaṃyogapratidvandvinamanyā tu ārambhakānārambhakapratidvandvinaṃ janayatītyarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8696: tasmāt kāraṇamātravibhāgapūrvake kāraṇākāraṇavibhāge pramāṇaṃ nāstīti nābhyupagamyata ityetāvanmātravyaktīkaraṇaphalo 'yamanamyupagama ityāha---tasmāditi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8703: yadyapi vibhāgāpekṣavibhāgāsamavāyikāraṇam asādhāraṇaṃ śabde tadeva vaktumucitam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8707: na hi vibhāgād dravyasya janma saṃbhavati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8711: karmaṇo 'pi kāraṇaṃ vibhāgo bhavanna tāvadādyasya tasminnasati vibhāgasyaivānupapatteḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8722: samāno hi dharmaḥ pakṣe vartamānaḥ sapakṣavipakṣadharmābhyāmekajātīyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8724: tathā ca pakṣe vartamānasya sapakṣavipakṣadharmābhyāṃ vijātīyatvamuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8729: samānaśabdena pratiyogitayā buddhāvasamāne 'pyusthāpite saṃśayakāraṇatve ca tasya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8730: pramāṇasiddhe tasmin vaktavye yadanekapadamupādatte sūtrakārastena jānīmo nūnamayamevārtho
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8734: pratyabhijñānaṃ tāvadvyaktiviṣayakaṃ nāstyeva gakārādāviti dvitīye vyutpādanīyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8735: yadāpyasti tadāpyasya viṣayaḥ kiṃ vyaktirutajātiriti viṣayataḥ sandihyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8737: tadāpi pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ veti sandeha ityabhiprāyavān saṃmugdhamāha
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8740: yadyapi gavādivyaktaya iva gotvādyupadhānā iti jātimātrapadārthavādī na svīkarotyeva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8745: na ca vācyaṃ śabdasya tathābhāvasandehe 'pi ghaṭādau niścitatvena vyāptigraho yadi syāt ko doṣa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8746: sarvopasaṃhāreṇa hi vyāptiniścaye yatkṛtakaṃ tadavaśyamanityamiti kṛtakatvaṃ śabde niścayameva kuryāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8752: vyāptidoṣe tu sarvopasaṃhārābhāvāt kathaṃ tadbalena buddhyādau sādhyasiddhiriti sandigdhatattvaṃ śabdaṃ vihāya vyāptiriti cet?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8753: evaṃ tarhi śabdādanyatve sati kṛtakatvāditi vācyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8754: tathā ca yadi daivāt śabdo 'pyanitya eva vastutaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8756: tasmāt sūṣṭhūktaṃ sandigdhe nityānityabhāve śabde kṛtakatvaṃ gatamiti nānityatvena svabhāvataḥ pratibaddhamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8757: pratyayabhedabheditvaṃ kāraṇatīvratvāditāratamyena tīvratīvratarāditvaṃ pratyekaṃ satpratipakṣatvam ityekaikasyānvayato vyatirekato vobhayakoṭyanupanāyakatayā na saṃśayahetutvam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8760: tathā ca tenaiva rūpeṇa saṃśayakāraṇatvaṃ nānyathetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8761: anunāsikatvādayo hi sāmānyaviśeṣāḥ pratyakṣā bhavantaḥ pratyakṣavyaktivṛttaya eva bhavitumarhanti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8767: nanu tathāpi naiyāyikānāṃ mate śabdāśrayā evānunāsikatvādayo dharmā,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8776: astyātmā nāstyātmetyudāharaṇaṃ tu bhāṣyakṛtaiva darśitaṃ sphuṭamiti na prapañcitaṃ vārtikaṭīkākārābhyām /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8788: anabhyāsadaśāpannopalabdhau hi pramāṇottarabhāvāniścaye buddhitvasāmānyopalabdheḥ satyatvāsatyatvasaṃdeha iti yadyabhimatam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8790: tatastaddvāraker'the saṃdeha iha vivakṣita iti yadi,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8796: tṛtīye tvāha---na nāgo vā nago veti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8798: etāvāṃstu viśeṣo yat sthāṇurvā puruṣo vetyatropalabdhyanupalabdhī anutpādādevāvyavasthite /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8799: prakṛte tūdāharaṇe jātameva jalajñānamaprāmāṇyaśaṅkayā na vyavasthitamiti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8801: yadi viśeṣasmṛtisahitāyā ayogyānupalabdheḥ dharmiṇamanantarbhāvya saṃśayaḥ syāt sa tāvannātyantānupalabdhakoṭyullekhī,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8804: na hi bhavati paramāṇurasti naveti astyeva yataḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8806: tathā ca sa upalabdhaḥ sannanvayato vyatirekato vipratipattito vā viśeṣau smārayet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8813: pūrvāṅgatvāviśeṣe 'pi saṃśaye sati prayojanānusaṃdhānāt tataḥ prayojanasyāpakarṣa ityuktamṛ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8818: arthapadaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa anūdyāpi na vivṛtamityata āha---sasādhanāviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8822: atra ca ṭīkāyāṃ yadyapi tathāpīti tadacatuṣṭayamadhyāharanti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8824: tathā ca prāmāṇikatvādeva prayojanaṃ na vaktavyamiti vākyārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8826: tacca tvayā vyutpāditamityata āha---na ca pramāṇamīdṛśamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8828: tathā ca pramāṇopapannaṃ na vācyamiti vadataḥ svacaritāvirodha ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8842: gauṇaṃ prayojanaṃ mukhyasyaiva prayojanasya kṛte upādīyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8855: yathā svargasya yāgānaṅgasyāpi abhisandhānaṃ svayamaphalamapi yāgapravṛttiṃ prati kāraṇatayā saṃnidhīyamānamaṅgamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8857: anye tu, kiṃ tu mukhyamityavacchidya vyācakṣate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8860: akṣarārthastu vārttikasya ya khalu niṣprayojanā cintā prayojanābhisandhānaśūnyaḥ saṃśayo nāsau nyāyasya pravartaka iti sphuṭatvānnoktaḥ //14
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8863: saṃśaye prayojane ca sati kva punaretat sādhyasambaddhaṃ sādhanamupalabheya,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8866: na ca sāmānyalakṣaṇamantareṇa viśeṣalakṣaṇāvatāra iti tatsūcakaṃ sūtraṃ tathaiva vyācaṣṭe---sādhyasādharmyāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8879: api tu vastusthita eva jñāpyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8884: evaṃ nyāyapūrvāṅgaprakaraṇaṃ samarthya parikalitasāmarthyaṃ sādhanaṃ yatropaneyaṃ sa siddhāntāparanāmā nyāyasyāśrayo 'vasaraprāptatvāducyata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8886: sūtramapaṭhitvā vyākhyānaṃ tu kuta ityata āha---atreti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8889: saṃsthitiritthambhāvavyavastheti bhāṣyaṃ dṛṣṭvā idamiti sāmānyābhyupagame siddhāntabhramaḥ syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8893: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaṃ prati kāmacārāditi ca prathama sūtra evoktam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8897: kathaṃ vyatirekamāha---yo 'tho na śāstrita ityata āha---aśāstrito 'prāmāṇika iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8899: tathā ya vyatikrame 'pi teṣāṃ nāpasiddhānto bhavedityata āha--ābhimānikaṃ ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8900: etaccāgrato vārttikakāra eva tatpratyayādabhyupagama iti vadan sphuṭīkariṣyatīti //27 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8902: nanu sadṛśatantrāsiddho 'ṣyarthaḥ kvacidabhyupagamyamānaḥ siddhānto yathā prābhākare niyogo vākyārthaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8909: ekatra kutracit siddho na sarvatrasiddha ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8911: anyathā sarvatantrasiddho 'pi samānatantrasiddha eveti bhramaḥ syāditi //29 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8917: yasyārthasya sarvajñatvāderviśeṣasya siddhau kṣityādeḥ sakartṛkatvasya pratikriyamāṇasya siddhiḥ sa sarvajñatvādirviśeṣo 'dhikaraṇasiddhāntaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8918: atha vā yasya sakartṛkatvādeḥ siddhāvantarbhūtā anye 'bhiprāyaprakāntāḥ sarvajñatvādayo 'pi viśeṣāḥ sidhyanti so 'dhikaraṇasiddhānta iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8919: tadatra pakṣadvaye 'pi phalato na kaścid viśeṣa iti manvānaḥ śliṣṭaṃ bhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭe,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8927: nanu ca pakṣo vā heturvā kaṇṭhata eva niyatatantrābhyupagamāt pratitantrasiddhāntānna bhidyata ityata āha---anena rūpeṇeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8933: nanvetadantarbhāvamantareṇa kimupalabdhimatpūrvakatvameva pratyetuṃ na śakyata ityata āha---nānyatheti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8937: tacca jñānaṃ dvyaṇukādyadṛṣṭaparyantapakṣīkaraṇe yadi sarvaviṣayaṃ na sidhyet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8939: tasmād yathā gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra tīralakṣaṇāmantareṇa gaṅgāpadārtho na ghoṣapadārthamanveti yathā sakartṛkapadārtho 'pi
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8944: tadevaṃ prathamaṃ vyākhyānaṃ bhāṣyānusāreṇa samarthya dvitīye vārttikaṃ sphuṭamityāha---tadetaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8949: nanu bhāṣyamata eva sūtraṃ sphuṭārthamityata āha---sūtraṃ caivamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8955: manaḥparihāre vā sarvendriyavilopaḥ prasajyata ityabhihite punaḥ sūtrakāreṇa rūpādijñānaṃ cakṣurādisādhanamasatu niḥsādhanameva tu sukhādijñānamityāśaṅkya
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8961: idaṃ ca svābhimatonnayanaprakārāviṣkaraṇaṃ sūtrakṛtaḥ śiṣyahitatayetyato lakṣaṇārthamāha---so 'yamiti uktārthānuṣaṅgiṇaḥ arthasyābhyupagamo 'bhyupagamasiddhānta ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8965: tamimaṃ vibhāgalakṣaṇaprapañcaṃ sarva evāyaṃ pakṣa iti pūrvapakṣavārttikavivaraṇavyājena saṃkalayyāha---sarvatantretyādi //31 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8971: upaneyanyāyaprakaraṇam ārabhyata iti sphuṭārthaṃ bhāṣyam---athāvayavā iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8984: sa cādau vipratipattyā paścāt pratijñayā gatārtha iti matvā tarkābhiprāyeṇa vyācaṣṭe---yadi śabdo nityaḥ syāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8985: vyudasyate hi tena saṃśayaḥ phalataḥ svarūpataśca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8987: saṃśayo hi dve koṭī parispṛśya vartamānāṃ jijñāsāmapi tathābhūtāmeva janayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8989: tadevaṃ tāvantarā vartamānastarka ekasyāṃ koṭau pramāṇabādhitaṃ kañcidarthamāharan tadgatāmicchāṃ vicchidya dvitīyakoṭau niyamayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:8991: enāṃ ca janayatā tarkeṇa saṃśayaphalaṃ prabalecchā tadaiva vyudasyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9002: tena sādhyatayā svīkriyamānasyārthasya vacanaṃ pratijñeti sūtrārthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9007: yathā ca neyaṃ bhrāntiḥ tathā dvitīye nivedayiṣyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9009: candraśabdo 'yaṃ śaśivācakaḥ prayojyavṛddhaṃ prati asati vṛttyantare tatpratyayajanakatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9013: evamuttaratra yastu naivaṃvidho na vācyo na lakṣya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9015: pakṣa eveti darśayitumiṣṭagrahaṇaṃ bhaviṣyatītyata āha---na ca kvacidapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9024: etena vārttikakārīyo 'bhyupagamasiddhāntastāvaducita iti darśayatā chalataḥ pañcamasiddhāntāpattirdaśitā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9029: yatra yatra pramādike 'pyarthe śāstravirodhaścodyeta tatra tatrābhyupagamasiddhānto
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9030: 'yaṃ mametyevamapi nistārāt parāvṛttya ca tenaiva niranuyojyānuyogena nigrahe kathāsamāptau
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9037: tasmāt na hi śāstrāśrayā vādā bhavantīti svapnavilāpaḥ ityarthaḥ //33 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9045: nigṛhnīyād veti na saṃpratītirnaca vijayo gardabhīkṣīramathanavadanarthakaḥ prayāsaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9047: sa hi vivādād vā avayavāntarād vā?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9057: vayamapi hi parābhyupetapakṣaviparītāṃ koṭimupanīya tatsiddhaye 'vayavāntaramabhidadhyāditi brūmaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9060: na hi hetvādibhiḥ caturbhiḥ pratijñārtho 'bhidhīyata iti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9068: na tu tannirṇayahetubhūtasādhanāvabodhavanato vivādaviṣayaṃ nirṇayasya nirṇeyarūpamantareṇa nirūpayitumaśakyatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9071: tathā ca tasyaiva prathamābhidhāne prāpte 'nyasyābhidhānānavakāśāt ākṣepasyāpi kuto 'vakāśa iti?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9072: nanvapekṣitānabhidhāne 'pyapekṣitaṃ kurvāṇaḥ kathamavavadheyavacano nāmetyata āha---yathā ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9074: tatrāpi tadanabhidhāne viparītabuddhiḥ kimaṅgaḥ yatra vacanenaivāpekṣitasiddhirityarthaḥ anyadeti pakṣamupasthāpayati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9077: yo hi yena yat sādhayitum udyataḥ sa tatsāmagrīmapratikūlayanneva tathā kartumarhati /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9088: tathāpi hetvabhidhānena kiṃ tatsvarūpasyopanayenaiva sākṣādabhidhānādityata āha---anityaḥ śabda iti tvapekṣita ukta iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9090: na hyanityaḥ śabda ityukte kṛtakatvānityatvavyāptau vā kṛtakatvasya vā śabdadharmisaṃbandhe śroturākāṅkṣā kiṃ nāma kuta etatpratipattavyamiti syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9092: ata eva gamakatvādetasya mārgasya sarvaśāstrakārā evamevopādadate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9102: dvitīye tu śabdoccāraṇasya nārthagaterapyadhikaṃ prayojanaṃ nāma,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9104: nanu sāmānyalakṣaṇamantareṇa na viśeṣalakṣaṇāvasara ityata āha---śrutyarthābhyāmiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9107: tathā ca kathaṃ vākyāvayava ityata āha---yadyapīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9109: sādhyate pratipādyate tenāpi hi svārtha ityata āha---yadi tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9112: atha sādhyapadaṃ vihāya sādhanaṃ pratipādakaṃ vacanamityarthaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9115: yadi tvevaṃ kriyeya liṅgapratipādanadvāreṇa sādhyasādhanaṃ niścāyakaṃ vacanamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9119: vacanapadamasūtrasthameva ṭīkākṛtā svayamupanīyavirodhātivyāptī kutaḥ śaṅkite iti śaṅkā nivartate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9128: tarhi kiṃbhūtamupanayāt pratīyata ityata āha---kiṃ tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9133: na hi hetuvadupanayo 'pi kuta ityākāṅkṣāyā pravartate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9136: tathāpi prakṛto vivādaviṣayaḥ kiṃ vyāptadharmaviśiṣṭo na vetyapekṣāyāṃ sā ca tathā cāyaṃ kṛtaka ityanenaiva paraṃ nivartyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9138: tasmānna hetūpanayayorarthato rūpataḥ prayojanato vā saṃkara ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9139: nanu ca vacanalakṣaṇāyāṃ yadyapi jñāner'the vā na prasaṅgaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9140: tathāpi sādhyasādhanamiti kṛtakatvamatra heturityādau vacana eva prasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9144: na ca kuta ityākāṅkṣāyāṃ sādhyasādhanamiti vā kṛtakatvaṃ heturiti vā vacanamaupayikam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9146: tena viśeṣaparatvena heturiti lakṣyanirdeśo nānupapanna iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9148: na kvacit pradeśo sādharmyaṃ hetulakṣaṇatvena vihitam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9150: nāpyatra viśeṣaṇaśūnyasyaiva sādharmyasyopādānam yena tāvanmātragocaro vidhirbhavet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9162: viśeṣato jñātānāṃ teṣā svavākye parivarjanādimukhena bhavatvityetadarthamarthalabdhamapi kaṇṭhoktyābhidhīyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9167: udāhṛte hetau lakṣaṇaṃ yojayituṃ hetvarthe ca vivecayitavye prasaṅgāt pratijñārthaṃ vivecayitumiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9168: tathāpi pradhvaṃsasya nānātvāt jātyāderupasaṃgrāhakasya vā bhāvāt kathaṃ vyāptyādisiddhiḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9169: upalakṣyābhedamātreṇa ca tatsiddhau kuṇḍalavatā devadattena sādhyo vyavahāro daṇḍavatāpi sādhyetetyata āha---virodhīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9175: utpadyate ghaṭa ityatra tu ghaṭo na kārakamasattvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9176: tataśca akārakasyaiva kārakairatyantasannidhestathopacāro vā kārakāṇāmeva kāryaśabdopacāro vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9177: ubhayathāpi vyāpārāveśasamaya evākhyātaprayogo na tu dhātvarthamātrāveśasamaye /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9178: na hi pakve dhātvarthamātramupādāya pacyata iti prayujyate lokaiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9185: pakṣe sattvenopapatteraikāntikaṃ sapakṣe sattvaṃ mā prasāṃkṣīt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9191: nedaṃ nirātmakaṃ jīvacchīrīraṃ māṃsādimayatvāt ityasaṃkīrṇamudāharaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9192: etaddvayamapi nirākarta vaidharmyameva codāharaṇeneti pūrvāvadhāraṇena pakṣavyāptau labdhāyāṃ vaidharmyamevetyanena sādharmyarūpatā nirākṛtāvayamarthaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9193: pakṣasya vyāpako dharmastaditaravaidharmyarūpa eveti tathā cebhayorapi kaḥ prasaṃgaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9195: sa ca vipakṣodāharaṇeneti viśeṣayatā sapakṣābhāvapradarśanena nirastaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9196: yadi hi sati sapakṣe anvayo vivakṣitaḥ tadā tathā vaidharmyādityanārabhyameva,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9201: udāharaṇaṃ ca sapakṣo 'pi bhavatīti kathaṃ viśeṣalābha ityāśaṅkya vyācaṣṭe---vipakṣeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9202: vyākhyānato viśeṣapratipattirna hi sandehādalakṣaṇamiti bhāva iti tatra tatroktamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9205: tasmiśca sādhye sidvāsādhanaṃ vyatirekyasaṃbhavaśca svaśarīre prāṇasya prayatnapūrvakatvāvadhāraṇena svapakṣānvayasyāpi saṃbhavādityata āha---prāṇādineti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9206: tathāpyasmadāyatte śabdaprayoge kiścityavācakaṃ prayokṣyāmaha ityata āha---prāṇādikāraṇecchādikāraṇarahitamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9207: paraśarīre pakṣapraviṣṭe hetusiddhyarthaṃ vipakṣībhūte ca ghaṭādau sādhyarahite hetuvyatirekasiddhyarthaṃ tathoktamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9210: na ca kevalavyatirekī tāvanmātrasyānvayenaiva siddherityata āha---yaśceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9212: anena tu tadeva pṛthivyādivilakṣaṇaṃ sidhyatīti na niravakāśo vyatirekī /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9217: sandigdhasya ca jijñāsyatvāt viśeṣasmaraṇe ca saṃśayāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9224: iha tu kāryavattā darśitā nedaṃ nirātmakaṃ jīvaccharīraṃ necchādisamavāyikāraṇībhūtadravyaviśeṣarahitamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9236: nanu yadi nāma sāmānyata icchādisamavāyikāraṇamātravyāvṛttirghaṭādau pratipannā kimāyātaṃ nairātmyasyetyata āha---nirātmakaśabdenāpīti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9237: evamarthagati pariśodhya vārttikaṃ yojayitvā dvatīyaṃ pradhānīkṛtyāha---etaduktaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9240: iśvarānumāna iva pakṣadharmatāvalenaiva vivakṣito viśeṣaḥ setsyatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9241: nanvanvayinā viśeṣaṃ sādhayatā kevalavyatirekiṇaḥ kiṃ khaṇḍitam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9244: atha tenaiva viparyayasyāpi vaktuṃ sukaratvādityata āha---ṛjumārgeṇeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9252: na ca dravyāṣṭakātiriktamapratītya teṣāṃ samavāyikāraṇameva pratyetuṃ na śakyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9253: na hīcchādīn prati pṛthivyāḥ samavāyikāraṇatve teṣāṃ tadvattā abhidhīyamānā virudhyate /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9276: yatra tu nedaṃ nirātmakamiti tatra nirātmakaśabdenāpi ayamevārtha ucyata iti vadatā icchādisamavāyikāraṇavirahaniṣedha eva pratijñārthaḥ svīkṛtaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9283: nanu tathāpi ghaṭādibhyo nirātmakebhya icchādivyatirekaḥ kiṃ tathābhūtadravyavyāvṛttikṛtaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9284: kiṃ vā bhūtānāmeva pariṇatibhedavyāvṛttikṛta iti sandigdhopādhikatvādagamaka evetyata āha---yathā ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9294: ajñaistu tathā na vyavahriyata ityanyadetaditi śaṅkate---na ca pakṣa eveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9301: evaṃ tarhi sapakṣavat pakṣe 'pi nairātmyapratiṣedhe 'pi nātmasadbhāva iti parākṣepaṃ parihṛtya tadgranthaṃ paṭhati śarīrādiṣviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9302: vipakṣe hi sati sata eva kasyacid vyatirekaḥ pratīta iti pramāṇena pratīta iti pratipāditam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9303: tasya ca pramāṇapratītasya vyatirekasya pakṣe 'pi satyeva niṣedhaḥ pramāṇena kriyata iti yuktā niṣedhalakṣaṇā vidhisiddhiḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9304: sapakṣastu na kenacit pramāṇena pratīta iti na tatrānvayavyatirekatanniṣedhāḥ paramārthataḥ kenacitpramāṇena śakyate pratyetum /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9311: tadā pakṣe 'pi nairātmyaniṣedhe 'pi tāvanmātraparyavasāyitayā na sātmakatvaparyavasānamiti vārttikārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9315: na tasya vyatirekavyabhicāro 'pi tasya vyatirekadharmatayā tadabhāve 'nupapatterityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9317: vyabhicāravadavyabhicāro 'pi taddharma eva so 'pi kathaṃ tadabhāve bhavedityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9321: nanvetāvatyeva sūtrārthe ko doṣaḥ syādityata āha---tathā satīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9322: śeṣamanumānalakṣaṇa iti sapakṣe siddha ityādi vṛttipadāntaradūṣaṇaśeṣam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9328: sadṛśakṣaṇa sabhāgasantānalakṣaṇanirodhabhedena nirodhau dvau vināśau yayorapratisaṃkhyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhāviti paribhāṣā //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9345: tatra prapañcaṃ vihāya yāvanmātreṇa heturnirdhāryate tāvadupanyasyati---atreti //35 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9348: prayoge kiṃ sautra eva kramo grāhyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9349: kramāntaraṃ veti sandehamudāharaṇasya prayojanaṃ darśayan nivārayati---hetāviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9350: yato nāvyāpto nāpratītavyāptiko hetubhāve vyavatiṣṭhate sādhyasiddhāvekāgrībhavati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9351: ato vyāpterbubhūtsitatvāt saiva pratipādayituṃ yujyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9354: na tūpanīya paścāt sāmarthyaṃ jijñāsanta iti sarvalokasiddhamiti saṃgatisaṃkṣepaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9355: tathāpi sāmānyalakṣaṇavibhāgau vinā nāvasaro viśeṣalakṣaṇasyetyata āha---sūtramitīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9365: tena hi samānajātīyād vipakṣodāharaṇād vijātīyācca pratijñāderidaṃ vyavacchidyata iti boddhavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9368: tena tādṛśena dṛṣṭāntena sādhanadharmaprayuktasādhyadharmavatā upalakṣitaṃ viṣayatayā tadviṣayaṃ vacanamudāharaṇaṃ sapakṣodāharaṇamityarthaḥ
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9370: tathāpi vākyaśeṣabhūtenāpyanena bhavitavyamiti manyamānaḥ tadantarbhāvyaiva śaṅkāmutthāpayati---yasmāditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9371: iyaṃ cāśaṅkā tairāgāmivāvārttikaṃ dṛṣṭvā sādhyenaivetyavadhāraṇākṣepiketi buddham /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9381: na ca pakṣo 'pi vipakṣa iti tatra tatra darśitameva /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9386: evaṃ ca sati prathamamavadhāraṇaṃ mandaprayojanamapi paraśucchedyatāṃ ko vā nakhacchedye sahiṣyata iti nyāyena darśitam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9388: nanvevaṃ sati hetulakṣaṇaṃ nyūnamaprayojakāvyudasanādityata āha---hetulakṣaṇe tviti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9392: evamarthadvārakamudāharaṇābhāsacatuṣṭayaṃ darśayitvā śabdadvārakaṃ dvayaṃ darśayituṃ pīṭhamāracayati---pañcamīti //36 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9397: yadyapyataddharmabhāvitvāt sādhyavaidharmyavān dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇamiti vyatyayo yujyate,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9399: ata eva padāni vibhajya saṃkalitamarthamāha---etaduktaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9416: na kevalaṃ sādhyasādharmyāt taddharmabhāvī dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9430: iyāṃstu viśeṣaḥ kevalavyatirekiṇi sāmānyato 'nvayavyatirekiṇi tu viśeṣato 'pi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9431: yathā ca kevalavyatirekī satyapi sāmānyānvaye na tenopasaṃhartuṃ śakyaḥ, tathoktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9441: nanvanvayavyatirekiṇo 'pi pakṣādeva vyatirekapratyayo mā bhūdityetadarthaṃ vipakṣe niyamo darśayitumucitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9449: anitya eva kṛtakatvamityukte arthād gamyate na nitya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9451: yato 'bhidheya eva prameyatvamityukte gamyatāṃ nānabhidheya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9458: tathā cānvayaṃ pratītya tanniṣedho vyatirekaḥ pratyetavyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9460: so 'yaṃ prāk yadi pakṣa eva pratipannaḥ kimadhikaṃ vyatirekeṇa sādhitam?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9471: na hi ghaṭamānayeti vaktavye 'naghaṭaṃ na mānaiṣīriti vaktāro bhavanti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9475: evamudāharaṇayorviśeṣavyavasthāṃ darśayatā vāśabdasya vyavasthitavibhāṣāvacanatve 'pi saṅgatirityapi darśitam //37 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9485: te ca yathā svasyotpadyete tathā parasyāpyutpādanīye,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9487: svayaṃ ca vyāptijñānādindriyādisahāyāt pakṣadharmatāvagamo na tu viparyayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9488: tataḥ parasyāpyudāharaṇavacanena vyāptijñānumutpādya tatsahacaritenopanayavacanena pakṣadharmatāpratyaya utpādanīyaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9492: tasmādarthasiddhaḥ paurvāparyaniyama udāharaṇopanayayorityartha iti antataḥ phakvikā yojyeti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9507: tena tasya durunneyatvāt kṛtṛrāsadivādivad avyutpannaṃ pratyanaṅgatvācca /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9513: sacārthaḥ pratipādyaḥ svaśabdena yaḥ śabdāntareṇākṣipto 'pi na /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9515: etāvadatra syādupanayārthaṃ vyutpannaḥ svayaṃ vā ūheta,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9521: athaivaṃ manvīthā yadyapi kṛtakatvāditi sādhanaparaṃ vacanam
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9526: dvitīyastu upapādanīyatayā svārthaṃ pratipādayannapi kathaṃ tannāntarīyakamapyarthamākṣipet,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9528: tathātve vā pratijñaiva sarvamākṣipediti gataṃ hetunāpi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9529: tasmāt sādhanatvenoddiṣṭe 'pi kṛtakatve tādrūpyasyāsiddhatvāt na tena vyāpterākṣepa iti nānarthakam udāharaṇam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9533: nanu yathā hetvanurodhena tadupasaṃhāra upanaye dvividhaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9534: tathā sādhyānurodhena tadupasaṃhāro 'pi dvividha eva prāptaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9540: tasmāt pratijñānigamanayorapi dvaividhyaṃ prāptamiti kuto nābhihitaṃ iti sūtrakṛtā pratijñālakṣaṇe śaṅkitumucitamapi granthalaghimne sukhapratipattaye vā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9543: hetvādīnāmavayavānāṃ yeṣāṃ yatsaṃbandhi nigamanaṃ tasya samānamekaṃ lakṣaṇam //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9544: na hi vidhiniṣedhayoḥ pratijñātayorniṣedhavidhyupasaṃhāre pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanamiti lakṣaṇaṃ lagati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9547: na hyanvayivyatirekiṇorhetvoḥ vyatiriktanvitapratijñāne sādhyanirdeśa itilakṣaṇaṃ lagati,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9552: tat kiṃ kṛtakatvādityādika eva hetūpadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9554: na ca vācyaṃ tathaiva kiṃ na syāt,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9558: upasaṃhārasyaiṣa ca guṇo yad viparītakalpanāvilopanaṃ nāma /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9560: evaṃ ca satyavaśyakartavyatayā tasmāditi kṛte kṛtakatvāditi mandaprayojanam,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9562: ye tu nipuṇaṃmanyāḥ sarvanāmnā hetuvat pratijñābhidhānamapi manyante,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9575: omiti cet? tatra vakṣyāma ityāśayavānāha---anityaḥ śabda iti pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanamiti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9583: na brūmaḥ siddhasya nirdeśo nigamanamapi tu siddhatayā nirdeśa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9584: tathaiva tataḥ pāñcarūpyapratīteḥ na hyupapādanīyatayā nirdeśaḥ sādhanasya rūpāntarasampadamākṣeptumapyalamityuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9591: phalasyeti tarko 'vasaraprāpta iti saṃgatibhāṣyamavatārya pūraṇena tadarthamāha---uddeśeti //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9598: sa cāpāditasandehe sandehāpanne ca pravartata iti jñāpanārthamavijñātatattva ityuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9601: evaṃvyāpāraścohaḥ prasaṅga ityeveti tathaiva ṭīkākṛtā uktam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9602: sa cāhāryahetorutpadyata iti jñāpanārthaṃ kāraṇopapattita iti padaṃ tadarthatayāpi kvacid vyākhyātam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9605: phalaṃ pramāṇaparatantrasya sataḥ phalavatsannidhāvaphalaṃ tadaṅgamiti nyāyena tattvanirṇayaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9610: ata eva vivaraṇakārāṇāṃ saṃkulānīva vacāṃsīti tadatra nipuṇena pratipattrā bhavitavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9611: tathā hi vyāpāravyāpāriṇoraniṣṭāpattyetyādinā bhedaṃ vyutpādyābhedaṃ vivakṣannāha---tayā pramāṇasyopapatyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9612: tarkakāraṇe kāraṇopapattipadaṃ saṃcārya tatkāryabhūtatarkādabhedaṃ vivakṣannāha---na copapattireveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9613: prapañcitaṃ caitat prathama sūtra eva ṭīkākṛtā iti kṛtaṃ prapañceneti //40 //
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9615: evaṃ sādhanasampattau darśitāyāṃ so 'yaṃ parikarabandhaḥ kimavadhikaḥ kiṃparaśceti jijñāsāyāṃ nirṇayo 'vasaraprāptaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9616: tatrārthāvadhāraṇaṃ nirṇaya iti vaktavye tarkaikaviṣayatāpratipādanaṃ bhāṣyakṛtaḥ kvopayujyata ityata āha---naitaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9622: tena jānīmor'thasannidheḥ śabdārthasannidheḥ supratipadamiti mattvā bhāṣyakārasya tadgatalakṣaṇaivābhimateti hṛdi nidhāya tadanurodhenoktam---vādasūtragatāviti
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9628: yena codyaparihārāvapi saṃgatau syātāmityata āha---na tāvaditi /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9636: tathāpi pūrvapakṣottarapakṣaṃ pratyākalitaniṣkarṣabhedena catuṣpādavyavahārapradarśanāt phalato na kaścid viśeṣaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9637: ekavaktṛkatve 'pi tāvata eva vyāpārakalāpasya vicāre 'pi vidyamānatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9638: tasmād yadyapyanipuṇaścodakastathāpi codyaṃ sāvakāśameveti yathāśrutameva abhyupetya pariharatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9639: nanu kathaṃ śāstre saṃśayānapekṣo nirṇayo mīmāṃsāyā vaiyarthyaprasaṅgādityata āha---nahīti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9643: tadarthanirṇaye tu śāstreṇa kartavye kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9645: atha kathānirṇaye saṃśayaḥ kiṃ na syāt?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9646: kathamanyathā caturthe bhāṣyakṛd eva vādasya saṃśayavyudāsaṃ phalaṃ vakṣyatītyata āha---niścitayoreveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9649: nanu bhāṣyakāreṇa codyopasaṃhāre yo 'vatiṣṭhate tena nirṇaya iti vadatā tābhyāmiti tṛtīyā darśitā /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9650: sā ca pakṣācca pratipakṣācceti vadatā vārttikakṛtā avadhīritā kayā śaṅkayetyata
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9652: tat kiṃ vādasamānayogakṣematayā śāstre 'pi pakṣapratipakṣābhyāmeva nirṇayaḥ?
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9653: na caitat saṃbhavatītyata āha śāstre tu nirṇaya eveti /
GSP29nvtp1_1u:9659: tat kathaṃ kakṣātraye niyama ityata āha---prathamaṃ sādhanamiti /
